name: Paul Carr
text: AAA Pawn Shop & Jewelry have compassion, and are realistic in their appraisal of the item or items you need to sell or pawn.  I had four handguns I needed to sell and had gone to another Decatur Pawn.  The four handguns on the very, very, low side would have been $1,000.00.  The pawn shop that was not AAA offered me $495.00.  I didn't know what to say, just turned around and walked out!!!  AAA Pawn & Jewelry is your place to go for Holiday 2020 jewelry, watches, and especially diamond purchases.  Great selection of quality diamonds.  Christmas, engagement, anniversary, birthday, graduation, I goofed up, etc.  Their diamond case has the quality and price that will make you wish you had shopped there, had you not.

name: Me Me
text: In a very shady part of town in a run down building.  Very sketchy

name: Melissa Collins
text: I came in to sell my wedding set and I had the best possible experience!! They are so kind and made me feel so welcome. I got a great deal and I will definitely do more business with them!!

name: Kira Pickron
text: Have done business with them many, many times. Always gives us a good price for our stuff and very kind and considerate. They definitely care about their customers and if you're late on paying off your pawn, they will work with you and are extremely understanding. Very picky about pawn shops and only have 2 that I'll actually do business with, them being number 1

name: Terri L Sherrill
text: I may sometimes browse other shops. However if I am ready to do business AAA Pawn is where I always go. Its where I feel most comfortable. It's like you have known them forever and doing business with old friends.

name: K L
text: Always great service and people are always friendly. I would definitely recommend to anyone. They are fair and give you the best prices in the area.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We appreciate your business.

name: Adam Lawrence
text:
Bought a Xbox One here for $150, a few days later it died while the person I gifted it to was playing it. I took it back up here and they said they would attempt to get someone to repair it. A few weeks later they said they tried multiple places, each one could not repair the Xbox One. They apparently could not get a video out signal, despite me telling them to wait 20-30 minutes for the included error code. I could reproduce this issue every time. I got a $100 refund and got to keep the Xbox One. That is very generous of them, and I thank them for that. However, I was given a power supply with no screws, it was held together with tape, and it seems like it's missing components, as seen by the empty pin header in the photo. I was going to attempt repair myself, but I no longer have a working power supply, as when I did when I dropped it off to be fixed. This may be the fault of whoever they took it to in order to get it repaired, but everything should have been independently tested after each repair attempt IMO. I just bought a new One S bundle after two failed Ones, this one being the second.

Edit: After a trip back up here, they replaced the power supply, no questions asked. They might make mistakes, sometimes no fault of their own, but they do try to make it right. 👍

The PS3 I bought for $75 is thankfully another story. Its working perfectly after a cleaning and replacing the thermal pads and paste.

name: Lamarrius Peterson
text: they have the best deals on game consoles their the best

name: Brandon Bone
text: Great personal service. Family owned I believe. If you support small business these are the type of people who deserve your patronage. If they can they will help you get the most,  or give you the most, they will. It's just their attitude. It's what all business should be like. If they have 3 copies of a game, they will give you the best copy first, not the other way around. That's the type of treatment you should demand and expect anywhere in America! Most businesses in America,  (Good or bad) should compare themselves, and adopt this type quality of customer service from top to bottom. Rarely do stores prove so effective.

name: C.t. Daniel
text: Very nice people always respectful to there customers...

name: Tracy McBay
text: An all around pawn shop, full of everything you could want and smiling faces ready and willing to help you find it. Best prices around on games, game systems, movies, and tools. Go see 'em, you won't be disappointed!

name: tristie downs (mstristiee29)
text: Every time I go in here the staff are very friendly! I think they could go down on their prices a little but usually you can find a good deal or they will work with you on the price. But they are super super friendly!

name: Terri Sherrill
text: They do well on everything from customer service to providing good prices

name: Ray Ragland
text: They were very helpful answered my questions and really wanted. to help me.I would recommend. them.

name: Tameless
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. I always feel treated fairly when I leave.

name: David Goodwin
text: Good selection of things ,not a bad hock shop

name: Robert Martin
text: Great Customer Service. Friendly and Helpful

name: Nicole Finley
text: LOVE the staff at JBD! Tammy, Mark, Santana, Zach— they’re all phenomenal!! I can’t walk in without leaving with something in my (or on my) hands! Such beautiful, unique pieces of jewelry and I get the most compliments on ALL of the time. And can NOT beat their prices. Highly recommend- if you’re looking for a piece or want to design a piece, Jewelry By Design should be your FIRST stop!

name: Lauren Kiskunes
text: Absolutely wonderful staff! I brought in a 15 year old necklace with a broke clasp and they fixed it on the spot in less than 5 minutes. Highly recommend

resp.text: Hi Lauren, thanks for your positive review! We are so happy that you allowed JBD to help with your special piece. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Madeline Morrell
text: Make sure you ask for your total for ALL work being done. I was being told prices for one, not the total for both. And have them circle and clearly state the quoted price before signing! It felt extremely sketchy and you're stuck when they surprise you with the true cost at pickup! I will never come here again. Poor communication and subpar customer service.

resp.text: Madeline Morrell Stewart, thanks for your feedback & your mailed letter. We set a high standard for ourselves in serving our clients & we're sorry that this was not met in your interaction with our business.  We strive to be as clear & transparent with itemized pricing on our service envelopes detailing parts, labor & totals along with a detailed description of work to be done as to remove any chance of surprise at pickup.  Regarding your visit, we created two separate envelopes because we provided two different services, one pair of earrings with 18k protector backs & specialty posts & one pair of earrings with 18ky screw posts & screw backs.  On each envelope, we included an in-depth description of parts & labor needed to complete your job along with the total.  Each envelope had a total written & differing totals ($257.10 & $300.70) due to different mechanisms.  We DID obtain your signature on each envelope as acknowledgement & confirmation of the details regarding the services BEFORE we proceeded.  We understand that your complaint is that our 10 yr. sales professional, Santana, did not give you "the grand total verbally".  It is very typical for a client that may want to pick up their services independently from one another, i.e.:  $257.10 one week & the $300.70 the next week.  Although we may have fallen short with "verbally" providing you with the grand total, we were completely transparent with our detailed written description & totals for each signed envelope.  We do value you as a new customer as well as your other family members & hope you will reconsider visiting Jewelry by Design in the future.

name: Leah Smith
text: Wonderful staff and customer service! They are so kind and helpful and want their customers pleased. Beautiful work and jewelry!

resp.text: HI Ms. Smith. Thank you so much for your kind words & sweet review! Thank you for your business & we look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Patty Gleeson
text:
My 1.5 ctw wedding ring was appraised at 1.24 ctw by jbd. My 2 ctw tennis bracelet was appraised by jbd at 1.45 ctw. My 5 ctw aquamarine pendant was appraised by jbd at 3 ctw. No mention of the need to remove stones to receive an accurate appraisal when I brought my pieces in. Needless to say the low carat weights greatly lowered the appraised value of my pieces. The appraisals were finished a week late. No courtesy call to let me know they wouldn't be ready on time. I called multiple times upon the scheduled ready date and after to check in on their progress. I finally
requested that they call when the pieces were ready. Overall an extremely disappointing experience. And unfortunately the appraisals are virtually worthless.

name: Jack Hopkins
text: I brought a newly purchased watch in to be refitted & the experience was first-rate. Met three of the employees & they were extremely friendly & professional. Would definitely recommend them & their service.

resp.text: Thanks so much for kind words!  We appreciate you choosing Jewelry by Design & look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Megan Miller
text:
Walked in with a dream idea and heirloom jewelry and happily now wear a one of a kind engagement ring. They have beautiful jewelry but their custom work, as their name states, is where they can really work some magic and shine! Also, can we talk about their entire staff! Friendly, warm and welcoming, loved the whole experience!
Thank you! -The Brigham's

resp.text: Thank you so much, Megan! :) So thankful we were able to help you with your vision!

name: John Leclair
text: My fiancee and I always use JBD. They are the most professional, kind, and helpful jewelers we have ever had the pleasure of working with. There was a loose stone in her wedding band the day before our wedding and they promptly helped us to get us on the road in time. If you want great service and wonderful quality jewelry, go here!

name: Christopher Ward
text: Quick and easy watch repair

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Ward. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Katherine Haywood
text: This place is wonderful!!! They made a custom kayaking pendant for my mom for mothers day!!! They made it in a timely manner and it is stunning!!! I highly recommend this place!!! Picture quality does not show the amazing job that was done.

name: Margaret Tramell
text: I had a great experience! They were helpful and quick and made sure I was happy.

name: Crystal Landcaster
text: The customer service here is WONDERFUL! I simply cannot speak highly enough of this store! I brought in a family ring I inherited and wanted to melt it down and create a new right hand ring. When I went in, I had absolutely no idea what I wanted it to look like, I just knew I wanted a right hand ring. Other places I have been to, I would walk around and just look to get ideas, and people would get very frustrated with me or just ignore me. When I came into Jewelry by Design, and told them I didn't have any idea of a style I wanted, they were so helpful and patient and were excited to work with me and show me different pieces. It was actually fun working with them! Not to mention, being a part of the entire process and seeing it be created from beginning to end. It also made me feel so much better that they do everything right there in the store, they don't send anything off unlike other places in town. They also scoped my diamond with me to show me how to identify it so I knew it was my same diamond when I got it back. I will always recommend them to everyone! I am always treated like family when I walk in the door, I just love the feeling of a small town "local jeweler" I absolutely LOVE this place!

resp.text: Thank you so much Crystal! We truly enjoyed working with you and are so glad we got to be a part of the memories of your special ring! Creating new designs is our passion and we love to include our customers in the entire process; from beginning to end. We hope you are still enjoying your ring and we highly look forward to seeing you again soon. Thank you so much for the sweet words!

name: Greg K
text: I have purchased several pieces from Jewelry By Design over the past year and a half. I have been extremely satisfied with both the quality of the jewelry, as well as the amazing customer service. One of my purchases was custom made from a sketch. Owners Mark and Tammy are very approachable and helpful with all my questions and needs. I have never felt pressured into a purchase by any of their associates, and I find them all very easy to work with. This is a wonderful local company with an amazing inventory. I highly recommend you drop by to make your next special occasion truly unique. Nothing against the other guys, but I have found the best overall service at Jewelry By Design.

resp.text: Thank you so much Greg! We appreciate you so much. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Michele Irions
text:
My husband and I ordered a ring for our six year old son to give to him on our wedding day. They were able to fit the entire inscription on the ring and it turned out great. The employees were very friendly and worked with us on what we wanted.

The only reason I didn't give this place 5 stars is because it took longer than we were told for the ring to come in. It may not have been something they could have changed and it worked out fine. I was impressed with this place overall.

name: Tammie Hill
text: I went in to repurpose a ring that was passed down to me.  I’m beyond thrilled with the setting that will now hold the stones from the passed down ring.  The staff, Kelsey, was an amazing help.  She had great ideas and made sure that I got just what I wanted.  I can’t wait to get the finished product so I can post pictures of it.  Thank Jewelry By Design!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Hill! We truly enjoyed working with you on your beautiful ring and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Carleen Amadio
text:
I know I came to the right jewelry store after I walked in and had my meeting with Zachary. Saying I was totally blown away by the time I left is putting it mildly!! Zac, Thank you for all your help during our meeting last week and how you handled in all my needs from the mechanical watches that needed repairs, to the numerous sterling silver rings, bracelet that needed to be fixed, enlarged and one needing a stone replaced in one ring, to creations you will be designing for me with the 5 Ruby Zoeite Stone pendants for my Daughter and 2 Sister and myself to be created, to the ring and pendant with the Alexandrite (raw and cut) stones I brought in, that will be done in rose gold.
Sending you the photos of the wedding rings I have in storage, that will be recreated for me with chocolate and diamonds awaiting for me to see the design.
And finally to the 3 strands of pearls and raw black coral to create a 3 to 4 strand necklace that Santana will be doing for me!! Let your creativity fly, and looking forward to seeing you soon. Thanks again for today!! I have found the perfect jeweler for all my future needs. The possibilities are so endless and there s more to come and could not be happier with spending over 4 hours going over everything with you!
Saying incredible is an understatement!! If anyone is looking for one of a kind jewelry, “Jewelry By Design” is the company to go to and you will not regret coming here! I walked away feeling absolutely confident I made the right choice! Definitely a company you can trust! Can’t wait to be dazzled by what you’re making for me and repairing for me! Outstanding Customer Service 100%!!

Carleen Amadio

name: Christy Hines
text: I have the first ring they did with the AU design on it and it is beautiful!!  My mother used her engagement diamond from my father and gave it to me for Christmas.  I have had many compliments on it and I absolutely love it!  I have also purchased AU inspired earrings to give as gifts and both recipients loved them!

resp.text: We are so happy you love your ring! It is a one of a kind! Thank you for coming back to see us!

name: Andrew Eiland
text: This place is fantastic! From start to finish, my fiancee and I loved our experience. The jeweler was able to take multiple antique family rings and create a beautiful engagement ring for her. We also both bought our wedding bands from them, and the advice and expertise was very helpful. 10/10 for sure!

resp.text: Thanks for letting JBD create such a beautiful and special piece! We look forward to being your jeweler for years to come! Congratulations!

name: Rachel Daniel
text: The staff at Jewelry by Design are so nice and helpful !!! This place is where you need to go for one of a kind type of pieces.  I love their unique styles that is different from most places that all carry the same line of jewelry.  I will be going very soon to get something special made and from what I have seen and hear they are WONDERFUL at working with you on these types of things to make it just perfect....I am for sure a permanent customer :-)

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Rachel! We are so happy to have you as a customer and we have truly enjoyed working with you! We hope to see you back again soon! :)

name: Stan Fuller

name: Alex Vroom
text: I am not a person that typically writes negative reviews but this was an experience that had to be shared. I walked into Jewelry by Design with my custom made, one of a kind engagement ring. It has 4 bands that meet in the back. My engagement ring had cracked where the bands meet and one of the bands had broken off. I still don’t know how it happened but I was devastated so I took it in to get it repaired. I took it to Jewelry by Design because of all the great reviews and because the original jeweler was now retired. When I took it in, the service was great and I also asked to resize down 1/4 size because it had been fitting loosely. My first indication that something wasn’t right should have been when they didn’t check to see if they agreed that I needed it resized. When I came back for my ring, I could no longer put it on my finger after only going down a 1/4 size and they had bent the bands causing the halo for the diamond to be out of place. It no longer looked like the same ring and the setting for the diamond was crooked. I went back to them the next day and explained that I believed somewhere in the resizing process/repair that some of the bands looked a little out of place and asked if they would be able to fix it. I also brought a picture of the ring to show how it looked originally. The jeweler at this point was incredibly rude and even asked if the picture was of the same ring. I then explained to him that it was and stated again that this was a one of a kind ring and that it did not look like the picture and also didn’t fit. He then proceeded to tell me that I had not needed to get it resized in the first place and didn’t understand why I had gotten it resized. He also said that he had only done work in the back so anything that was messed up in the front was not his doing. He walked away at this point and his sales rep picked up the conversation asking if we wanted it resized. I said yes and that I would like it fixed to look like the picture. She relunctantly asked me to send the picture to the store email. I was charged more for the resizing than I had been originally and they told me it would take a week to resize it. I should have at this point taken it elsewhere but I wanted to give them a chance to fix their mistake. A week later I got a call in which the jeweler said that he had gotten it “as close as humanly possible to the picture.” He also said that the ring was unstable and that it needed additional structural support insinuating that it was poorly designed. My fiancé picked up the ring and much to our disappointment and frustration it looked nothing like the picture. The 4 bands had originally been crossing and now they were parallel to each other. On top of that they removed the 14k gold stamp from the inside of the band. I hope that doesn't mean that they used some other metal when they resized it. I don’t know how he thought that it looked like the picture. I have shown several friends and family members the before pictures and what it looks like now and they all agree that it’s not even close. To make matters worse he added tacks to the ring saughtering the bands together. This was not part of the original design nor had we asked for it and he never called to ask before he modified the ring. The jeweler was again very rude to my fiancé when he picked up the ring making comments about how the design was unstable and insinuated the damage to the ring had been some how done by my fiancé between leaving the store and giving it back to me 10 minutes later. We believe that our poor treatment was due to our college age and that the piece was from another jeweler. The jeweler who had created our ring had designed most of my family’s engagement rings, had been in business as a family for over 80 years, and was highly respected as a master jeweler for his unique design and pieces. So to anyone who has jewelry designed by another jewler or who is young do not go to this establishment because they are extremely arrogant and have no respect for you or your jewelry.

name: James Gwin
text:
SEE SARAH FOR PIERCINGS!!
Sarah has been piercing me for 10 years. The only time I have ever used anyone else is when she took a short break to finish college.
The very first piercings Sarah did for me were my nipples. I was very nervous because I had always been told how painful male nipple piercings, but Sarah made me feel calm and relaxed by assuring me that it was worse in my head, the piercings were a little painful but nothing like I thought it would be. She did such an amazing job, so I've recommended her to everyone. She is always very professional, nice, gentle, and most important quick with a needle.
Since then, Sarah has also pierced my industrial, several other cartilage piercings, 6 Frenums, and my lobes using 6 gauge tunnels. The most recent piercings she did were both of my daiths for migraine relief; the first time in 7 years I have been migraine free for 3 months!!!
Every piercing she has ever done on me has healed perfectly and I have made sure to follow her aftercare instructions to the letter.
However while she was on break I went to 2 different shops nearby for piercings, one with a female piercer and one with a mail piercer/tattoo artist. I had a standard cartilage piercing done by the female piercer. She (along with staff at that shop) was very rude, charged almost double the price, offered no aftercare, insisted on using a ring instead of the bar like I was accustomed to, and told me they were using titanium jewelry.
I used the same aftercare that I've always used but the constant movement of the ring caused my ear to become so infected that I lost 2 completely healed piercings in that ear also. Later I found out that the jewelry they used was not titanium at all (not even titanium coated), it wasn't even nickel and lead tested surgical steel! When I went to the male piercer/tattoo artist's shop the place so sketchy and he was such a jerk that I left immediately.
I WILL NEVER LET ANYONE BUT SARAH PIERCE ME AGAIN. Thank you so much for all of your amazing work.

name: Patricia Jordan
text: I went to see Rick with some old jewelry I no longer wore & some rings passed down to me that I knew I'd never wear. I explained I have never worn a specific wedding band because over the years I've never found one that I adored enough to wear every day. Most look "typical" and I've happily worn the few pretty ones I've collected. I didn't know what I wanted,  I just knew what I didn't want. After a couple of discussions, Rick helped me realize, I had a ring from years ago that meant everything to me... the first ring my husband ever gave me. He suggested we "create" that same ring but with more of a commitment look. I couldn't be happier with the result. I had tears in my eyes when he handed it to me! Who knew the little ring I was given as a promise of hope from the beginning would mature into a lifelong dream that I can someday pass on to our only daughter!! Thank you so much for your patience and ability to realize what I really wanted all along!! I can't keep looking at it and smiling!!!! ❤

Thank you Jenny for the kind words
We love our customers and we love what we do and that makes it easy to do a good job..

name: kimberly hurst
text: Excellent customer service! I love my custom ring made from a picture. My family has made many purchases here and we love the selection of antique, one-of-a kind pieces. This is a great place to shop and buy jewelry!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and we love what we do and we love our customers that makes it easy to do a good job

name: Joey Johns
text: WONDERFUL STORE , SOME  EXTRAORDINARY PIECES OF JEWELRY AND A GREAT FRIENDLY STAFF! I WILL DEFINITELY BE DOING MORE BUSINESS IN THE FUTURE!

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind words
We love what we do and we love our customers too
That makes it easy to do a good job

name: Ryan Dix
text: Over a holiday weekend, I was able to meet with the owner and get my tungsten wedding band removed from my swollen finger. He was timely and good natured and was not critical of me at all. When I'm able to replace my wedding band, I will most certainly be using Cloverdale.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words
We love what we do and we love our customers too.

name: Vince Thomas
text: I've been to a lot of jewelry stores, and lot's of times the stuff looks all the same. Not at Cloverdale Jewelers! They have some very unique pieces in their store. If your in the market for jewelry that is beautiful and unique, please come see Rick! He's a great guy!!

resp.text: Thank you Vince for the kind words..  We love our customers and we love seeing them smile...

name: D G
text: My husband and I went to this store today and they have the most beautiful jewelry! The owner was so nice!! We bought a beautiful diamond and sapphire ring! I absolutely love it!! We will definitely be back!!

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind words
We love what we do and we love our customers too

name: Missy Clemmons
text: My husband had his ring resized. The quality of work was top notch. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience.  Very professional and friendly. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and we love what we do and that makes it easy to do a good job thank you for your business.

name: Tony Montgomery
text: This is one of the best places to get new jewelry or to get your jewelry repaired. We’ve taken multiple rings to be fixed and they look perfect each time. Highly recommend and the turn around is super fast also.

resp.text: Tony, Thank you for your kind words. We love our customers and love what we do. Thank you for your trust and your business

name: Lucy Bradshaw
text: Met Rick for the first time about a week ago. He was recommended to me regarding evaluation of some jewelry.  He was great & thorough and a pleasure to work with.  I would highly recommend Cloverdale Jewelers.  They are the best!  Thanks Rick👍😀

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review. We love what we do and we love our customers too. That makes it easy to do a good job.

name: Andrew delaney
text: Really friendly staff. Fixed my necklace for a good price. Thanks again.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We love our customers and love what we do. Thank you for your trust and your business

name: Elizabeth Peters
text: Dropped my wedding band off to get sized and got it back the next day!! I haven't been able to wear it in months and now I finally able too look married and not engaged!

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind words
We love what we do and we love our customers too

name: Debra Anthony
text: Awesome place!! I needed a link removed from my watch and my ring sized down. Services were rendered the same day in about an hour at reasonable rates.I Will definitely make this my go to store! The owner and staff were extremely friendly and courteous. Stop by, they have beautiful pieces as well.

resp.text: Thank you Debra for your kind words and 5 Stars... We love what we do and love our customers too. That males it real easy to do a good job. We love seeing them smile. If our customers are happy, we are happy.

name: Danielle Brisson
text: Just got engaged and needed to size my ring down... being newly engaged and very excited, I was hoping it wouldn't take longer than a few days. Cloverdale Jewelers took less than 30 minutes, super friendly and easy transaction. Highly recommend.

resp.text:
Danielle, It was my pleasure to help you out. You were wonderful to work with and that makes it easy to do a great job.
We love our customers and we love what we do...
Thank you for allowing Cloverdale Jewelers in Millbrook, Al. to be part of this special event in your life.

name: katie corley
text: We brought an old family watch in to have it repaired and were Very happy with his fast turnaround. Other shops wanted to send it off and take around 2-3. But he was able to do it in shop, just in time for Fathers Day! I absolutely recommend them. Great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you Katie for the great review. We love what we do and we love our customers too, that makes it easy to do a good job.

name: Danny S
text: I know this is a jewelry dealer, but on google it says they also repair watches. I have an automatic Seiko 5 that was dropped and stopped ticking. Rick, fixed it in less than 5 minutes and the price was very reasonable. Rick was very kind and courteous. Great job!  Keep it up.

resp.text:
Thank You Danny...
We like what we do so it is easy to do a good job.
Our goal is to meet and exceed our customers expectations and that is easy to do because we love our customers and treat them like family... So gald your visit to Cloverdale Jewelers was enjoyable.
Warmest regards,
Rick

name: Vanessa Salter
text: Had a ring that needed to be sized.... had it back within a day or so... perfect fit and it looks better and feels better than I imagined!!! Rick done an excellent job. Will b going back for any other purchases or repairs!

resp.text: Vanessa, Thank you for the kind words. We love what we do and we love our customers and do our best to exceed their expectations..   Thank you again

name: Kathy Kelley
text: Honest jeweler with knowledge and skills. Not your usual jewelry store.  Friendly place with many one of a kind pieces of jewelry. Or let Rick make you something just for you.

resp.text:
Thank you Kathy for the kind words.
At Cloverdale Jewelers the customer comes first whether it's a watch battery or a diamond ring they all get our personal attention and the best in customer service.
We love all of our customers and provide them the best prices and service available.
Warmest regards.
Rick

name: Alene Reid
text: We are so blessed to have Old Cloverdale Jewelry in Millbrook! Rick is the absolute best at repairs and designs. He has a huge selection of beautiful jewelry at the best prices! Rick and Kathy are sweet people and want to help you select that perfect piece! Proud to call them friends of mine!❤️️

resp.text: Alene, Wonderful customers like you make it worth being in the business. Thank you for the great review. It's easy to do things well when it is what you love to do.

name: Shea Jackson
text: I went in today to get several rings repaired and one was repaired while I waited! Very reasonably priced and Rick was very helpful and  attentive to our needs and answered all our novice questions without making us feel insecure for asking them! I have already made a wish list and will surely be shopping there again! I also like the fact that he's open on Saturday which is very helpful to those of us that work during the week! I highly recommend Cloverdale Jewelers!  Check them out for yourself!  You're welcome!

resp.text:
Shea,
Thank you for the kind words.
Please know that we appreciate each and every one of our customers and value that they came to Cloverdale Jewelers for their purchase or repairs.
We do love all of our customers and want to be their personal jeweler in every way.
Thank you again for allowing Cloverdale Jewelers to serve you. Come see us again soon.
Warmest regards,
Rick

name: Igor B
text: Rick Bales is an experienced professional, who will give every customer the time and service they are entitled to. Whether you are looking to buy, sell, get a resizing, or appraisal, Rick and Kathy will not rest until the customer is well-informed, and most importantly, satisfied. Ever since I found this gem-of-a-store, I don't go anywhere else.  Thanks for all the hard work over the years, and I look forward to seeing you next time

resp.text: We love our customers and do everything we can to make their experience at Cloverdale Jewelers the best possible Rick "Owner" at Cloverdale Jewelers

name: Rachel Pugh
text: Rick is fantastic! He sized my wedding band exactly how I wanted it done, he is quick on getting it back to you as well! I will use him as long as he is living! He is such a sweet man. Call him today, you will not be disappointed!

resp.text:
Thank you Rachel for recommending Cloverdale Jewelers. We love what we do. We love our customers and do our very best to provide service above our customers expectations at a reasonable price with quality guaranteed. Customers like you make all the work worthwhile...
Rick Bailes

name: Jerry Myer
text: Awesome place to get your jewelry fixed. Took seconds and it was so cheap! Got a broke necklace? Go here first!

resp.text:
Hi Jerry, Thank you for the kind words...
It was just a small repair and I do not try to make a days pay on a small job.
I try to treat folks the same way I would want to be treated.
We at Cloverdale Jewelers love our customers and love what we do. That makes it easy to do a good job.
Rick Bailes

name: Nita Linneman
text: Rick was nice kind polite and just a fun experience.  He is "home folks." He changed the battery on my Fossil watch..very reasonable cost  its great we have such a Jewler here in Millbrook.  No more going to Montgomery.

resp.text: Thank you Nita for the kind words. We love our customers and we love what we do and that makes it easy to do a great job.

name: Sandra Norris
text: Amazing customer service, has beautiful vintage jewelry with the best prices! Will definitely be shopping with them often.

resp.text:
Thank you Sandra for recommending Cloverdale Jewelers in Millbrook, Al.
We make the providing best customer service and affordable pricing on all of our New, One Of A Kind Antique and Vintage Jewelry our goal. We would like our customers to have a "GREAT" shopping experience whether it's a custom designed ring, an insurance appraisal or just getting a watch battery.
Warmest regards,
Rick

name: Rick Bailes
text: Cloverdale Jewelers is a Great jewelry store. Prompt courteous friendly service, the very best at watch and jewelry repairs...

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We love all of our customers

text: In and out for quick repair and did great!

Thank you Tony for the kind words.
We love our customers and do everything we can to make their experience at Cloverdale Jewelers the best possible
Rick "Owner" at Cloverdale Jewelers

name: Janie Johnston

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and for shopping our store. We love our customers and what we do.

resp.text: Robert, Thank you for the review. We always try our best to meet and exceed our customers expectations. We love what we do and love all of our customers too..

name: Bob Frick
text: Great service!

resp.text: We love our customers and do everything we can to make their experience at Cloverdale Jewelers the best possible Rick "Owner" at Cloverdale Jewelers

Thank you Sonnie... You know we love what we do and love our customers too.
Seeing our customers smile makes what we do the easiest, best and most rewarding job around.
Thank you again for the kind words. Love ya, Rick and Kathy

name: Toni Duplantis
text: My husband purchased a pair of emerald earrings that fell apart the third time wearing. Then they replaced, but with a lower  quality emeralds. It would seem that they should have used the better stones, but they didn’t.

name: Cassandra Myers
text: I always receive a warm welcome from the Jared team members. My jewelry consultant Jessica is always engaging, thoughtful and ensures that I have a positive experience.

name: Willie Rhodes
text: From the bottom of my ❤️ I want to give a HUGE!!!! Thumbs up and Hugs to Thomas Blais and the entire staff at Jared’s. When I tell you Thomas Blais had my wife smiling through her mask 😷 I was sold. Now I truly understand why he went to Jared. Thanks 🙏 again for all your help.

name: Robin Michelle Young
text: I just have to say what an amazing experience.  Thank you so much Trixie and Genevieve for taking time and paying attention to the little things.  I was a bit upset to find that the original ring I had ordered for my husband was not in stock in his size, resizing was not an option due to it being an online purchase.  These amazing ladies calmed me right down and showed me some gorgeous rings, turned a stressful situation into a very happy one.  Little did I know that I would fall in love with the rings that Genevieve showed me.  She has an artists eye for detail.  I described my husband and myself to her and she worked Magix by creating the perfect combination of rings for us.  I couldn't be happier and they are so much more beautiful than my original choices.  Trixie, your customer service was impeccable.  I can't thank you enough.  The two of you created an amazing dynamic that made sorting out an issue into a wonderful memory.  Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

name: Patty Robertson
text: Overall, my husband and I have had a pleasant experience with the staff at Jareds. They have beautiful jewelry. The ladies that work in sales are very pleasant, nice, and helpful. They always are very friendly toward us and really pay attention to what we are looking for when making important purchases. We have always had a great experience when purchasing jewelry from Jareds.

name: Lisa Miller
text: Robin and Kayla were so nice and helpful . They are both true Assets to Jared's

name: Kendell Lewis
text: Thank you to Trixie for making my current wedding ring what I envisioned. She helped me locate two bands that would serve as a guard to my engagement ring that was purchased several years ago. She found exactly what I wanted within my budget and arranged for them to be made into the ring as one piece. The whole process was super easy and the finish product is completely amazing.

name: Tim Richardson
text: Fixed my wife's watch and cleaned her jewelry while we waited.  Also made 2 other purchases while we were there.  Very helpful and friendly.

name: Tyler Thomas
text: The staff here are amazing

name: Erica Hughes
text: I just received my ring from the third time it has had to be repaired (each time was due to an error on their side) and the wedding band is not straight and both rings were not sized correctly. I haven’t had the opportunity to wear my ring since March due to covid and not having a repair tech and then being super backed up... and I understand all of that.. I’m patient. But what I can’t understand is how they can drop the ball so much on something that means so much to me. Would not recommend.

name: mike Bray
text: Liz is the best. She went above and beyond.  Ask for her.

name: Quamaine Hawkins
text:
Kayla is the bombbbbbbb she went over and beyond to get my wife and I what we wanted today!
Thanks Kayla

name: doug p
text:
Great selection of Beautiful crafted jewelry.  Great professionals who help you find what you're looking for.
Don't waste your time going anywhere else.
Take her to Jareds.

name: James Fondren
text: Very nice salespeople good selections and pricing.

name: Bernadette Lovetere
text: My husband and I came in specifically to find titanium wedding bands and their salesman Henry was amazing!! Prices were fantastic also!! 5/5 👌

name: Erika
text: Been waiting for months to do this review. Back in July or August I walked into Jared with my old wedding ring guard from my first marriage with hopes of designing something special for my daughter. Henry Darnell was wonderful in helping me design the best look with the diamonds I had in the ring. Today I was able to finally give the gift to my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loved it!!! Thank you Henry and all who helped at Jared for such a wonderful experience.

name: Terri Carmack
text: We really enjoy coming inand purchasing jewelry here. It is always a top notch service. Prompt, friendly, and courteous. We rely on the knowledge of our sales people and we enjoy working with each and everyone in our selection of our favorite pieces. Thanks Jared!

name: Josh Harrison
text: They are EXTREMELY pushy about getting their warranty plans, to the point that the salesman lied to me about what was covered (I had to look it up on Jared's website to find out), and that they added the warranty to our purchase without telling me (after we declined it) so I had to go back and get a refund.

name: Haley Alonso
text: My now fiancé worked with Elizabeth to get my ring ordered (vera wang wedding set in size 7) and he also bought his wedding band that they altered to fit him (size 15) with no issues. All the ladies were amazing and nice for us. Would most definitely use them again!

name: Amazing Renee
text: I have shopped for all my Jewelery needs and wants for over 20 years at Jared’s. I have always gotten the 5 star treatment whether it was a huge purchase or a simple repair. Yes, SHE takes him to Jared!!!!!!!!!!!!♥️♥️♥️♥️

name: J Wells
text: Very helpful staff! Jessica Langley was my associate and she went above and beyond to meet my expectations!

name: Olive Dykes
text: It sus so grate

name: Samantha Ferguson
text: My boyfriend and I had a fantastic experience at the Jared Mobile location. Henry greeted us right at the door, worked with our budget, and created the most beautiful ring for us. Customer service was amazing. I’d recommend this location and the associate Henry Darnell to anyone. Can’t say enough how truly great the experience was :).

name: Renee Broomfield
text: I drove from Mississippi to purchase a item that was being held for me, but the sales people were not able to find it. Very disappointed. Complete waste of time and gas. The sale person seemed unconcerned and uncaring. I did telephone the manager but have yet to receive any feedback.

name: Allyson
text: Horrible experience! My brother ordered a custom wedding band and they sent the wrong one! He asked about ordering a new one and was told it wouldn’t be here until October (wedding is in September). When a refund was requested, they were extremely rude and unprofessional

name: Amanda Wiley
text: I am fairly new to the Jared family! My now husband bought my engagement ring from Jared and we just couldn't help falling in love with the wonderful staff! Thank you again Trixie and Robin we will always be grateful for the long hours you have given us to ensure that we were truly happy with every piece we receive.

name: katherine bagley
text: Did a wonderful job set the my 5 ct aquamarine into a ring. And when I took it in to get it cleaned they noticed it was loose and tightened it up.  The staff is friendly and very helpful

name: Carol Hunt
text: I purchased a ring, Pandora bracelet and charms and couldn't have been happier with the quality of the jewelry or with the staff. Jessica and Elizabeth were helpful, professional and even though I wasn't planning on purchasing at the time they found things I couldn't resist. They took time to actually talk to me to see what I might like. In the day and age of little to no customer service it was a pleasure to go to a store that is focused on it. I will definitely return to this Jared's for all my jewelry needs.

name: Joy Salas
text: The mobile store has amazing people who are very attentive to their customers. My husband and I have been using Jared’s for our main jewelers for years. The general manager here as well as all of the consultants know their customers by name and are always pleasant. Looking for beautiful and affordable jewelry that you know is real this is the place to go!

name: Pamela Biggs
text: I love this store!  The people are so friendly and take time to show you items. I have made 2 purchases there so far and will be back. Definitely go there if you are looking for jewelry!

name: William Martin
text: This is the best jewelry store I have been to in my twenty years of fine jewelry shopping. I was treated as if I was shopping without a budget. There was no rushing or hurrying. They took their time to show me pieces and made sure that I was happy with my selection. I was so happy with the service I took in my wife’s ring she was left by her mom to have it repaired and resized. It was fixed and looks brand new! The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly! This is the only place I will shop for jewelry from now on!

name: Brandi Robinson
text:
My husband and I went to Jarrods’s in Mobile Thursday to buy our granddaughter a pair of earrings for her birthday. The party was on Sunday. Jessica, our sales person, said we don’t have them in this store but let me call another and see if they have them. They did!!! Great!!!! She said they will be overnighted to Mobile store . Plenty of time to get them for the birthday party. Called Friday, did not come in. That’s fine, a truck comes in Saturday and Sunday. We call Saturday. Still hasn’t come in. I call back and ask them to track them. Jessica says it’s not on ‘her’ it’s on the other store that was overnighting them. What?!? I ask her to please follow up and ca them. Ask them what’s going on, have they been sent, can they track them ...
Jessica never bothered calling back.
Poor little grand baby did not get her earrings for her birthday. Thanks a lot Jessica !!!! For not doing your job.

name: Kristin McCarron
text: The location is awesome! Customer service is the best! They were so willing to go out of the way to help me find exactly what I was looking for! I will be sure to shop here for every occasion!

name: Tyler Thomas
text: HANDS DOWN the best customer service! My husband and I went in to look for new wedding bands, and from the moment we stepped foot in the door we were greeted with warm welcomes by the staff. Trixie, Jessica, and Henry to be specific. These employees know what they are doing and know how to make a customer feel comfortable going through such a large purchase. I highly recommend this location and the above mentioned employees.

name: Bethany Heathcock
text: The employees were so nice and very willing to help. They dont discriminate either because i walk inside in very simple clothes. They are very helpful.

name: Shey Thorn
text: This was the absolute best experience in Jewlery shopping in my life. We started off coming in on Monday, when we were greeted by the whole staff and had our sale taken over by Henry. Henry was extremely kind and listened to everything we wanted, we viewed some stunning Men's rings, but decided to sleep on the purchase decision and make our minds up the next day. We came back in today, Tuesday, and we were greeted by Jessica, once again extremely kind and helpful, who helped us complete our sale. Throughout our stress free, easy process we were offered water by the GM, Trixie. She chatted with us about her amazing jewelry endeavors and made us feel right at home as we were completing our purchase. We are still in shock at the OUT OF THIS WORLD INCREDIBLE service we received. We can't wait to continue shopping with Jared, and we look forward to the amazing new selection of items coming within the next months!! Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

name: Michael Vanden Heuvel
text: I've never been to any jewelry store in my life. I wanted to propose to my girlfriend, now fiance, and I knew the ring had to be spectacular. I stopped here on a whim for the sake of comparing prices to the other stores in the area. To be frank, I never saw those other stores. After a single visit at this location I was won over by their customer service, products, and in-store repair shop. As soon as I walked in the door I was greeted by Elizabeth Herboso. She was incredibly helpful and really knew her stuff. She helped me every step of the way and made the entire process from beginning to end very smooth, easing my mind any time I became unsure. But most of all she was very friendly and genuinely enthusiastic about getting the exact right ring for me and my bride-to-be. I couldn't have asked for a better first experience and I will most definitely be returning for future purchases.

name: Joe LeNoir
text: I purchased a Tag Heuer F1 watch for my birthday present to myself. The lady who helped me with my purchase was fantastic. Her name was Elizabeth I believe. I got it home and ended up being unhappy with the watch. I googled their return policy and read one after another terrible reviews about their sales persons attitude about returns. So, naturally I expected to have a hard time. Once I got there, I spoke with Karen, the manager very briefly about my issues with the watch. She apologized several times and immediately refunded my money. The process took less than 10 minutes. All in all I was/am very very satisfied with Elizabeth/Karen/Jared! They are great and I highly recommend them. Ill definitely be back to purchase other pieces of jewelry.

name: Robert Turner
text: The protocol to getting the store is ridiculous and the lady working in the store was rude.

name: Brittany Vickers
text: Walked in wanting to upgrade my diamond in my engagement ring. Was immediately greeted and that was it. There 20 min and not helped. Walked out and will never return.

name: William Schenher
text: Kayla helped me and was awsome. She got me in and out fast. Great service. Great salesperson!

name: Sheila Haviland
text: My fiance and I met with Jessica. I told her what I was looking for and she picked out several setting for me.  Found the one I loved and we left keeping that ring in mind.  Visited 2 other jewelers only to return to Jareds. I did change my mind and decided on a cushion cut over a round diamond. She picked out  an almost flawless stone. The setting was white gold and we wanted platinum so they have to make a new setting and the gallery was to small for the stone so they will make the gallery to fit the stone. Awesone service, knowledgeable staff, friendly while being professional, treated us like family. Can't wait to see the end product , another 5-6 weeks. My fiance was pleased with the service  and their attention to details, and that says alot . I have since ordered his platinun wedding band waiting for it to arrive next week

name: WB Spencer
text: Bought my son a Tag Heuer watch for his 16th birthday.  Very helpful staff and helped me pick out the right one for our budget.  I had never shopped a "chain" jewelry store before and was pleasantly surprised.  Will definitely go back here for any future watch or jewelry purchases!

name: Derek Scarbrough
text: Without a doubt the Manager and the staff are the nicest and most helpful you can find. Have bought several items from the mobile store and will continue to do all of my jewelry shopping there.

name: JaCoiya Hall
text: The staff here is unbelievable!  They have become like family .. Everyone is very knowledgeable and sooo inviting .. I find myself in there for at least an hour after getting my jewelry cleaned just chit chatting. .You have to visit this store!!

name: Crystal Hinds
text: WARNING: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM HERE! My husband bought me a necklace we decided to return. He paid cash. The manager informed him they do not have enough of cash in the store (only $420) and they could mail us a check that would take 10 days to receive or they would call us once they have enough of cash onsite. This seems completely inconceivable and absolutely ridiculous to me that a nationwide store could legally operate like this. I’ve never in my life. And we will never, ever shop there again.

name: Christin Lisenby
text: I was shocked to find this location rated a 1 star! Thomas and his team have treated me like family since my first visit in December 2016! They have gone above and beyond and I enjoy doing business with people who put the customer first and are so professional! I rarely leave reviews, but felt the need when seeing one persons negative experience, causing so much damage to this business.... Great job guys! I'm a BIG FAN!!!  Christin

name: Hanna Love
text: The Manager Trixie has a very unpleasant attitude towards her co-worker. I seen her completely ignore a girl in a lab coat because she was doing something on the computer. I seen the girl talking to her and she didn’t even acknowledge her. How can you manage a team and treat them like that. I will not be coming back here. Sorry attitude I did not like. The girl was very kind to her. I had Henry help me with my Ever Us ring and I will recommend friends to see him. I also seen employees standing around talking loud so inapproiate.

name: Kia Sheridan
text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience! Emma the salesperson was an absolute doll!

name: The Chambers
text: Always a pleasure doing business their longtime customer

name: Cameron Blake
text: My boyfriend bought me a pair of earrings ($620)which I couldn't have at the time due to circumstances.  So a full refund sounds simple right? wrong. Upon visiting the location  throughout the day only to still be told that they (Jared) didn't have enough cash which sounds silly actually. While being within our 30 day period. This location is very bad as far as customer satisfaction. Both the Black woman and old slim Caucasian woman should seek for another occupation. I was told that night there's another Jared's in Pensacola so I asked well did you call that store to see if they had the amount of cash? basically she informed me that she doesn't have common sense. You wouldn't want to do business with someone who is incompetent would you?

name: Courtney Pemberton
text: Terrible experience. They did not deliver what they had promised, but rather a ring that had bad welds and a crooked diamond. And returning it was a nightmare, they did not refund all the money until we came back a second time. More like a galleria of incompetency.

name: John Wilson
text:
The store is very clean the people that I have dealt with inside are extremely nice and professional however their customer service department is a complete pile of crap. I have a credit card through their Genesis Bank. I was made to put a deposit down when I bought something I was also told that every time I buy something I have to put a deposit down. When I call Genesis they told me that even if I have an available credit limit they run and check your credit every time you purchase something and if they feel like not approving it for whatever reason they will not approve it even though you have available credit on your card they've already given you. I was not happy with that so I called Jared customer service and what I was basically told was we do not control the credit cards are banks policy is our bank's policy if you have a problem with it call them..
I'm 55 years old I think credit cards from different jewelry companies different clothing stores and all other places. When you give me a credit card I expected to be a credit card you don't walk into JCPenney's buy $500 worth of clothes and have to give them $60 in advance you swipe your card you sign your paper and you leave.. what Jared is doing is not giving customers credit cards there financing the jewelry like you with your car or your house but they don't tell you that upfront.. so even though the people and the three different Jared stores that I've been to have been very professional and very nice because of your business practices you guys suck. I will pay the balance off of my card cut it up and never do business with you again..

name: Kim Newman
text: My husband bought me a $2,500 cross necklace as a gift.  The chain was too short, he went back to swap it for a longer chain.  They wanted to give him a $15 credit for the chain and sell him a $150 chain. Really???  So your chains are only worth $15 and you sell them for $150?!!  Crooks! Take my advice NEVER shop at Jared!

name: Kailey Morgan
text: That's really make miracles happen here I love it

name: Jurone Daniels
text: Very friendly staff

name: Bama P
text: Horrible. Bought a ring and had to bring it in constantly for repairs. Whoever works on the jewelry must have gotten their certification from bishop state or something. Yea

name: Laporcha Richardson

Most of all, she was very professional and helpful with my purchase.

I will always return to Kay's for the quality service I received.

text: My daughter ordered a heart beat necklace and ring on May 3rd, as of yesterday June 26th I received the necklace but no ring. The clasp on the necklace is broken and I can’t get any one to answer the phone at the local office.

name: Rayshundra Davis
text: Great Customer Service.  Friendly staff and willing to help anyone that comes in. They take the time to get to know you and what your needs or desires are. Whenever I've encountered an issue, they took the time to try to solve the problem.  I always feel valued when I'm there.

text: Sent wedding ring in for cleaning, check prongs in setting and replace lost side diamond.  My ring came back on time, and it was beautiful and immaculate.  Service was great and personnel very helpful.  My Father had his watch repaired here, and he received great service also.

text: Was in recently and bought some earrings. Hannah is who helped us and she was very nice and knowledgeable. We had a great experience.

text: I have purchased jewelry and had repairs from this location. The service was excellent. I would definitely recommend this location to anyone. Never had any problems!!

text: One of the best salesman ever, he took his time with me, he showed me exactly what I wanted to see, & answered all my questions.

text: High quality jewelry with reasonable prices.  Friendly staff. Manager extremely helpful and patient.

text: My engagement ring was supposed to be sent to Virginia by a week ago, in a 6 prong setting. They haven't even started on it and it's 2 weeks later. I won't see my boyfriend again till the wedding. They ordered a 5 prong setting in white gold instead of yellow gold. They promised us again it'd be here by the 9th, we contacted them again and they said the repair shop still hasn't even gotten the part or promised to ship it. We just want the ring back. We don't even want the ring fixed by them. Kay's is awful! Do not trust them!

name: Sherri Beck
text: They sales rep was absolutely remarkable they make you feel like they have known forever and work with you with a smile even if you are undecided and take awhile to make your own choices they do not rush you or make you feel as though you are taking up their time and they work with you till you find that perfect ring that says we will lol thank you Kay Airport Blvd Bell Air Mall I love my Wedding set your staff is the best oh and it doesn't matter what your budget amount is you will leave there with what you came for and in your price range and very satisfied thanks again

name: Hope Fulton
text: I got the ring and it immediately had to be sent in for three weeks to be sized. It was sent back to me with one of the stones chipped, and then a different stone fell out of it a few weeks later. I took it in to have both stones replaced. It was gone for three weeks and was sent back to me with two stones chipped. They had to damage it out and give me a new one which was sent out for three weeks to be sized. I went to pick it up on the 'promise date' and at first they told me they lost it, but then they said it hadn't even been shipped out from their store to be sized until the day after I was supposed to pick it up. Throughout all of this Debbie has been extremely rude when I go in to the store. This whole experience has been a nightmare and I will never shop with Kay again.

name: Robert Stout
text: Sami  gives first class service

name: Heather Bankester
text:
I sent my ring off to get sized. They said it would take 10 days and would be due back April 23. I called that morning and they proceed to tell me they do not get shipments on the weekends, but it should be here Monday. So I called again Monday morning and they told me the sizing company was running behind and it wouldn't be here until Wednesday!
Now, I'm due to leave out of town for 10 days and I will not have my engagement ring! I am very disappointed.

Their workmanship on this repair is a work of art in itself.  The ring has never looked better.

We will be customers of B&B Jewelers from now on.  They are knowledgeable, helpful and very nice people to deal with.

name: Tracy Hayes
text: Wanted to replace a necklace pendant stolen from my sister 20 years ago. Been hoping to for years. They now have the technology. Did an excellent job. She cried when she got it.

I highly recommend their team.

text: I have purchased several pieces of quality jewelry at B & B Jewelers over several years. I have recommended them to many of my friends as a good source for their jewelry purchases and service.

text: Quick and friendly service! I had my wedding set resized there and would definitely recommend.

text: I have used B&B Jewelers as my jewelers to repair rings, earring, to create engagement rings for our daughters and nieces, create earrings for my Mom,  to purchase estate jewelry pieces that are a great value and unique and have always had my expectations exceeded with the service they provided.  I trust them with all of my jewelry needs and have found them to be honest and very fair. I highly recommend Tim and his staff.

name: Julie Long
text: My husband bought my engagement and wedding rings here in February. I took them in to have them welded together last week. On both occasions  we received exceptional customer service. Would recommend them to all my friends and family.

name: Denise Jett
text: Extremely poor customer service.  My husband bought my wedding rings, not sure why in the first place,  at B&B and was told they do have a trade up program.  When we called about trading up, they acted like they had no idea what I was talking about.  Prior to that I called them about doing a repair to a prong and they wanted to charge me 100 to repair!  I would not recommended them to anyone!

resp.text: Mrs Denise Jett,  We are so sorry for any misunderstanding and would like the chance to make you happy. The wedding set you spoke about, it is true we will let you trade up the center diamond for a larger diamond and the repair you  spoke about , we charge 12.00 dollars to retip one prong in 14 karat gold. So I don't understand how we  could have told you some thing else. Please give us a chance to correct this misunderstanding. Call  Tim Blair,  owner of B and B Jewelers Inc.  256-883-1123  7540 So. Memorial parkway Huntsville AL

name: Jessica Smith
text: B and B is a fantastic jewelers and the only place I would consider taking my antique jewelry (including sentimental family pieces) for repairs. Their prices are always fair and they don't seem to mind that I usually come in wearing jeans and flip flops!

text: So me and my mom visited this boutique on yesterday, the products were beautiful but the customer service was horrible!! Two young ladies who worked at the register not once acknowledged us. No hello , may we help you, not even a hand wave.. even if you thought we weren’t going to purchase anything, common curiosity should’ve kicked in!! They both set at the register and talked to each other and looked at they’re phones!! I work in a public environment also , you’re supposed to always greet your customers!!  Want be back !! Lost a customer!!!

text: They do not stand by their word.  I was told they would correct a mistake they made but they put me off and never did.  They volunteered to correct but then dropped the ball.   No one knows what they are doing.    Very rude and unhelpful.   Will not shop there again!

She is always helpful, never judges me, and never hesitated to take the time out of her busy schedule to help me pick out matching items! Katie is so sweet and kind and always makes you feel wanted in the store. She Always greets me when I walk in and is always bubbly and happy! Together these two girls make a ROCKSTAR team and I honestly believe that Market House Boutique would not be the same if they were not there. Thank you girls for making my experience there always a good one!

At First when I walked in I thought, oh my I just possibly could be in the wrong place as far as my budget goes. Then was  immediately greeted by a warm smiling face! I  quickly realized I was going to be able to shop here. Laurie was outstanding, she knew all  The answers to my questions and those that she did not she quickly found the answer!
After purchasing something, I decided to get them to repair my jewelry that I was looking for a jeweler to do.  I just found  where I will be doing my jewelry shopping and recommending family and friends !!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. It was so nice to meet you Kelli, looking  forward to seeing you soon. Have a Merry Christmas

name: Denise B. Owens
text: Always a pleasure to shop at Diamond Jewelers. Dawn McKenzie is truly a blessing. She knows the perfect thing to show you out of a choice of millions. Great customer service in the store or by telephone.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate your business.

name: Jeanette Breault
text: They shipped out the order and arrived two days earlier than promised with a hand written Thank You! on the receipt. Very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Jeanette, glad your order came earlier than expected. And many thanks for the kind review 💗😊

name: Katelin Wilkins
text: What an amazing experience! I was so sad to drop my engagement ring off. It is a family piece and I didn't want to part with it long. I dropped it off on Monday morning and had it back on my finger 2 days later. They not only cleaned and buffed it, but they replaced prongs, took it down nearly 2 sizes and gave me a measurement on the carat weight of the center diamond. The fit is perfect and I could not be happier! Thank you so so much Diamond Jewelers!

resp.text: So happy you are pleased Katelin. We appreciate you💝

name: Maves Youngblood
text: The place was packed! Standing room only! And, yet, I was immediately greeted, directed to the right person and assisted. Professional, speedy and fairly priced. What else can you ask for? Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Maves! I’m glad we could serve you in a timely manner. We appreciate you being patient? It does get a little busy 💝

name: Guelph Ontario
text: Have always had a great experience with Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores. Today was not. I will not return to Diamond Jewelers ever again. I did not enjoy the rude and condescending attitude Daphne exhibited towards me. I’ve never been treated that way in the past. But I’ll tell you it was enough to put me off from ever spending any of my hard earned money there again. Do yourself a favor and drive to Manning Jewelry in Foley. The staff there was beyond friendly. I’ll be doing business with Manning from here on out. Diamond Jewelers might need a little refresher on customer service.

resp.text:
I'm saddened to read this, in no way whatsoever did I realize that I was being condescending. This is my family's store and I'm so grateful to everyone that comes through the door. I truly did not mean to come across in a negative way that was not my intention. I want to offer you a $50 gift card from me.

My deepest apologies

name: Patty King
text: Such sweet people. I think it was “Lorrie” who helped me the last 2 visits. She is so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.  She greets me with a welcoming smile as soon as I walk in the door.  One of the tiny stones had fallen out of my sterling silver ring that I’ve had for months, and Lorrie made sure to get it fixed in just 2 days (so I would have it for my trip out of town). Just wonderful!  I will always be a Diamond World customer. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Patty! I appreciate the sweet compliment. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: Jennifer Clough
text: Absolutely love Diamond Jewelers.  Had my engagement ring sized and it fits perfectly.  They also shined and puffed it and it looks amazing. Definitely will be using them in the future for all my jewelry needs. Stephanie is very sweet and super professional.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer!! It was so nice meeting you & that precious Lennox!! We appreciate you coming in!! Enjoy your pretty ring! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Jackie Wireman
text: I had to return a product that I purchased a few months ago they were so pleasant with no questions gladly gave me a new product and it was a great great visit I would go there anytime for anything they stand behind all their products what more can you ask for I would recommend their beautiful shop to everybody Jackie Wireman

resp.text: Thanks Ms. Jackie!! We always love our visits with you! :)

name: Debbie Walters
text: Wonderful experience. My Apple Watch band got stuck on the watch. Took it in and the Jeweler was able to fix it right away. While I was waiting I inquired about a tennis necklace pendant. The ladies were so helpful. They found the tennis racket pendant and also helped me pick out a one really nice chain. Will definitely keep going back. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Debbie! Thank you for the kind words

name: Megann Steege
text: I will definitely be returning to Diamond Jewelers! Top of the line selections, and the staff was amazing. Jeff Goodman went above and beyond to make my experience one to remember.

resp.text: Thank you Megann, you’re  the best and we appreciate all that you do for our city

name: Debbie Phares
text: Found the perfect item. Diamond Jewelers had a good selection. Lorrie was very friendly and helpful. The jeweler will have our item ready in a day or earlier.  To get personal attention, fair prices, and great service visit Diamond Jewelers first.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie! We are thankful you chose us. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: D Kirkdoffer
text: Stephanie is one of the nicest sales persons! Her sweet spirit is contagious!  And she is very knowledgeable of fine jewelry. Thanks to her we will visit again.

resp.text: You are the sweetest! Thank you for the kind words. I love where I work and you make my job extra special. Sorry for getting this message so late 💝

name: Missy Tyler
text: I stopped in to have links removed from a Tag watch. Although I spent very little, the staff treated me like a dear friend. That is typical of this lovely shop. We love Diamond Jewelers, especially Lorrie!

name: Blake Rowell
text: Fantastic service at every turn. You can’t go wrong here.

resp.text: Thank you Missy, we really appreciate the kind  words 💗

Very friendly and helpful people! We were visiting from Illinois. Our small town no longer has a full service local jeweler, and we needed a ring cut off, a replacement earring back, and some pieces cleaned. Ours was not a high ticket purchase, but we were treated as if it were.
They have some beautiful pieces, and a beautiful store!

resp.text: Maureen, that is so sweet! Thanks for taking the time to message the generous comment, please come see us again 💕

name: Cyndie Pankonien
text: I found this store from an ad they had in a travelers station when we were passing through. I contacted them about Pandora charms they had for their area & ordered some for my mom and myself. She has since passed away and this was the last trip we took together.  I noticed my dangle on my charm was missing. I called as soon as I noticed it. They were so kind to send me a replacement charm at a discounted price. I highly recommend this business!! Thank you Diamond Jewelers for helping me to keep my memory keepsake!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet personal message, hoping you have the best New Year ahead and may you be blessed with much joy!

name: Shane Smith
text: Always, very friendly and helpful.

name: Debra Tarr
text: Always the best service and quality!  Picked out a beautiful necklace for my nieces high school graduation. Amazing staff and amazing service. I will be a regular forever :-).

name: Yessicaa CohRin
text: They are always welcoming with a smile! Love the pandora section my girlfriend gets me rings for every holiday from there! I had a stone fall out and they replaced it within a day! Very good prices and well worth the money!

name: Annette Ross
text: Wonderful shop! As always, Lorie was a "jewel "!  Have made several purchases and plan to make more in the future! A hometown atmosphere that is hard to beat! A great staff! Thanks for always making me feel welcome!

name: judy blair
text: I I purchased a very nice Pandora charm at Diamond Jewelers in Gulf l Shoes, Alabama today. The girl who waited on me was very familiar with their Pandora merchandise. resp.text:
Mrs. Judy,

Mary Kathryn

name: Courtney Steffek
text: Fantastic service, warm, caring and professional staff! Great place to trust with your valuables.  LOVE LOVE LOVE these people!

name: Nancy Shawhan
text: Super friendly staff, always willing to go the extra mile to take care of customers!  Love, love, LOVE Diamond Jewelry (the store, not actual diamond jewelry... well, wait... love that too. So, I actually love both Diamond Jewelry and jewelry with diamonds.). :)

text: I am new to Diamond Jewelers and have found my jewelers.  My engagement ring and wedding set are gorgeous.  The staff is fabulous and such a pleasure. We will go nowhere else.

text: I was looking for Pandora charms and earring hoops.  They had both and a very helpful sales  lady helped me out.  When I got back to Wisconsin I immediately put them together and absolutely love my Orange Beach bracelet. ( May have to get matching charms for my earrings too)

name: Kimberly Ray
text: Always a wonderful experience at Diamond Jewelers! Everyone on staff - Daphne, Dawn, Lori, Mary Kathryn & Stephanie are so welcoming and easy to work with. name: Kyle Sparks
text: I just went in to the store to see if they sold engagement ring boxes. The one I have is very noticeable when in my pocket. They only sold ones with their name on it. They were very professional in telling me so. As I walked back to the parking lot the lady flagged my back down and brought me 2 very nice boxes that she was able to find and wished me good luck. Free of charge. That saved me a lot of troubles. Thank you

resp.text:
Kyle,
Thank you so much for taking your time to write this sweet experience.  We are so glad we could help you with something that seemed so simple.  If you ever need anything at all, don't hesitate to call.  Congratulations!
Dawn

text: The ONLY jeweler to use!!!  I stopped in today expecting to have to leave my jewelry for repair but they took care of it on the spot. resp.text:
You are so sweet April! I enjoyed seeing you and that precious baby boy! It's always a pleasure helping you! Thanks for your kind words! :)
Sincerely,
Stephanie

text:
I've been coming to Gulf Shores for years.  This past trip was memorable like all the rest. However, I wanted to add some Pandora Charms to my bracelet to commemorate this visit. I googled to see if there were any jewelry stores in the area that carried the brand. Diamond Jewelers have an entire section of Pandora Merchandise. I was warmly greeted as soon as I entered the store. **There wasn't that awkward silence like someone is estimating how much you're going to spend.**  The saleswoman was informative, patient, and attentive. Great customer service will always leave a lasting impression. I'll definitely be returning.
J. from Jackson, MS

name: Kew Taybi
text: This was my first purchase at this jewelry store. They came highly recommended by a friend and I was not disappointed. The sales lady who met me was most helpful and give me several options at very reasonable prices.

name: Linda Richmond
text: I just made my first purchase from Diamond Jewelers this past week. They were very professional, friendly and helpful. They have a great selection of jewelry and all at great prices. I will definitely be returning to make future purchases.

name: Tom Martin
text: Having recently moved to Gulf Shore, this was our first visit to Diamond Jewelers.  We could not have been more impressed with the extensive knowledge and friendliness of the entire sales staff.  Stephanie was exceptional patiently guiding us through their large estate jewelry inventory.   Diamond Jewelers is now our “go to” jewelry store for all our fine jewelry purchases.

resp.text:
Tom,
Thank you so much for your sweet review.  We are so happy to have you in our area and are glad you feel at home with the store! I'm always here to help if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

text: I stopped in Diamond Jewelers to get a battery replaced in a waterproof watch and the staff welcomed me as if I did business in there often and was a regular customer.  The jeweler also fixed a necklace.  The charge was very reasonable .  I highly recommended them for your jewelry needs.

text: Jewelry repair top notch! Exceptional customer service with Lorrie as well. Highly recommend!

text: Delightful Experience! The staff was very professional, knowledgeable, and personable. What I valued most was her genuine excitement and happiness for me - she made it fun!!!!!  Looking forward to my next shopping experience at Diamond Jewelers!

name: Phyllis Britt
text: I initially went to Diamond Jewelers two years ago to buy the Gulf Shores Pandora charm for our daughters, daughter in laws and granddaughter. Yesterday they helped me get new battery for my husband's watch.  I cannot say enough how nice everyone is. So glad I found them and would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: thank you Phyllis for the sweet generous feedback. Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Jan Marsh
text: I asked that DJ  find a specific stone for a ring and a setting to accommodate a specific carat weight of diamonds around the stone — all within a budget amount. They quickly got in two stones and two settings to meet these requirements for me to see. I selected the stone and setting and the finished ring (which they shipped to me) far exceeded my expectations. I love my sales person -Dawn. She worked tirelessly with many calls, texts pictures etc to make this happen.

It is always a great experience shopping at Diamond Jewelers. Jeff the owner always greets everyone with a smile as well as all the wonderful ladies that work there
Great selection of all kinds of diamonds and ladies jewelry

name: dennis holland
text: great experiance

Wonderful people. Excellent customer service. Always  a pleasure to do business with  Diamond Jewelers.

.
