text: Walked into this store with my fiancé to pick out bridal jewelry. We are young and that seemed to influence the associates’ opinions of us. There were three associates working, one was busy with a customer. We walked in, and the associates quickly turned their heads away. After walking around the store a few minutes and finding the bridal jewelry ourselves, another group of older people walked in and were immediately greeted by an associate and asked if they need assistance with anything. Two other groups of people received the same positive treatment while no one had even acknowledged us. I love Kendra Scott, but this store lost a customer today.

name: Julianna Williams
text: I’ve come to the conclusion that Kendra Scott jewelry is not good quality. I got a necklace for Christmas and it is turning and all that and I have done nothing but take very good care of it. Also my boyfriend got me a ring for my birthday about a week or two ago and I have done nothing but take extra care of it. I have not gotten it wet at all, I clean it with a special soft cloth, and I don’t wear it all of the time. I’ve took very good care of it and it’s scratch. My sisters ring and necklace is the same way. She’s already had to take one necklace back. The jewelry is just really not worth the money. I told my boyfriend not to buy anything from them again, because it’s to much money for it to just change and stuff. I know you get the card saying that you have to be careful with the jewelry but I’ve been very careful with mine. I mean I didn’t buy it for it to sit in the bag.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are constantly working towards improvement and will be using your feedback to do so. If you have any issues with your pieces, please bring them in-store or email service@kendrascott.com, and our team will do everything we can to make it right for you.

name: Candyse Crow
text: I love KS, but I did not love this particular store. Normally, when I shop in a Kendra Scott, I am spoken to immediately. Not in this instance. There was one salesperson on the floor and she was at the colorbar with a few customers (in the same party). Then another salesperson came out, looked at the schedule, and proceeded to play on her phone. I was ready to make a sizable purchase, but decided to leave based on my treatment. I will never return to this location.

resp.text: Hi Candyse! Thank you so much for taking the time to write to us. I am so sorry to hear that you did not get the in-store experience we hope for and have sent a note to our team. We are continuously working to improve and will use your feedback to do just that.

name: Renata K. Libhart
text: I love KS Jewelry! It's my favorite brand of costume jewelry! The ladies here are absolutely amazing,  helpful,  and very patient.  They seem to really care about helping you find the perfect piece. Will deffinetly purchase more from KS in the future!

name: A Todd Baker
text: Nice jewelry

name: Brian Saunders
text: A couple of custom set stones in some earrings was exactly what my girlfriend was looking for. Friendly staff made it happen.

name: Mike Doyle
text: Very nice staff

name: Hollie Smith
text: I was very disappointed with this location. All stones were just glass and cheap looking for the price. I was excited to go and didn't see anything I liked.

name: Danielle Bishop
text: I walked in to treat myself for my birthday, (helllooooo color bar) and met the nicest associate. Her name was Rachel and she was incredibly kind. My KS bar necklace broke that honored my brother who passed and in the middle of the color bar customizing, she tells me she’s going to GIFT me a purple (birthstone) bar necklace in honor of my sweet bubba. We both started tearing up and were trying to not sob! I’m forever grateful to her for that gift. People like her are the reason I still believe in humanity not because it was something free but the kindness and passion she showed to me. A stranger. So thank you Rachel and Kendra Scott!!

name: Kimberly Holland
text: Lovely store and employees! Walk in and walk out feeling like a million bucks win gifts everyone will love.

name: Joshua Trotter
text: My daughter absolutely loves her necklace

name: Lisa Lowell
text: Love stopping in the girls are so sweet and always very helpful.

name: Julie Blair
text: I bought a candle and it smells devine

name: Cheryl Cornman
text: Very nice and helpful!

name: Richard Smith
text: Great place to shop

name: Fullsizecandybars
text: Awesome service!

name: Mel Pedersen
text: Like their stuff but it is a little pricey

name: Aiman Rahman
text: Good collections!

name: Danielle DeFrank
text: Terrible customer service

name: Sarah Melendez
text: Amazing!

name: Kristy Compton
text: Great store, great products, great employees ❤️

name: Morgan B
text: We tried to go to Alford Avenue antiques, the first address online was wrong and we ended up at an abandoned building in the middle of nowhere. Tried a second address for Alford and ended up here at the Vintage Shoppes, which come to find out from reading online IS Alford Avenue Antiques. Alford had operating hours posted online which stated they are open until 7,  whereas the Vintage Shoppes apparently close at 5 now. Even still, we got there before 5 and it was already closed, although there was a huge OPEN sign in the window with a tiny in comparison CLOSED sign near it. Altogether frustrating experience, store might be fine we wouldn’t know.

resp.text: Since COVID, Updating the hours across the Internet has been a challenge. Thank you for taking the time to visit The Vintage Shoppes today and we hope that you can find time to visit again in the future. Once inside, you will find curated spaces by Alford Avenue antiques as well as other vendors throughout the space. Sorry that your Experience today made you give one star. The vendors at the vintage Shoppes work very diligently to provide good merchandise and good service to shoppers. We would all like to think we are far better than one star and hope that you would reconsider your rating of this small business.

name: laurie lawson
text: Fun vintage shops with great lighting and a plethora of merchandise. It is all displayed in a way that is not overpowering and the store is designed that walking through the little rooms make you feel like you are discovering treasures at every turn. In fact we discovered and purchased this adorable vintage hat for my niece.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting today. Customers like you and others we welcome at The Vintage Shoppes are the lifeblood of a small business.  We appreciate the warm review. Thank you. Please come again soon! Enjoy the hat! #ShopSmall

name: Katrina Hunkapiller
text: Very unique, gorgeous selection to fit any home/style for great prices! Loved how organized it was and the art gallery/furniture store set up and design. I went to find another item to meet the $20 minimum to pay with card and ended up going home with two items I love!

resp.text: Katrina, thank you so much for taking the time to visit today. The Vintage Shoppes and it’s Vendor’s work diligently to ensure our guests have a wonderful shopping experience. Times are challenging now and every transaction and every customer visit is extremely important. Thank you for being an important part of our survival. Thank you so very much for taking the time to support this small business. Stay safe!

name: Sherika Heard
text: I visited this place with my husband and small child, I was highly satisfied with my purchase but my husband felt that the customer service did not come off as pleasant. He was asked for an ID for a $20 purchase which he felt was unnecessary. Without inquiring about why we had to show ID, the cashier began to state that it was mandatory for all card purchases. Unfortunately my husband does not feel comfortable spending any more money at this store.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing. Apologies if the delivery of our ID requirement could have been softer. There is a sign posted at the register alerting shoppers that purchases must be greater than $20 to swipe and the name on the card must match your photo ID. As retailers we prevent fraud far more often than many consumers realize and we take every precaution to prevent it from happening at The Vintage Shoppes. It is unfortunate that you decided that our commitment to your security warranted 3 stars. This small business deserves more than 3 stars just as you deserve for every small shop to regard security as high as sales. For the same reason your husband “does not feel comfortable” shopping in The Vintage Shoppes, there are many more who shop with us because they appreciate our diligence.  This small business appreciates you as we wish you safety, blessings and prosperity.

name: Lynda Pierce
text: Great experience shopping today. Much more everything than I expected. Great selection, great prices, great pieces. Could not bring anything home today but I am still thinking about my visit so I guess I will return tomorrow to purchase something I had my eye on. Most places like this are a little grimy but not this one. It’s a new place in my rotation!

name: Theresa LoRusso
text: Really rude staff at the front register. Place itself is cute but they need to hire someone more welcoming for sure.

name: Jillian Everett
text: The store is absolutely beautiful and has some really amazing items. I spent quite a while in the shop today and found two perfect Christmas presents for family. When I took my items to the counter, I told the associate how amazing the store was and that this was my very first time seeing it. However, the items I got didn’t ring up to $20, so I was told they would only take cash or I couldn’t make the purchase. Only all I had on me was credit cards and I had an afternoon appointment so I didn’t have time to go to an atm and come back. I’m really disappointed. It would be nice for first time customers to get a little grace on the first purchase since I had no idea I would need to bring cash. Or maybe have more signage around the store? The only sign was at the checkout counter and the writing was so small, I didn’t notice it until I was finished shopping.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking time to visit the store. As with any business The Vintage Shoppes has a minimum of $20 for us to swipe anything which is posted in a nice little frame at the register. It’s unfortunate that this upset you so that you have given the place three stars because of that but we hope that you might come and visit us again in the future. Small businesses have to take steps of this manner to keep it going one more day. This small business appreciates your support.

name: Shea B.
text: This place is fantastic! It's so clean and organized, the staff is super friendly, and you could go through the store three times and still find new stuff. Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you so very much for visiting with us! Our vendors work diligently to make each experience a fun one. Your kind words are a pat on the back for all involved. This small business appreciates support and encouragement from you and customers like you. Have a great day and please visit again soon.

name: Kim Cornett
text: Nice merchandise, nice owner. I had a somewhat unpleasant first impression of the staff, but the owner reached out immediately and made me feel better about my visit. The atmosphere, merchandise, and owner are enough for me to return.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to provide service. We will never be perfect but will will always appreciate the opportunity to provide good, better and best services to our customers. Again, thank you for your feedback.

name: Robin Ferguson
text: Found a pair of gorgeous candle holders today. The owners and staff are always friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to both visit the store front and leave a review. Sometimes people have a good experience somewhere and they don’t have time to leave a review but you made time to review us and we really appreciate it...thank you! Our vendors are very sincere about curating great items at great prices. We’re making changes every day and working on ways to Expand our offerings and appeal to new people and keep it interesting for repeat supporters each day. Thank you for your purchase. Please follow us on Instagram and Facebook. This small business appreciates your support.  Have a great day.

name: JewelryCash ByMail
text: The jewelry is great. Something for everyone. More fine jewelry selections needed. We may consign some with them. The staff is uncommonly friendly.

resp.text:
Thank you for the feedback on the jewelry. We are eager to implement your suggestions!
Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Sandra P
text: Department store style antique mall selection with affordable marketplace prices! Beautiful, convenient space to shop. Definitely a must see!

resp.text: This small business appreciate your support.

name: Connie Schweigert
text: Warm, helpful staff. Big selection, artfully displayed.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for complementing our staff. Our selection is expanding each day. Since we haven’t been open very long we’re still getting the hang of things but supporters like you are helping us understand what items you seek and vendors are working diligently to curate those items as well as unique items you may not even realize you need. Haha. This small business appreciates your support.

name: Hiram Jessup
text: Just happened to go in and found most of what my son needed for his new apartment. This place is a hidden gem. Excellent merchandise and prices.

resp.text: You and your family were such fun! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Merritt Smith
text: Beautiful shop with a unique and wide variety of decor/furniture and jewelry and many other things!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Drew Barnes
text: Loved my Shopping experience at The Vintage Shoppes. Reasonable prices and a broad spectrum of history to re- love.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Sophie Franklin
text: This business has scammed so many people out of money.  She promotes under various business names (she will introduce herself under Signature Estate Sales but ask you to pay her under Alford Avenue Antiques and now this!). She does this, so that consumers are unable to find reports of her frauding others.  She he does not pay you what you are owed or she will not pay you at all. She makes up prices at the register because her employees don't know how to price items.  Her employees are also very unprofessional and she blames them for whenever something goes wrong.  It is not the employees fault, but the business owner should be held responsible. Her estate sales are very unorganized, and you will find consistent reviews noting this as well. Please if you are working with Signature Estate Sales, please note that you are also working with Alford Avenue Antiques and NOW The Vintage Shoppes, where you will find she has scammed many indivduals who did not know she was operating under two (now three) different business names. She must be stopped from deceiving others before this all goes too far. I feel sorry for anyone who has fell victim to her scams.

name: Angelia Harrison
text: I did not get a chance to look for long. But i was very impress with the lady that work there very nice and friendly

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to peruse the store. All of the vendors work very diligently to keep it nice. Thank you for the compliment of the front desk team member because Nothing happens without them. We look forward to your next visit! Please join us for our Christmas Party Sale, Sunday, Dec. 15, 12:30-4:30. Santa will be at the store taking photos with adults and children! Refreshments, door prizes, discounts and fun!

name: Sassafras Market and Coffee
text: OMG ...Amazing place!!!  Shopping here first from now on. Terrific prices.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers..enjoy the coffee mugs!

name: Stephanie Frakes
text: 1st time in, Butter Bean vintage section is my favorite!

resp.text: Stephanie thank you so much for visiting! Butter Bean Vintage is a great shoppe...and there are more to explore as well. This small business appreciates your support. Thank you for sharing your experience with others.

name: Susan B
text: Found a one of a kind piece...

resp.text: Susan, the vendors at The Vintage Shoppes greatly appreciate you “shopping small.” It’s icing on the cake that you found something you loved enough to purchase. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Please join us for our open house, Tuesday, November 12th from 4-6:30. This small business appreciates YOU!

name: ty den
text: I could spend forever here

resp.text: Thank you so very much. Hopefully you found a treasure that you made your own. We appreciate you visiting and taking the time to share your experience. Like many small businesses, we are struggling with a smile. It is only supporters like you who keep us going and looking forward to light at the end of the tunnel. Thank you for your support of this small business. Please keep shopping small. Kisses and hugs! The Vintage Shoppes

name: Jobaida Akther
text: There are many items but the price seems to be very high compared to other used product shops.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us. Most of our customers find our prices to be very affordable for their condition and age. We hope that you will continue to visit the individual vendor booths throughout the store and find even more great items within your budget. Thank you for your support of this small business.

name: purplebananas
text: Ok selection but overall overpriced and limited.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting the Shoppe. It’s unfortunate you didn’t have five star experience. Most customers find our prices and selection to be quite good but for those seeking more of a thrift store pricing scheme, their needs will likely not be met. The vendors take great pride in sourcing the items they present and for small business that comes at a slightly higher rate. Thank you for shopping small and trying out the Vintage Shoppes. Please consider visiting again and perhaps we will have something that is more to your liking. Have a wonderful day.

name: Carl Cathey
text: Cool place with a great selection

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to support a small business, Carl! We are glad you enjoyed the store. Our vendors And store team work very hard to create positive customer experiences. Please visit again soon! Have a great weekend.

name: Angie Cacioppo
text: Interesting shopping

resp.text: Angie, thank you for taking the time to comment on the Shoppe! It is a labor of love for everyone involved and we strive to ensure that shoppers like you have an experience that is interesting, memorable, neat, clean and organized so that you will want to return. Thank you so much for your support of this small business. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Deb Paradise
text: Absolutely amazing place.

name: Kristine Fitts
text: Best small department store EVER! Beautiful apparel and accessories. Alterations are top notch should you need them. And make sure to find Carolyn Martin in shoes....she knows feet and styles like no other! David and Katie do an exceptional job keeping up to date shoes for all ages. The store is always staffed and stocked well. Great place to find gifts too. I travel 75 miles to shop here! I highly recommend Gus Mayer.

name: Richard Shack
text: Stephanie in dresses was terrific! She pulled out all sorts of good options for my daughter and helped us decide which to keep and what wasn't flattering. I liked that she gave, very politely, constructive criticism of the clothes. My daughter and I felt confident that we had successfully updated her wardrobe for going off to college at the end of the summer.

name: Steve Russell
text: The people here are very rude. There was a crazy effeminate man that came up to us who worked there and started giving one of the people in our party who had their mask off smelling perfume. Don't cry when you go out of business because of your neurotic staff.

name: Brian Spoonire
text: Features things you will not find elsewhere which make for wonderful everyday items or gifts. True to The Summits reputation, this is one of the nicer places to shop in the area. Check out their website.

name: Ashley Teague
text: Beautiful store with wonderfully curated high end selection. The shoe department is to die for! Helpful, friendly staff as well!

name: Jimmie Johnson
text: It's always great shopping at Gus Mayer!

name: Dione Hubbars
text: If you need premium shoes in Birmingham, Al.  This is your go to.

name: Cynthia Harkness
text: I like the store, but the prices appear to be from another planet.....😒

name: Juan Ramos
text: Rude employees

name: Rossie Stoops
text: This is a fancy store. I love their shoe department and their jewelry section. Only for women.

name: Nancy Davis
text: Lindsey in the shoe section was wonderful! Everyone on the floor made it a delightful Saturday!

name: Cam Kent
text: Very over-priced. No one could tell me what I needed to know about some bowls or what they were. They were also out of a lot of sizes.

name: Suanne Nutter
text: David had a fantastic shoe department and go visit Terry at Chanel counter

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. We are very proud of our staff throughout our store.

name: Georgia Blair
text: They didn't have what I was looking for but took my name and number to call me later.

name: Katherine Ward
text: Nice Dept Store at the Summit!

name: Laura Becker
text: I have used Gold Art for years. I have purchased new, and also had many repairs done. I recently had a ring altered. Every experience has been great! They have fast turn around times, competitive prices, and are true artisans. I wouldn't go anywhere else!

name: Patrick Smith
text:
Love Gold Art so much!!!!!
The inventory is just Beautiful!!!
Custom work that have done for me has been top notch!!!  They also repair jewelry.  Really love supporting a family-owned business.    Plus they are so nice!!!!

name: William McDaniel
text:
I give Gold Art and the Clarke brothers a five star review!
These guys have truly mastered the combination of artist and Jeweler.
My wife and I have had several pieces beautifully designed and carefully created by these talented Jewelers.
I highly recommend them for their excellent work and competitive pricing!

name: Michael Looney
text: I got my mom's wedding ring fixed here after it had to be cut off after an accident. They fixed it really quick and it wasn't expensive at all.

name: malcolm yunker
text: Great jewelry store. Great customer service!  Best in Mobile!

name: Laura Martin
text: My husband and I have purchased a number of items from Gold Art, including engagement and wedding rings. They have beautiful pieces. Very high end. Excellent service.

name: Debi Gould (mermaid)
text: Friendly guys who make you feel like a million dollars! There's all designs from ventage to current trends to choose from if you are purchasing. Whether it's a simple piece or elaborate Gold Art is the place to go.

name: Sean Carmichael
text: Can't say enough good things about these guys! Dealt with Russ on an engagement ring, he guided me through the process and made it easy. The rest of the family was great too...they all helped out to make my experience a pleasure. I Wouldn't take my business anywhere else.

name: A. H.
text: Loved working with Frank, CC and Meg! Everyone was so friendly and welcoming. The selection at Frank & Co is extremely diverse and ranged from elegant and simple to bold, fun and flashy—perfect for a shop located in OBA. I stopped in to find a more durable alternative for my diamond engagement ring and made the switch from a white gold band to a similar platinum band. The price was just right and I’m so happy with my lovely forever ring! A must-see destination for tourists and locals alike!

name: Robert Delgirono
text: Great prices and great jewelry. The parking lot is too small though. Too bad every parking spot is free game to the public.

name: Caren Leon
text: Exquisite Jewlery. Excellent customer service. I really enjoy shopping in this store. I highly recommend you stop and shop here. You will be glad you did.

name: chris powell
text: I highly recommend this business. Great experience . My first time was repair work. I’ll definitely will be back.

name: Brenner Sweat
text: Great company! Very friendly and professional. Needed a couple watches sized and the service was outstanding. The owner is very knowledgeable about watches. Megan was very friendly and accommodating as well. Stop by for a chat. I’ll be back!

name: Michele Lartigue
text: The work David did to make an old ring new again went above and beyond my expectations! I could not be happier!

name: Victoria Mclaughlin
text: GREAT SERVICE!!!! Chatted with them before going to the store. Every step of the way they were very helpful, extremely knowledgeable, and got my ring sized extremely fast! Never made to feel like I didn’t belong in a high end jewelry store. Cheap pricing but excellent service and end result. Highly recommend!!

name: Christopher Schley
text: Amazing experience, Beautiful Jewelry, Outstanding Craftsmanship! I reached out to Frank yesterday for the first time in many years. He was willing and able to craft a beautiful Mother’s ring in 1 day and get it shipped just in time for my moms birthday. Frank and Co. helped me to fulfill a long time promise I have had to her! Appreciate it Frank!

name: Charles L. Nichols
text:
Victor, the owner of the store is honest, knowledgable and nice.
His customer service skills are impeccable. Treats customers like family.
Great assortment of Rolex watches with fair prices.
Watch repair services are great too!

name: Darcy Forsythe
text: I love our gym! Tito and Donovan make it real and fun..and look forward to going to see 'the boys.' See you in a few minutes!

name: Jeff Jones
text: You will NOT go wrong by going to Frank and Co.  Frank and his staff take the time to know exactly what you are looking for and strive for perfection.  If they do not have it in the store, Frank will personally make it for you or He will find exactly what you need.  I have used them for two VERY personal purchases and they take the time to size, engrave, create......whatever it takes to make sure that the most intimate gifts are one of a kind.  I will NEVER go anywhere else and encourage everyone to shop local!!!  This place is AMAZING!!!

resp.text: Jeff! Many many thanks to you for this stellar review! It’s truly our pleasure 🙌🏻

name: Charlene Boteler
text: Frank and Company is an excellent jewelry store with something for everyone.  The staff, Frank, Jack, Bevelyn, and Page, are very pleasant and knowledgeable and willing to explain gemstones, metals and what makes each piece special.  They do beautiful custom work and stand behind their work.  They’ also repair watches.  The prices are fair, and there is no pressure to purchase.  It’s fun to just go in and look.  I highly recommend Frank & Co.

name: Brandy Thomley
text: This was my fist experience with Frank & Co. I had the pleasure of working with Frank. From the moment I walked in I felt like family and not just another customer. I needed help with two rings, and I'm more than happy with the end results. I look forward to doing all my future business with Frank & Co.

resp.text: Thank you Brandy!  We are always happy to help.

name: Annette Sember
text:
Frank is always awesome he sells and makes beautiful quality jewelry.  If looking for something unique or you want something special made go by amd visit him.

Harley Annette

name: Vicki Brendemuhl
text: I had a jacket made for one of my rings and absolutely love it. They did a great job. I also had a bracelet repaired recently for which I am very pleased with. Everyone is so kind and friendly. Will be back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you, Vicki! We love having you as a client!

name: Vicki Trull
text:
Frank added on to a very unique necklace. He did a fantastic job as always!!
If haven’t been in lately you need to! He has some beautiful things in.

Thank you guys!!

resp.text: Thank you, Vicki! We are always happy to help!

name: Chelsea Tompson
text: Great gym! I love how much space there is and that I never have to wait for a machine.

name: Cathy Hefner
text: I have had a ring for 8 years and wanted something done to make the ring look more beautiful. I took it to Frank & Co., they made a couple suggestions, and I left the ring with them. In less than a week, I had my ring back and it is absolutely gorgeous! I could not be happier and I would definitely recommend them to anybody that needs a fantastic Jeweler. The whole staff is great!!!

name: Sue Blanchard
text: Friendliest people you ever want to meet. Reasonable prices.

name: Albert J. Mcann
text: I've been a member here for several years. I still like this gym but try to avoid it during peak hours! My only complaints are that the wi-fi is terrible and when group exercise classes are in session you can't find space to do stretching!

name: Cindy Dittman
text: Beautiful store,  beautiful jewelry. The clerks were very helpful and pleasant. We left a piece for repair and admired several others. Best marine life jewelry I've seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Cindy! It’s clients like you who make us our best 💎

name: Jerry Broadway
text: We were in town for a beach wedding.  Several hours before the wedding, I realized that I had not checked off one very important item on my Father of The Bride to-do list: picking up a ring as a gift for our daughter.  I frantically searched Google and found Frank & Co. I showed up at 12:30 with a picture, and they matched it as closely as possible. At 1:45, it was resized and gift wrapped. Fantastic service, and my daughter was thrilled with her ring!

resp.text: Jerry, it was a pleasure! Congratulations on the upcoming nuptials. Come see us again, and thank you for the amazing review 🙌🏻

name: Jane Taylor
text:
Wonderful store. Everyone is trustworthy. Everything is done exactly how you want it. I got a special ring worked on, and it was perfect.
They have never let me down.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Jane! It is always a pleasure to serve you.

name: Michaelle Leath
text: I had a loose stone that Frank mounted into a ring. He did an incredible job and the customer service was amazing. After having its size for my right hand I decided I wanted the ring to fit on my left. Frank had no problem resizing the ring and made it fit like a glove. They really treat you like family.

resp.text: Thank you Michaelle!! It was our pleasure to help! Have a great weekend.

name: Karen Gentry
text: I am beyond impressed !!! He was so kind and helpful ! He even cleaned 2 of my rings I was wearing ! I highly recommend them to anyone and everyone !

resp.text: Thank you so much, Karen! We look forward to serving you again.

name: Erskin Hickman
text: Doing a bit of Christmas shopping. Visited seven jewelery stores in the area. By far, Frank & Co. was the best experience. Friendly, professional staff. Great selection. Recommend them highly!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the amazing review!

name: Carol Stine
text: Each time I have been there it has been a good experience. They are friendly, professional, knowledgeable, and reasonably priced. I highly recommend them for any jewelry needs, whether for new jewelry or repairs.

name: MRS. FLYE
text: Great displays,  True fine Jewelry. Jack is very Personable and Professional.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Raylene Caldwell
text: Completely satisfied with the experience at Frank & Co. Frank, Jack and the girls were a pleasure to work with, they were extremely helpful, and they carry a wide variety of jewelry. Thank you all for an enjoyable experience!

name: Casah Crowson
text: I bought my husband a watch as an Anniversary gift and he absolutely loved it. I also have had a few repairs done and I am always happy with the finish product. And currently they are designing a few gifts for our children...I am so thrilled to have such a great and talented group in Orange Beach!! I will be a life-long customer!!

resp.text: Thank you C.C. ❤

name: Inyce Lapine
text:
As always Frank and Page take care of me!!!
Y’all are the best. Thank you so much. It’s like shopping with family.
Thank you

name: Meredith Spanton
text: Brought in several rings to be repaired/restored. They did an amazing job! Knowledgeable and friendly! Would definitely do business again.

name: weslyn reed
text: Beautiful jewelry! Did repair in few hours. I’m still thinking of the diamond I saw earlier!

resp.text: Thank you, Stacie, for the glowing review! 🙌🏻

name: Jamie Carswell
text: Excellent customer service from all associates. Was made to feel welcome and appreciated!

name: Shawn Lawrence
text: Mr. Frank thank you for doing such an amazing job on my wife's wedding ring. She lost her main diamond during a move a few months ago and she was heart broken. I'm happy that we were referred to you from a friend that said so many good things about your work.  The diamond you selected for replacement is beautiful and the rebuild of the mount is so much stronger.

name: Charlene Zahand
text:
Frank & Co. Are a team of jewelry geniuses.  I have been using Frank as my jeweler for over 10 years for all my repairs and custom creations. I trust noone else. I cant say enough about the outstanding work they do. I highly recommend that everyone establish a relationship with "A" jeweler. Dont just hand your tiny treasures over to just anyone.  Frank &Co is reliable, dependable, affordable and their customs are extraordinary! Try them once and you'll be sold!

Charlene Zahand ( area business owner)

resp.text: Charlene, Frank & Co. is honored to serve you for your jewelry needs and thanks you for your glowing review!

name: Dana Pohli
text: I have gone to Designed by You for a very long time. And have had several pieces made. I have since moved a long way away, and will continue to go to Frank by mail now. Work is the absolute best. He manages to create what you want. Very pleased.

name: john smith
text: Took my watch to have sized.very nice people and fair prices.love the small businesses.

resp.text: Thank you for the stunning review!

name: christy Daniel
text: Frank was extremely helpful in fixing my rings and making sure my diamonds were secure in the brackets. Additionally he cleaned them and they are sparkling and beautiful. Thank you for great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you Christy, I'm so glad we could help!! We love happy customers ❤❤

name: henry Jones
text: They are super awsome! ALWAYS take care of my needs .Please go see all the great stuff they have!!

name: Steve Neitzel
text: Great Sevice Today on my Watch & New Battery.

name: Bill Howard
text: Absolutely the best around.

name: Darren Metz
text: Great customer service and craftsmanship!

name: Kristen Rayborn
text: Always friendly and love their jewelry.

name: Leah Lucky
text: Frank is the best! Affordable, nice, and fast! I’d recommend this store to anyone who has any jewelry needs!

name: Ann McFadden
text: Always enjoy looking and buying

resp.text: Thanks, Ann! We enjoy seeing you!

name: Sonja R. Thomas
text: Frank has always taken great care of our family. So, instead of sitting in traffic on Canal Road stop on and see his beautiful designs.

name: B Braddock
text: Frank does great work on jewelry.  I highly advise checking him out if you want a custom piece created.

name: Laura Braddock
text: I so love my necklace and watch. It was perfect.

name: Michelle Boudreaux
text: He did a good job with my necklace but I'm giving 2 stars because when I dropped it off I asked the lady in the front how much it was going to cost. I guess she didn't know an exact about so she told me it would be not be much since it was just sterling silver. Then she said "just a few dollars". In my mind I'm thinking ok then it will be about $15 or so. Well when I went back the lady was not in the front and I was charged $30. It was a simple break and I can't believe it cost that much. I won't be back

name: Garrett Spence
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here for a great deal, very nice and helpful!

name: Thomas Grimshaw
text: Great selection and great customer service. Highly recommend!!!

name: Monica Canady
text: Got  beautiful ring for a Christmas from hubby!  Love it and plan to take it to be sized!

name: Matthew Bankston
text: Great jewelry company!

name: Julie Mathis
text: Wonderful experience with selecting diamond wedding set and rings. Quality, sparkling diamonds, with a professional staff! Wonderful warranty for the jewelry as well.

name: Meeka Acklin
text: If I could negative a thousand I would. Someone at this store stole my bracelet I ordered online to be sent to this store. Ordered online for a Christmas gift, got tracking info & it was delivered to the store 12/15. The store gave me 3 different stories about what happened to my product, provided a different tracking number. Customer had the HARDEST time trying to get someone on the phone at the store. This was a Christmas gift. Then customer service is just as bad. Ordered 12/11/2020 & it’s 1/18/2021, I have no product or no refund. I would recommend NEVER ordering from Zales & dealing with the Zales at the Galleria. Worst store EVER.

name: Martin Howell
text:
We've shopped here for years. Their service is great!
They are exercising safe COVID protocols.

name: Buck Caradine
text: They are all nice in this store. Quick to help you.

name: Candy Laine
text: Do not shop with Sam. She's super rude. She threw away part of a necklace that I had a warranty on because we didn't have the other tiny piece to it. I had to call the district manager in order to get it rectified. She kept interrupting us while we were talking to the assistant manager talking to us in a condescending way. Worst experience ever.

name: Kristina Sims
text: The warranty is bs bc they will replace a 2 carat diamond if lost but not the chain? AFTER we purchased lifetime! The ladies were extremely rude and acted as if they owed the mall. Will it be back!! Don’t trust those people

name: Ephraim Maynard
text: Great Sales Staff. They are very helpful and kind. This time Sam helped me pick out a great present for my wife's birthday. Sam was wonderful and knowledgeable about everything she showed me.

name: Tammy Otten
text: Very rude, will not do warranty inspection without an appt nor on Sunday's

name: Roy ORR
text: Customer service is Excellent

name: Rodney Burnes
text: Very nice selection!

name: becky Hall
text: Buyers beware!!! My fiancé bought my engagement ring from here. I came to get it sized and it came back with a diamond missing and the size was wrong. The salesperson, Sam told me everything goes to corporate so I thought it was in good hands. They sent it off again and went it returned it was a whole other ring. My beautiful ring was completely scratched up and 4 of my once flawless colorless diamonds were now visibly yellow! Turned out that Sam lied to me because it had went to a local jeweler. The managers excuse were the diamonds must of gotten burnt. There were many other excuses but this one was most shocking. Diamonds don’t burn!! We told them we wanted the original diamonds put back in and have it appraised to see if it matched our original cert card and they refused. All trust was out the window and we had no choice but to return it. They have made the whole experience a complete nightmare and have now ruined my engagement. I’ve heard horror stories of this place swapping diamonds before and clearly they’re still doing it! Do not buy from these people they commit fraud with no conscience.

name: Ashley Robertson
text: We are always greeted warmly and treated kindly. They don't try to push anything on you and are very helpful.

name: ladonna crum
text: Shazi and Jari (manager) were very accommodating and professional.  They both displayed exceptional customer service and a high level of professionalism. GREAT JOB!

name: Tameka Jamison
text: Customer Service is awesome! Our sales associate remembered our faces, and the type of ring I desired!!!! Sam is the Best!!!

name: frank johnson
text: Sam was perfect in every way as a sales person. I came in the store with a set amount in mind. Needless to say that didn't stay 😊. Great sales pitch, created a warm environment with a family atmosphere. I was very pleased with my purchase and would recommend any and everyone whose in the need for any type of jewelery to visit Zales in the mall and ask for Sam 😊

name: Randy Hollis
text: Mrs Sam is a amazing person she has helped me beyond. Very nice women. She is very good at helping.

name: SaTrisha Moore
text: Sam was very nice and helpful. She is very knowledgeable. I would recommend her for any jewelry needs.

name: Lawrence Darksavior
text: I visited the store for the first time and it was a great experience from start to finish both of the sales people Erin & Mike really went above & beyond to make sure I was taken care of.

name: John Doe
text:
The Good
* nice selection of rings and jewelry
* competitive prices with other jewelry dealers
The Bad
* staff is very rude (two Indian ladies)the worst
* very pushy and try to rush you to make a selection
* not honest about warranty if you don't have it in writing then you don't have it at all..
* they tried to add other services on my purchase without telling me

name: Jonathan Norman
text: Awful experience all around. They butchered and destroyed my fiancé’s ring when she sent it off to be sized, twice. The lack of taking responsibility along with the lies and excuses the staff made up were beyond baffling. I will never set foot in this place again.

name: Shane Williams
text: Sam was awesome and very professional and made me feel comfortable and didn't make me feel pressurized to buy. She took her time and helped me find the perfect ring!

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Shazi is wonderful!!!! She has made me want to continue to be a Zales customer. After dealing with the Trussville store 3 separate times and having no success in getting answers in getting a wedding band and a certification cardfor my engagement ring, she took 30 minutes out of her time to take care of us. She got with her manger about getting our cert card and then explained in detail why my engagement ring that was purchased in May was no longer being made as well as the band to accompany it. She then worked diligently to find a band that complimented my ring. If not for her we would’ve taken our bus was to Kay’s or Jared’s and been done but she took time out of her day to handle a simple customer service issue and made us her personal customers for life.

name: Bethany
text: Very poor experience. Clearly commission based, where no one wants to be inconvenienced to clean/inspect your ring to keep up the warranty as instructed; only to wait on those to make a sale. Waited a very long time for my turn and was treated incredibly rudely. Do not plan to ever purchase anything from them again.

name: Kayla Lorence
text: Horrible customer service from both Indian ladies. The older Indian lady had a straight up attitude. They treat customers different depending on if they are coming in to buy something new vs. getting something cleaned or replaced. I don’t know if it’s a commission thing or it’s just who they are. ( where they realize they won’t be getting any commission off of you, therefore service is bad). I honestly don’t know.

name: Stephanie Donnell
text: I went to exchange my ring, and the sales representative Shazi was amazing. She was very helpful! She took her time showing us rings and very patient.

name: Jalesa Mitchell
text: Sam was amazing , go check her out ! She did everything she could to get me the ring of my dreams !!!!

name: Naia “Shiro” Ōkami
text: Went to look at engagement rings with my fiance and her sister. Was not acknowledged by any staff. Tried multiple times to at least get my presence acknowledged and was treated terribly. Lost a customer that was ready to buy!

name: Fred Beeson
text: Shazi is the best ! She helped me pick out the perfect diamond. No pushy sales tactics with her. Very helpful and professional.

name: S Taylor
text: I bought a ring here, and brought it in soon after because I noticed scratches on it and needed them to clean it. When I went to go get my ring, the employee I dealt with had a poor attitude. I asked her if anything was wrong, and she didn't say anything. I won't be going back here again.

name: main man
text: Ask for Shazi or Sam both are friendly and helpful..knowledgeable about all things diamonds.

name: Jordyn Gilley
text: Do not waste your hard earned money here. My ring has broken twice in 2 months, not to mention the first time it took them 3 weeks to return it. The second time 4 weeks. And even then they won't call you to tell you it's ready. You literally have to call every day and pester them to see if it's back from repair.

name: Judy Pruett
text: If you are wanting the best Jewelry Consultant, ask for Shazi! She is extremely knowledgeable and personable  She takes her time to find out what you are looking for.

name: Brittany Lamb
text: Buyer beware!! I searched for months to find a ring that I wanted for Christmas. My husband I went to the Galleria location to get my size and we wanted to look at the one I had found. Unfortunately it was an “online only” item. The woman who got my size acted as if she was not only inconvenienced by us but as if she was better than us. So my husband ended up ordering the ring and gave it to me on Christmas Eve. When I took it out of the box and put it on I noticed one of the diamonds were missing. My husband immediately called their 1-800 customer service number and they directed us to take the ring to the nearest Zales and they would decide wether to have the ring repaired or replaced. Being Christmas Eve night the location was closed and closed the next day for Christmas. We went to the Galleria location on December 26th and when we explained the situation to an employee they went and got the manager. The manager then asked what we wanted done. I told them I wanted it fixed. Then they asked if I had the paper work for the diamond bond that came with it. I told them no that it should be fixed period considering it was a brand new ring. After about 30 minutes of talking to the manager she said she would take care of it and we wouldn’t have to use the diamond bond and we wouldn’t have to pay for anything. I even went ahead and bought the extended warranty on the metal and the sapphire. The manager said it should be ready by January 7th. When that day got here my husband called and it was not ready yet. Well my husband got a call yesterday, January 10th, that the ring was ready and that it was going to cost $110. When we got there to pick up the ring the woman that was working was the rude woman that waited on us before and the one that rang up my extended warranty. She told us it was going to be the $110. I told her we weren’t paying a dime that the manager was supposed to be taking care of it. Apparently the manager was not there and had made no notes of anything!! I got extremely frustrated and upset. Eventually, after getting verbal and irrate, another employee came over and tried to calm me down. The woman ended up giving us the ring and not charging us. None of this should have ever happened. I will never buy another thing from Zales again!!

name: Stephen Glass
text: Terrible staff they are rude. Be careful they will charge you more and not tell you that they added stuff to your receipt.

name: Juarron Jackson
text: Ms sam andMrs Shazi are very professional and friendly I had a great experience .And I will like to come back next time with my friends

name: HayRed
text: The sales lady seemed bordeline psychotic. My boyfriend and I wanted to look at engagement rings that I had seen online just to see what they looked like in person. We told the sales lady multiple times we were NOT buying a ring, yet she kept pestering. "Why are you not buying a ring today? Why can't you? You can just give me your credit card you don't have to give me any money today." Then she says to my boyfriend, "Is it because she's here with you?" And then she proceeds to look at me and say, "Can I speak with him alone please?" Needless to say I said NO and we left. Crazy!!! Don't go to this jewelry store. My boyfriend and I both left angry.

name: Da Mo
text: Do not buy from zales, at least not this store. Made the mistake of buying from there. The lady was super pushy and she literally was forcing me to buy. Don't waste your time and money.

name: HeavyChevy17
text: I will never buy anything again from zales thanks to pushy Sam.

name: E
text: Saleslady was super pushy and would not listen to neither me nor my wife. Also do not let her check your credit, never signed anything and they opened a line of credit anyway. Then I call and she was rude and did not want to listen again. Best advice is to go to DD or somewhere else, completely unprofessional.

name: Stephanie Earley
text: Sam, the saleslady, was ULTRA pushy. I know it's a commission job, but seriously, she    tried to force a sale on me. Definitely better jewelry stores in the Galleria. Try Helzberg or Kay.

name: Bridgette McBride
text: I went there in September and I was really impressed with Shazi. She was very helpful and friendly. I really couldn't decide what I wanted. Shazi gave me her card and asked me to come back. Well I must say I traveled 4 hours to get there. I came back on the 9th of December and I stopped by. Shazi had a customer but she noticed that I was waiting for her. Very good customer service. After she got through she helped me and I promised I love my rings. Again,I really couldn't decide what I wanted but she helped me all the way. Once I finished she thanked me and actually came from behind the counter and gave me a hug. I promise you can't find customer service like that all the time. Shazi u keep up the good work and I assure you that it will take u far in life. Thanks again Shazi☆☆☆☆☆

name: B Little
text: wouldn't shop here,they are not serious enough with buyers,and try to push different merchandise other than what you want.I wanted white gold,they pushed yellow gold,but a selection of white gold mens necklaces available.Figgaros,cubans,so forth and so on....

name: Kenyun Moore
text: I incourage you to go spend money some and to visit with Sales associate (Sam)

name: Aki Shin
text: Very bad experience. The customer services look very evil, when I got into the store, they looked at me unfriendly. And when I left, they talked and laughed, very rude.

name: Mrs Patrick
text: No words, do not buy from zales

name: Karolyn Lee
text: I found what I was looking for. They have a lot of pretty accessories.

name: charity Singleton
text: Had a great sale for wedding items

name: Jerry Walton
text: Grat customer service.

name: Brenda Jackson
text: Love going here but your prices are kind of pricey at times

name: Chris Oliver
text: Travianna at the Cellairis kiosk in the quintard mall was very helpful fixing my iPhone 6S screen! I highly recommend using her, I will be coming back!

name: Bonnie Turner
text: Great place to look for costume jewelry and accessories.

name: Marcy Pfirsch- Reed
text: Neat stuff.

name: Amanda Camp
text: We were the last customers on a Fri night. Our Sales Clerk was very patient with my 2 teenage girls who wanted everything but couldn't decide on anything!! Thanks

name: Alicia Towell
text: Good service

name: Jeff Doby
text: Cute

name: Buck Dingler
text: Over rated stuff

name: Kirston Tozer
text: Cool

name: John Lentine
text: A great store and wonderful owners, every time we are in Fairhope we always stop and always come away with some great jewelry. Cant say enough good things about them!

name: Graciela Blanno
text:
I could never say enough fantastic things about this place! I came here last year in November and purchased a bunch of turquoise rings, deco rings, etc . I had the BEST experience and the customer service was nothing like I had seen before . The owner is so kind and he was knowledgeable, helpful, and trusting. He really let me take my time and assisted me every time I wanted to look at something . I live in Atlanta and this shop by far exceeds any shop I’ve ever been too . I came back last weekend while on a mini vacation and the same excellent customer service! Please support this business . The owner is so kind and clearly cares about his customers . The jewelry is beautiful and I always leave with many treasures . Very fair pricing as well! I would highly recommend and give 10
Stars if I could! If you want to feel welcomed and in a warm environment this is your spot. ! Can’t wait to come back! Thank you thank you!!!!

I left with a beautiful silver and green bracelet and more rings. I also purchased some gorgeous silver hoop earrings

resp.text: It was great to see you again!  Thank you so much for coming in & the great review! We look forward to your next visit to Fairhope!

name: Marie
text: Love this store and this family! Wonderful people who are so willing to help you find the perfect piece! I visit often and always see new and exciting merchandise I can't resist! And their fur baby, Luke, is so sweet!

resp.text: Thank you Marie, we are always happy to see you!  Luke loves seeing you too!

name: Chief Bowles
text: Great unique place... The nicest people that run this place... It's a heartfelt kinda place, a touch of soul, like you were meant to go there feeling. A little of everything from collector's items to great gifts for loved one's. This place is worth seeing!

resp.text: Thank you so much!   It was a pleasure meeting you & helping find something perfect for you wife!

name: Jackson Wade
text: I try and come here every week they are the only coin and jewelry store I go to because they are so nice

resp.text: Thank you Jackson,  We always look forward to seeing you!

name: Andrew nerdalert
text: I Just found my new favorite store . I am so happy I stopped by. Its rare to find passion and knowledge and customer service in one place . I highly recommend this store

resp.text: Thank you Andrew, it was a pleasure taking care of you!

name: A
text: This is a wonderful jewelry store! They have a beautiful selection and some really unique items. Chris assisted us and was very helpful and patient. We appreciated the option to trade and were able to get something we really liked which was much nicer than we expected to be able to have. Thanks so much.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley, it was a pleasure helping you find the perfect ring & meeting your darling children!

name: Silver Mandalorian
text: I was not happy with a purchase that I had made so I returned it and was given a refund with no hassle. The customer service is top notch.

name: Phillip Tucker
text: Small shop . Helpful staff but not that knowledgeable about coins. It's worth the stop to see if they have what u are missing in your set

name: Cathy Beck
text: Beautiful Jewelry. I had some pieces repaired and the cost was less than I expected.

name: Haden Sisk
text: Wonderful jewelry at fantastic prices!  Bob, George, and Chris have all been very helpful, I bought my wife a gorgeous gold pendant here for such a low price that I also bought her a cameo pin! We will definitely deop by to pet Luke next time we are in fairhope!

name: Damien Dykes
text: Awesome place I'll definitely be back

name: Cherie Dunavan
text: Professional and friendly owners! They have a beautiful selection.

name: Ruby Hill
text: Never been here

resp.text: Hi Ruby, I hope you can come in someday & see all the beautiful, unique things we have to offer.  Thank you

name: Heather Delker
text: Wonderful owners are very helpful.

name: Sam Keske
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here while we were both in grad school at Auburn, and still enjoy visiting with everybody when we visit. The signature jeweler in Auburn, and family owned for many years - you may even catch Ronnie Ware on a good day. Great for Tacori, Rolex, John Hardy, etc., down to Christmas ornaments and glassware.

name: Cindy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Anwar LNU
text:
Met Lisa on my most recent visit to Auburn.  I am in the market for a Rolex and she was the consumate professional, extremely knowledgeable, charming and polite.  She educated me regarding the demand for these timepieces and wished me well even though she didn't have what I wanted at the time.
Would definitely suggest a visit to Ware Jewelers if you are in the market for a Rolex and definitely ask for Lisa!

name: Scott Holley
text: I have been doing business with Ronnie and Tina for 20 years. They have great merchandise and service. They are always so helpful. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tammy Benda
text: I love working with family businesses that treat you right and value your business.  Ware is one of the best!  The jewelry is what brought me in.  The people make it the only place I will shop for jewelry again.

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather and given to my grandmother. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force in a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring, and shortly after, the diamond fell out... the list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! We are totally heartbroken over the pearls and wouldn’t want anyone else to ever experience that!

name: Austin Till
text: McKee is absolutely wonderful and the biggest help I could have ever asked for. I go to her for all my gift needs. You won't be disappointed with her friendly, Grade A service.  If you're looking for someone helpful, look no further. I will continue to be a Ware customer as long as McKee is employed there.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I live in Montgomery but while I was in Auburn I went by Ware's to see if they could adjust the band on a Cartier watch I was wearing. Ware's doesn't sell Cartier, but I know they sell and repair Rolexes so I felt confident in their ability to work on my Cartier. They did a quick and excellent job, of course. One of these days I'm going to get one of their Auburn watches!

resp.text: Thank you, Carol!  It's always a pleasure to be of service.

name: Parker Johnston
text: I had a very good experience at Ware today.  Worth the trip over from Columbus.  Justin fixed my watch while I waited and it looks great.  Thanks and great job!

resp.text: Thank you, Parker!  We're glad to know it was worth the trip.  We appreciate you going out of your way to entrust your watch to us!

name: Ben McCoy
text: I have bought all my wife's jewlery here even living in another state I always come back!  Jo is the best at keeping me out of the dog house!  They have the best prices and make sure everything is perfect!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben!  Jo does have a talent for helping pick out just the right gift to help soothe the raging seas.

name: Michele Kostelecky
text: We loved our experience at Ware Jewelers!  Thank you so much for being so kind and helpful to us.  Lisa Stevens was great and making us feel at ease and comfortable in our purchases and decisions.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Michelle!  Lisa's a real gem, and we're glad you had such a wonderful experience working with her.

name: Lexie McCormick (Lexie)
text: Ware Jewelers is the only jewelry store I will shop at. Everyone is so nice and you get help as soon as you walk in the doors! They have the prettiest jewelry I have ever seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Alexis!  We always want to make everyone feel right at home when they come through our doors!

name: Paul Berngard
text: Amazing experience.  Lisa is excellent and gives the best customer service.   Have purchased numerous timepieces from her and will only go through her for future buys.   If you are looking to get a Rolex or any other piece of fine jewelery do not hesitate to go see Lisa.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Paul!  We agree completely that Lisa's service and knowledge are top-of-the-line, and we count ourselves lucky to have her.

name: J Sims
text: Went in with my Girlfriend this evening looking for engagement rings for her. Was served by Jennifer, her service was superb. And the selection was just as fantastic. Will definitely be purchasing my rings from Wares.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  I know Jennifer will be thrilled to help you find the perfect ring when the time comes!

name: Kimberly Burns
text: Friendly & helpful customer service. Beautiful jewelry. I've been a loyal customer for over 30 years!! Love Ware Jewelers!!  😀

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kimberly!  It means the world to us that you've trusted us for so long!

name: Ann Canon
text: Wares has been, in my opinion, the top jewelry store in the southeast. When I need to shop for jewelry or for gifts I always shop there first. My mother never shopped anywhere else for wedding gifts.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ann!  It really means the world to us to hear from our long-standing clients.  You and your mother really exemplify the kind of local connections that have kept us in business for 70 years now.

name: Luis Dopico
text: Ware Jewelers is absolutely the best jewelers. I have tried several other jewelers since moving away from Auburn and I have never had the same level of service and quality. Now, I will only go to Wares for new items or repair or redesign of older items. I have learned my lesson. It doesn't pay to go anywhere else. Also, I wanted a custom piece made and the jewelers at Ware's exceeded anything I could have ever imagined. They don't just create jewelry, they create memories. Thanks to Lisa Stevens who is absolutely amazing to work with and will do whatever it takes to make sure you find exactly the special piece you are looking for!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Luis!  It means the world to us that you've been so satisfied with our services for so long.  We'll do our best to keep exceeding expectations and hope to keep you happy for many years to come!  And lest I forget, yes, Lisa really does go above and beyond to make sure her clients get taken care of.  We're glad you've gotten to experience that first hand!

name: Chennan Xue
text: Very helpful and friendly staffs. Helped me adjust my watch strap (actually twice) and didn't charge me. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated! We are always just a phone call or email away ! Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Melissa Warnke
text: Tina and Ronnie helped us find exactly what we wanted, and their customer service is unmatched! Thank you for making our experience so great!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Melissa!  It was a pleasure having you in, and we loved helping you!

name: Judith Jones
text: Always helpful. Always kind!  Great inventory!!!  I use their lawaway service every year and start my Christmas shopping early!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judith!  The layaway plan really is a great option for keeping on top of your gift-giving plans!

name: Kayla Sprayberry
text: I dropped my engagement ring off on Saturday to get resized and got it back Monday evening it looks amazing. Great price would definitely recommend ware jewelers to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kayla!  We're always happy to help.

name: Darlene Smith
text: I love shopping at Ware's! The customer service is excellent and I can trust their expertise to help me pick the perfect gift for those special occasions!

resp.text: Thank you, Darlene!  We're always happy to help.

name: T. P.
text: Ben was so very helpful, I never felt rushed and he was extremely knowledgeable and professional. I would highly recommend Ware Jewelers for your next purchase.

resp.text: Thank you, Tonja!  We've counted ourselves very lucky to have Ben as part of the Ware family, his concern for his clients really is second to none.

name: Angie Kelsoe
text: Beautiful downtown Auburn Store, knowledgeable and friendly staff. Jennifer Chastain was such a tremendous help with our experience at Ware!

name: Philipe Aldahir

text: Found a lot of really good sales when I went. My niece was spending her birthday money. Some really nice items and outfits to choose from. She bought a really cute outfit. She's a size 2. Her mom bought her some shoes from there that she liked as well.  The cashier was pleasant.

name: Ultreya Park
text:
Great deals again today, $5 espadrilles and a red rain jacket. So busy, no time for them to keep up w/picking up. LOTS of variety here. Friendly staff.

Few months ago, extra 50% off clearance and a lot to choose from. Picked up a jean jacket @ $9.50, sunglasses @ $5.53, gorgeous-blue cabbie hat @ $3.50, black wrap-type sweater-shrug, a crop sweatshirt, both @ $4.50, and for $2.50 each, a bright pink crossbody bag in shiny dark pink, and black flat dressy shoes that were not marked clearance, expected to pay $17.90! The manager was super-friendly, made sure we knew about the sale, offered help. The store was cleaner and more organized than sometimes. Ran out of time or I am sure I would have found more.

name: Reema Eqab
text: !!Completely disorganized and terrible service!! The customer service at this location was the worst I've see in a long time. Most of the employees were on their phones. When I went to the dressing room, the girl, without looking up from her phone, said "go ahead"  I was hesitant because she didn't ask to count my clothes. When I left the dressing room, I asked her where she wanted me to put my clothes, and she didn't answer. Then I said "do you want them here?" and she says, "put them over there." And as soon as I left, I heard her do a long attitude exhale. There was no organization in the clothes either, the shirts and pants were literally mixed around everywhere on all the racks. The jewelry section wasn't any better, the necklaces were all tangled together. We don't have a forever 21 in my location, so I decided to come here, but I don't think I'll waste my time next time. I'll just go to the Destin location.

name: Haleigh Lynch
text: I used to love this location but just recently walked out empty handed because the line was from the register and about 20 customers long which I would have been happy to wait in because I understood on Fridays at around 5 pm is a busy time what I did not understand was the multiple employees on two registers playing and about 5 employees near the exit that went to the parking lot walking in and out playing with the security sensors on their name badges. I understand not everyone is comfortable with working on a register and understand when there's down time to have fun but when a line is almost to the mall entrance? No thanks, I will take my business to Rue 21 and go to Panama City Beach  in Florida and shop at that Forever 21 location to get better customer service!

I tried to hand her t-shirt and she didn’t notice at first and when she did, she snatched it out of my hands. The cashier shoved the bag in my hand and immediately turned back to continue talking with her coworker while I was checking out. This wasn’t the first time I have had horrible customer service here and it is very disappointing.

Called them, and they gave me go in circles calling FedEx and what not. 6 months later still didn't get a final result. Never got my refund, emailed them, never received a reply, called them again, was told the same thing, 5-10 business days for the refund to go through. Still nothing. And it's almost Christmas and everytime it gets close to November, I'm just so upset about it. I didn't call my bank bc I thought they were going to fix the issue. Just so disappointed. Haven't shopped there since. I normally order my stuff online because I don't like going into the stores, very messy and unorganized. And after this incident, just really don't want to work with people like that.

text: I know that their prices can be a little on the up side so I usually don't stop to buy I just browse. I had been looking for a place to get my 4 month olds ears pierced, and they do it! It has been extremely hard to find anyone because of "COVID". They were very professional, and the lady took great care of us! I have already recommended them!

name: Dan Quixote
text: Went to get my daughters ears pierced the Friday before last. The woman who claimed to be the manager was rude and acted like she had something better to do than to talk to my wife and I, and what ultimately deterred me from the transaction was the fact she was wearing a tank top. I wouldn’t want her arm pits in my face, so I spared my child that experience. We went to Claire’s and had a great experience with a well dress, kind mannered woman who made my child feel at ease.

name: janell johnson
text: Do not go to this place if you are piercing your yound child's ears. I just left from trying to get my 3 year old daughters ears pierced. She was excited and we let her pick her own earrings out. A nice lady helped us but you could tell she was new and learning. She kept having to ask questions to her supervisors who acted like they were too busy to help her, which ultimately took way longer than what it should have taken to complete the transaction, about 45 mins before we were finally asked to come sit in the chair. By that time my daughter was becoming impatient  and started to get nervous. We went to sit in the chair and she started to freak out. The employees just starred at her. They werent nicely trying to tell her that it would be quick or that it would be okay. They just starred. Previously my husband asked if we could pay after the piercing had been done because we werent sure if our daughter would go through with it. We were told no we had to pay immediately. After a minute of trying to get my daughter to cooperate I asked if we could get a refund. We were told no, they do not do refunds. I asked if we could come back another day after she had time to calm down, again we were told no. HORRIBLE, INCONSIDERATE CUSTOMER SERVICE. We took the earrings we paid for and left.

resp.text: Janell, we are so sorry to hear about this experience and will follow up with our team to address what you've stated here. Thank you for being so open about your visit.

From the very beginning Robyn has helped my wife pick out all of our fixtures and it has been one of the easiest parts of building our house.

text: As a plumber they don't have a lot of stuff I need alot of times. But good people I don't know about anything else.

name: Olivia Hardy
text: My husband went to the back to buy a blower unit for the inside part of our A/C. When he got there he found out that they don't sell them as a unit like they used to. You have to buy just the motor, so that's what he bought. When he gets it home, he finds out that it didn't have mount brackets so I went up there to get one that does. I was then told that none of the motors come with bracket mounts. I made the comment that he should have told my husband that so he could have gotten it while he was there. It's hot and this is our A/C unit we're trying to fix in the middle of a hot day. The gentleman said it wasn't his job to know what a person knew or not. I told him that he knew more than my husband on what parts come with what, that's when a woman came around counter and said that she was the owner and that I didn't need to talk to her employee that way. I wasn't being rude or belligerent. I just didn't think it would have been that hard to ask if the customer knew it didn't come with bracket mounts, especially if he brought an older model in. This will be the last time my family and I will be back to that store and before today, I would have recommended that store to anyone. Now I'll tell people to stay away. It's nothing like it used to be.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hardy,
You did not speak to the owner for I am the owner, and I was at another store that day, you spoke to a co-worker, but Mrs. Hardy we have no idea what a customer's needs are until they inform us.
There are hundreds of units, and they change models every year, and the servicemen have to request what they need from us. We are a supply house, not a service company, and we are sorry that your husband did not realize he need additional products, but that was his call and not ours. Your husband was servicing his own unit.
We try and make all customers happy, and were sorry that you were disappointed, but do realize we have no idea what is wrong with a central unit until a serviceman request a particular part.

text: Ok. The ladies who work at this location are the absolute best! They have always been extremely helpful when I need something for my wife. They also just helped me pull off a huge surprise for her birthday. I cannot say enough good things about them.

name: Lacey Graves
text: I arrived at this location at 6:02 in a Friday evening and their sign said they closed at 6pm. Not very good business hours for a Friday evening and how can they cater to the working woman? There was another customer inside and the doors we locked. I stood at the door and an associate finally came.  I explained I knew exactly what Iwas looking for.  A ring that was sold out online in my size.  I drove all the way from Decatur in hopes to find it.  I shared this and she said she couldn't let me in the store as they could only be open for so many hours. What does that even mean?  There was still a customer inside.  She closed the door on me and I was extremely disappointed. I am a long time customer of Brighton from Florida that just moved to the area.  I was happy to know there was a store close enough I could still spoil myself at.  I also work for a major retailer who does not close their doors till 15 minutes AFTER their posted hours.  Very poor customer service when retailers are struggling these days.  I will not revisit this location.  They have lost my future business.  I hope Brighton and the associates consider what customer service is to them, bending the rules just a little isn't bad for business.

text: Out of business. Clothes were decent, but not enough options for anyone over a size 12.

text: From what I saw it's a very popular place

text: Loved it!  Wish we had one in Indiana close to me

name: Ariel Whitney
text: The workers at the Charlotte Russe (CR), Tuscaloosa, AL, University Mall location have very bad attitudes and give very poor service. They lie to customers by telling them that the store closes at 5:30 p.m. on Sunday's, which is clearly not true if the gates aren't even shut; and the hours online clearly reflect that they are not supposed to be closing until 6 p.m. They also have this lady named Shelia who attempts to intimidate customers by standing at the entrance like a security guard with a stick shooing them away and telling us as customers that we can not enter the store. If they are that miserable working at CR, FIND ANOTHER CAREER. A customer service job is obviously NOT for you. Shelia, is one disgusting human being that needs prayer. I really hope corporate steps in because those workers are tarnishing the reputation of Charlotte Russe. I love CR, but I would advise any and everyone I know and don't know not to shop at that particular location. They are simply rude.

name: Riah Gibson
text: The store is great, although the workers always have bad attitudes and they do not help you

name: Arter Leigh
text: Going out of business.... Everything was 1$ but not much inventory left

name: Beth Mallette
text: Having a closing sale!

name: m ruth walker
text: Love this place

name: Daniel Warden

name: GaryCraigosaurus
text: I have been doing business here for years and I am always happy with the experience. I have sold to and bought from Patrick with great result. A very fine business.

name: April A

name: Alfred Julian
text:
wonderful place to buy and sell coins. The owner of the store is very
fair i have been dealing with him a long time buying and selling. i
normally do not post my opinions for everyone to see but i happened
to see where some clown posted that the owner had told him what
his coin was worth but had one in his case for much higher. did you
look at the date, the condition, did you ask the owner why his was so
much more, i think not ,you had rather give a bad review than find out
that the coin you had was substandard. clowns like this one is the reason
i do not put a lot of faith in someones opinion i read on line.

name: Marc Alan
text: I recommend Oneonta Coin Exchange to everyone! Patrick is fair and experienced with coins. I learned a lot during my short visit. Thanks Patrick!
