name: Icysnoow S
text: Not very happy about how I took a coin in and he said not worth much yet he had same one for 89 bucks lol

resp.text: Unfortunately,this happens from time to time.I appraise countless coins from the public each year.I will always try and be respectful and charge no fee for most evaluations.In some incidences, coins are worth less than people think.In this case the person had the same type coin that I had in the case,but a different date,not realizing the one I had in the display case was a much rarer date.There are so many factors that determine a coins value...condition,date and mint marks, among many other factors.

name: Chy Goodwin
text: Awesome place with the nicest pple ever

name: Mary Moody
text: A great place

name: Aaron Ayers
text: Patrick is very knowledgable about coinage and is very helpfull in helping me put together my sets

name: Matthew Chapman
text: Great Gallery with a beautiful mix of art and gift items.  I unfortunately do not live local, but I have had the pleasure of visiting in person a few times. The owner and staff have always been extremely nice and helpful. The bulk of my purchases have been via phone & online, all orders have shipped prompt and carefully packed.

resp.text: Thank you so much Matthew! Thank you for supporting out small business and local artist!

name: Laura Wilson
text:
Four Seasons Gallery has some beautiful local art plus lots of unique  gifts for just
about everyone including pottery from Peter's Pottery and EttaB Pottery bith from Mississippi. The staff is always friendly and helpful. They even sell Twine a pure CBD oil.

name: Melanie Messer
text: I love this place. Great place to find unique gifts for family & friends & the owner & staff are always very helpful. Go check it out!

resp.text: Thank you Melanie for the lovely review. I'm happy to know you love shopping at Four Seasons Gallery!

name: Tish Weaster
text: Love their presentation and items.   They are helpful without being pushy.  Lovely place for unusual gifts.

resp.text: Thank you Tish. So glad we could be helpful.

name: Julia Peart
text: Great art and gift gallery! Lots of neat items, jewelry and gorgeous paintings...sweet ladies to help you too!

name: Sylvia N.
text: Top Shelf customer service helps you find the perfect, unique gift for the one you love who has everything.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. You are a wonderful customer.

name: Stuart Lee
text: Great place! Owner and staff are so nice and very knowledgeable. Lots of unique art and season items. Check out the website. It is very up to date.

name: Andrea von Herrmann
text: Love all of the offerings and the people who help. So kind and helpful with great ideas.

name: A H
text: I’ve been to a number of jewelry shops and I can’t recommend this family jeweler highly enough.  I have bought an engagement ring and wedding rings, and a 20th anniversary ring here and they have ALWAYS been gracious and helpful.  I sent in a wedding ring to be sized once years ago after other shops told me they couldn’t do it (I wasn’t living in the local area at the time).  It required extra gold to expand it, and they refused to charge me even after I insisted.  I felt like they valued the relationship as much as the business.  I won’t go anywhere else.

name: mia fiterman
text: What amazing service and attention to detail!!! I took 3 repairs and 2 appraisals and I couldn't be more pleased! Shop local and you won't regret it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the nice review Mia!

name: Rus Hardy
text: Great people.  Couldn't ask for better!

name: David Atkins
text: We have been doing business with Steed's for years.  Very accommodating and excellent quality merchandise.  Would highly recommend especially if you want something out of the ordinary.

name: Nancy Kennemer
text: Have been doing business with Steeds for years. Recently they custom designed necklace to my specifications.  It’s beautiful.  Highly recommend.

name: M. Smith
text: Wonderful, family owned business. Dale and Lee are always very accommodating and very helpful. Highly recommend.

name: Sadie Wall
text: Excellent service! I needed a rush on ring sizing, and they were accommodating, got it done early, and did a beautiful job. Thank you!

name: Robert Thompson
text: Best jewelry store in town. Excellent quality and locally owned

name: Eric Miller (SPYDER)
text: All right place but a bit pricey for me

name: carey high
text: Great customer service beautiful jewelry

name: Finding and Being B
text:
Maria did a really good job of repairing my ring. I’ve had my wedding ring for over 9 years and the foundation came right off while I was at work! Luckily I was able to pick up the foundation and brought it straight to Maria! I picked it up my ring today and it looks brand new! My ring received tender loving care and looked like it came out of the case!

I come to Maria for all my jewelry needs to purchase and for repairs! She is truly a diamond rough! I appreciate you!

name: alexis long
text: Amazing customer service, and very punctual. I went to a jeweler who sized my wedding ring the wrong size and totally screwed my husband and I out of $200. Maria was able to fix the mistake in a hurry and at a cheaper price. The store itself is very neat and organized.

name: Hollianne Craig
text: If you're looking for a jeweler who cares, search no more! Mrs. Maria is so sweet and patient. I know nothing about jewelry and I'm pretty shy. She let me try on engagement rings, answered all my questions, didn't rush me, and even cleaned my rings I was wearing! I really enjoyed my experience with her and will be going here for any further jewelry needs!

name: Nick Wheeles
text:
I met Maria over 12 years ago as a smitten, yet terrified 22 year old looking for the perfect engagement ring.  She was tremendously helpful as I selected a beautiful, unique, and timeless engagement ring.  Needless to say it got a “Yes” 😁.  When we had it appraised for insurance it appraised for more than I paid, and at that moment Maria had a customer for life.

She has the best customer service, high quality jewelry, and is as honest as they come.  She is the only jeweler I will ever use and I can’t recommend her enough!

Thanks Maria!!!!

name: Lisa DeWitt
text: Travelers, this is a wonderful jeweler with a lovely selection of items. Maria is so nice and helpful. She is willing to order what you want if she doesn't have it in the store. Check it out. We recommend.

name: Alveta Reese
text: Top notch jewelry and #1 customer service!

name: King Bobby
text: Wonderful jewelry and Maria is the best at finding just what you want

name: Trinity Grace
text: I went in to have my earring repaired and it was ready in two days. Excellent customer service!

name: steffen sulllivan
text: Lovely store, owner was very nice and helpful.

name: Michele Finley
text: Wonderful customer service!

name: Margaret Chambers
text: Always a pleasant experience here.

name: clinton tolbert
text: Outstanding service.

name: Nicole T. Springer
text: I was blown away by the customer service at Hudson-Poole. We came in to look at engagement rings on a Saturday about 30 minutes from closing, and the staff were incredible. I told them what I liked and my budget and they were able to help us find ones that fit what we wanted. The store is immaculate, and you can tell they truly want each customer to have a great and personalized experience. They were never pushy or looking to push us past our price point at all. Incredibly patient and just a fantastic experience all around. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: WOW!!! Thank you so much, Nicole. It means so much to us that you took the time to share this. Please come back by to see us whenever you are close. We wish you both many blessings! Sincerely, John Poole

name: Andy Love
text:
The reviews here don’t lie.. excellent customer services! My name is Holly . I have visited the store to redesign a band for my diamond ring that I’ve had for a long time but not liking the style too much.
They drawer up a beautiful fancy computer graphics design of the ring base on details I want with measurements of all angle... and even provided me a wax version of the band to try on.. and everything is free of charge.. isn’t that Amazing 💕
But I later have decided of not to go with it because my sister like the original ring and wanted to purchase the ring from me..
I felt bad to have them working so hard for me for nothing so I also purchased a beautiful pair of diamonds and citrine earring before I left the store just to thank you for their service ❤️
Love them ❤️The best in town

resp.text: Holly, you are so sweet to take the time to write this incredible review!!! We love making custom pieces with family stones. That is what makes jewelry so special, the ones that can tell the story of the family and their journey. I am so glad that your sister will be enjoying that ring. Please let us know if we can help in the future. We wish you many blessings!!

name: William Curry
text: John and his staff are exceptional. The customer service at Hudson and Poole is great. When you walk in they greet you with a smile. Ten years ago, I purchased my wife’s engagement ring here because of their wonderful reputation. With help from Krista, I got the perfect ring (All of the 4Cs) for my wife. Thanks a million.

name: Benjamin Brown
text: Very helpful and friendly staff, but the appraiser is incompetent. Don't waste your money getting your jewelry appraised here.

name: Honor Able
text: I went there a year ago to get my sons name engraved on his necklace. They were very welcoming from the moment you walk in to the moment you walk out

name: Jamie lou Purser
text: Very elegant store and friendly stafr

name: Shane Gardner
text: Awesome jewelry and great service and the best book/do it all keeper ever 👍

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: Super helpful people! Always beautiful jewelry!

resp.text: Holly, thank you so much for your kind words about our wonderful staff. We sincerely appreciate you for the time you took to give us this review!

name: Jeffrey (Jeff) Muratori
text: Great service with a friendly environment! Will definitely be going back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, Jeffrey!

name: Ashley “Kav” Kavanagh
text: Incredibly helpful staff! They appraised and cleaned my antique and new jewelry and were very intrigued by a few pieces discussing with me all the details they could tell me. Definitely will be returning for future cleanings and hopefully purchases as well!

resp.text: Ashley, we thank you so much for taking the time to give us this great review and for the five stars! Come by anytime and have a great day.

name: James Waltman
text: Wonderful collection of jewelry and other great gift ideas. The staff is knowledgeable and attentive. Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers is the ONLY place i shop for my fine jewelry needs.

name: Junea Childers
text: Traveled 108 miles getting there. Called before I went. Told them I was bringing a 1954 Gibson Mandolin. However when I got there. I was being checked in by a nice counter clerk, when all of the sudden a young man came out and abruptly rushed me out saying "there was no market for instruments". When in their TV ad they had promoted a variety of items they were accepting. Instruments included.

resp.text:
Junea,
I am so sorry that you took your time to come to our store and not get a good answer. This is the first time we have partnered with a buying group that does the variety that they do. I wish the young man had asked me or my father who in town deals in fine instruments. I have a wonderful referral for you, as we have already called one of the owners that would very much like to make an offer on your mandolin. Please contact Dan at the Guitar Gallery. Here is their website:
https://theguitargallery.com

We really hope that this works out, and we will  always be here to help in any of your jewelry needs if you can give us another chance.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice-President

name: Luke Remmert
text: Simply the best jeweler in town. No need to go anywhere else.

resp.text: We really appreciate you giving us such a wonderful review, Luke!

name: Andrew Durham
text: I’m not sure where to start to explain how happy and satisifed I am with Hudson Poole. I walked in and met Heather, and from the second I met her I felt so comfortable and like I knew her. Mrs. Jamie Poole shortly also assisted me. Mrs. Poole was absolutely wonderful. She respected my opinions, she walked me through a step in life that I am new to. Hudson Poole has my business for life. Generally, going into a fine jewelry store is a very overwhelming experience as generally the staff doesn’t open up and welcome. These folks made me feel like family. Thank you Hudson Poole for being so amazing!

resp.text: Jake, thank you so much for this incredible review!! We are extremely proud and humbled that you have chosen us to be your family jeweler, and we work very hard to keep your trust.

name: Happy Lady
text: First I would like to say thank John for doing a fantastic job with my ring. John went above and beyond to work with me. Everyone at Hudson Poole always makes me feel welcome. I will use Hudson Poole forever. The way I can custom do jewelry makes me so excited!

resp.text: WOW! This is an amazing review! Thank you so much!!

name: caroline staggers
text: Always very friendly, professional and helpful. Beautiful selection of jewelry and gifts. Do great repair work.

resp.text: Caroline, Thank you very much for this great review. We really appreciate you coming by to see us!

name: Peony
text: I spent a long time searching for a strong but delicate-looking die-struck (not cast) setting for the stones from my old broken down three-stone ring. Krista and staff helped me find the perfect setting. I drove hours to Tuscaloosa and back several times (past plenty of other jewelry stores) to get the prettiest ring and best customer service. Everyone at Hudson-Poole is responsive and so helpful--in person, by phone, text and email. The long trip was absolutely worth it!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for giving us this wonderful review! We appreciate you trusting us to reset your three stone ring. Please come by anytime for us to clean and check it.

name: Jeremey Newell
text: I had a very special wedding band sized down. I took it home and noticed it didn’t fit as well as I thought. This was a mistake that I personally made. It had nothing to do with the quality of work that Hudson-Poole provides. I went back to Hudson-Poole and asked them to resize again. Not only did they resize, but they did it at no additional costs. They said my satisfaction was their goal. Excellent customer care. They will definitely handle all of my fine jewelry business in the future.

name: Emily DeFrance
text: Their jewelry is exquisite and there are so many beautiful choices. The customer service is excellent and you feel like family when you are there.

resp.text: Emily, thank you for coming to see us and for the excellent review. We will work hard to make sure it stays this way and for anyone you send to us. I am so sorry for the late "thank you". Have a wonderful 4th of July!

name: Vivian Tant
text: Gene and his staff are phenomenal. You immediately feel at home when you walk through the door. Gene and John both did a fantastic job of helping me pick out my wedding band and my future husbands wedding band. They talked me through the whole process, and I left feeling like I knew exactly what I was getting and how important I was to their company. I will forever send anyone looking for jewelry to them! Thankful for such a wonderful company in our community!

resp.text: Vivian, thank you so much for this phenomenal review! We appreciate you letting us be the ones to help you with your wedding bands and we will continue to work hard to keep that trust to be your family jeweler.

name: George Jacob Houghtaling
text: The BEST jewelry store in Alabama!  The BEST customer service in Alabama!  The BEST prices in Alabama!  You get the idea?  I have been doing business here over 12 years and never have been disappointed.  Gene, Jamie, John, Krista and their outstanding staff are true professionals.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this awesome review, George!!

name: Leanne Phillips Mays
text: I just purchased my garnet and diamond "Roll Tide" ring from out of state. I originally saw this ring on Pinterest several years ago, and have spent many nights stressing that they would discontinue it before I could buy it. Ashley took care of me with the most professional and caring manner. My ring arrived today, and it is worth every penny. Thank you for helping my dream piece of jewelry become a reality.

name: Susie Palmer
text:
Always very friendly staff.  Always.
I brought a box-chain necklace back, which I had bought from there.  It broke as I was cleaning it.
They repaired it on my visit and I walked out with it.
Not too mention, they also helped me a with watch band adjustment (not bought from them). Noncharge.  Simply a complimentary service.
That's why I will wait, until a trip back to Alabama from Oklahoma, just to go by Hidson-Poole.  They always treat me well.
Thank you!  :)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susie. I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to give us this great review. We hope to see you the next time you are back in Tuscaloosa.

name: Kathleen Stein
text: They did a great job fixing my bracelet. Their price for the repair was very affordable and the customer service was great!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you very much, Kathleen!

name: Christien Hawthorne
text: I am absolutely in LOVE with my ring! I ordered it online and the next day received a call from John Poole who is the Vice President of the company. He told me that unfortunately the ring was out of stock but that he had already contacted the designer in New York to have them build a new one which would only take about two weeks. Sure enough, I later received another call from Mr. Poole notifying me that my ring was ready and that he would set up email alerts for the shipping so I could track the package. It arrived in a cute little wrapped box with a big bow and had a business card that was personally signed. Loved the personal touch. Awesome experience -- will definitely recommend to others!

name: HRH METALS
text: Very nice people/helpful/nice large place/probably have what you need or want

name: Barbara Nicosia
text: I left 2 pairs of earrings to be fixed.  When they called & gave me the price, I said just fix one, the other one’s too expensive for its worth.  When I picked them up, Mr. Poole told me they had fixed both of them, & he wasn’t going to charge me for the 2nd pair since it was their mistake.  So nice to find honest, reputable merchants still around!

resp.text: We really appreciate the five star rating and for this wonderful review, Barbara! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Sammy Gray
text: Exceptional service! Very courteous, and everyone went out of their way to help with all our needs. As a first time customer, I've definately found my new primary jeweler for future purchases!

name: Brittany Graham
text:
Hudson-Poole is a fantastic Place to purchase jewelry. Not only do they have an outstanding selection of merchandise that is all very different and can suit anyone’s taste, their customer service is out of this world. I will continue to shop from them, even though I am not a local, because of those two things.

They care about their customers, they have a fantastic selection, and you can tell that they care about you as a person and not just getting business from you. That, to me,  is everything. You can’t go wrong with this place! :-)

name: Kristy H
text: Big thanks to John for taking such great care of all my needs and wants. I highly recommend this company if you are looking for your next piece of jewelry! Thanks again for being so kind and taking care of me.

resp.text: Thank you so much for giving us another chance and for this wonderful review!

name: Hannah George
text: A great jewelry shop with unique merchandise good for anyone's taste! Also, incredible customer service. The workers will spend time with you to suit your needs. When my ring I had bought a month ago began to lose color, Hudson-Poole replaced it without any charge. I cannot speak highly enough on how wonderful this place is!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Hannah! We thank you for coming back to see us to let us get it right.

name: Julia Clark
text: Hudson Poole is full of some of the kindest staff members. I truly feel the people here look out for their customers best interests. A big thank you to John Poole for helping me get the necklace of my dreams in the metal color that I preferred. It's even better than I had envisioned and I cannot thank you enough.

resp.text: We are blown away by your wonderful review, Julia. Thank you so much for your time and thought that you put into it!

name: Camille Robinson
text:
Very few jewelers have all the qualities I need in meeting my expectations for superior quality merchandise, customer service and custom pieces.  Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers makes my “A List”.
I have purchased and had custom pieces made by Hudson-Poole for many years.  In fact, I am working with John Poole now on a new custom ring.  If you are looking for a professional jeweler, visit Hudson-Poole in Tuscaloosa,Alabama.

Camille Ogden Robinson

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great review, Camille!

name: joseph ushe
text: First class, actual people who want to Help you and make sure you are happy! I will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great review, Joseph!

name: Natalia Go
text: If I could give a 10 star out of 5, I would! Hudson-Poole saved my wedding day! This is probably the best jewelry store I every walked into. My fiancee and I don't have a big budget for our wedding and we needed something that we could afford. Ashley was there with us every step of the way, making sure that we get the rings we want and that we stay on budget. She is a hero! Plus, they offer services for maintenance and repairs, some for free. I definitely love Hudson-Poole <3 This will be the first place I would go to for any piece of jewelry.

resp.text:
Natalia,
I read your review and was blown away! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great testimonial. I spoke with Ashley and Tanner and we all truly appreciate you both thinking of us for your wedding rings.  We will do all we can to continue to be your family jeweler. The next time you are by the store I would really like to thank you in person, so please ask for me when you do. I wish you many blessings and Godspeed in all of your hopes and dreams together.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice President

name: Connie Harris
text: The girls that helped me were very kind and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Connie, for this five star review!

name: Kaitie Brihn
text: Everyone was very nice and helpful!

resp.text: Katie, thank you so much for stopping by and for this great review!

name: Patterson "Patt" Howard
text: Such a lovely buying experience at Hudson-Poole today. I felt well advised, knowledgeable staff and a very fair price on a lovely set of pearls for our mother. We will shop again with this store.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words, Patt. We hope that we can continue to go above and beyond on our service to remain your family jeweler.

name: Marsha McAllister
text: I would give Hudson Poole more than 5 stars if I could. All the employees are nice and knowledgeable. And the customer service is great. Repairs are timely.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Also,  thank you for thinking of us for your jewelry repair needs.

name: Kayla Fleischer
text: Absolutely stunning! The staff was more than courteous and delightful! They take the time to answer all your questions and really help you find that right piece. In love!

resp.text: Kayla, thank you so much for taking the time to give us this fantastic review! We truly appreciate it. Let us know if there is anything we can do for you.

name: Vicki Baggett
text: I love supporting local family owned businesses and Hudson Poole Fine Jewelers makes this so easy for me. They always treat me like family and go above and beyond to meet my needs. Whether I'm needing a gift, making a big purchase, or only getting a repair done they are always so eager to assist me any way they can.

name: Andrew Todd
text: I came in to have an additional appraisal performed for an engagement ring that I purchased for my girlfriend. They looked at the stone recommended revising the language of the existing appraisal rather than having a second appraisal performed. They extended the highest-quality service to me, even though the recommendation resulted in me not making a purchase today. I will use them for all my jewelry needs in Tuscaloosa!

name: Caroline Shines
text: This is my number 1 place everything is beautiful

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Caroline! You make our day every time we see you!

name: Heather Reeves
text: Rachel is one of the sweetest, genuine people to assist people with jewelry purchases.  Ale is very honest and informed. Her trustworthiness is impressive which will always bring customers back.

name: Willie Aaron
text: I have been doing business with this company for several now and each time it has been a class act. Mr. and Mrs. Poole have been wonderful to deal with. Highly recommended!!

name: Alwyn Protheroe

Yet another shot of excellent service ! ! !
Having dealt with Hudson Pool for several, several years, with John in particular, I can say that not one time have I had ANY cause to complain about the service I have had, they are people who will go out of their way to help you.

resp.text: Alwyn, thank you so much for writing such a fantastic review for our store. We thank you for always thinking of us!

name: Angelique Dean
text: The staff at Hudson-Poole are always so helpful and kind! I get the best service from them whether I'm purchasing jewelry or just getting my ring cleaned!

text: Very kind and helpful employees! Went in to get my glasses repaired, they were very efficient.

text: Very helpful picking out my finances wedding band! Thank you Tanner for your time and friendly service!

resp.text: Mark, Thank you for taking the time to give us this great review.

text: Great people and great service!  Trust/integrity/knowledge-exactly what a jeweler should be.

name: Rebecca Fleisig
text: They are so helpful and kind!! The only jeweler I go to in Tuscaloosa or Birmingham. Cannot sing praise high enough!

name: Christina Wilson
text: My friend and I literally sat, watched and actually heard them talking bad about me after I purchased a $3,000 ring. I bought my ring last Tuesday. They hurried it's sizing for me so it would be ready. That's ONE star. They told me it would be ready at 2pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 3pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 4pm. Wasn't. Then, at 5pm, I was told she left to pick up my ring, would be back in 15 minutes and I could go ahead and head up there. 30 minutes later I'm there. My ring isn't. An hour and 15 minutes later and she's not back with my ring. An hour and a half later, she's there with my ring. Isn't nice. Isn't happy. Isn't smiling. This is the MANAGER. She hands me my rings, doesn't ask if they fit ok, doesn't ask if I like them, doesn't ask if that would complete my purchase or if I need anything. Throws it in a box, hands it to me without saying a word and walks away! They talked bad about me because I'm already under the pressure of my wedding, getting my rings on time and I'm mad because they've told me lies all day long! Of course I'm going to be upset! I was lied to several times! What sucks for them?? I was preparing to buy a bracelet and a pair of earrings but instead, I walked out. When we got home we closed our credit account with them. TWO stars because my rings are absolutely beautiful. But, I will never go there again! She was sooo nice when she was selling me the rings but after she got her commission, she no longer cared if she upset me or not. She's the manager, yet her and her two employees sat there and talked about me while all three staring at me! So, two stars. For my beautiful rings and them helping me get my rings on time. What really sucks is I already left her a great review from when she wanted my money and sold me the rings. I'd love to speak to someone higher up, but they all seem to believe their employees, even if there are cameras. BTW, when I left, I went to Kay's and bought my earrings and bracelets from them! I was treated wonderfully there and would definitely recommend them! Not Zales.

name: Isaac Redding
text: Came to the store and found the ring my fiance wanted, ordered it and when it came in it was a 7 instead of a 6. They told me they could resize it but I wanted to pop the question, so, I told them I'd bring it back after the proposal. I ask her and she said yes but noticed, the chocolate diamonds that were supposed to be there were regular white diamonds. So, we dropped it off and now it's been two months and they won't give us the ring back and won't refund the ring. Beware of this place, read the other reviews they are scam artists that are trying to find behind a corporate name.

name: Charity Walker
text: I'm so disappointed and aggravated. Sent in my engagement ring to be sized BEFORE THANKSGIVING. I called multiple times after 3 weeks because they said that's about how long it would take. I called the Monday before  Christmas and they said it was shipping still.. Since then I've called daily with no one answering my calls. Someone finally answered today and said it was still shipping but then called my fiance back and said it is here.. when i arrived at the store and tried it on its STILL too loose. Oh and the lady said its been done since 12/10. No one bothered to call us. Horrible experience and ill have to get it resized again, but I'm going to go somewhere else for that now.

name: zoey bryant
text: My boyfriend got me an engagement ring and planned a trip to propose to me. He let them know his plans and what date we were going out of town. The sales team promised and assured him it would be back in time for his planned trip. It was not

name: Madeline Hawkins-Standley
text: This is a review on Signet Jewelers, the company that owns Zales, Kay, and Jarred. This Zales location is where my husband, the man in uniform in the picture below, bought my wedding ring (#19868058) on October 2017. When first purchased from Zales, the ring had a morganite stone, which was beautiful, but I had my heart set on aquamarine. We also purchased the lifetime warranty on the ring, and later another warranty just on the aquamarine stone I picked out. To make a long story short (for character count) during our time at Zales we were lied to, given false information, struggled getting in touch with the store as well as returned calls, and were pressured to purchase an aquamarine stone at a price much higher than previously discussed. Overall, my husband and I were very displeased with the service we received at Zales. Anyway, after a painstaking process, I finally got my ring back around December-January with the new aquamarine stone. Being fed up with Zales, my husband and I decided to go to Kay to have our wedding bands made. We went the same day I got my ring back from Zales to begin the process of ordering our wedding bands through Kay. His wedding band was relatively simple and took only about a month or 2 until we were able to pick it up, however, mine had to be custom made to fit the oval of my wedding ring. I picked the french beaded design Kay had for my wedding band to be made and they put all the information into the computer system. Kay assured us the bands would be ready in time for our wedding and that they would give us a call when I was able to pick my engagement ring up and to review and approve a molding of my wedding band. About 2 months went by and we hadn't heard anything, but I needed my ring for our engagement party. I had it for about a week and was told Kay needed it back to make the wedding band. Finally at about April or May we received the call that I was able to pick up my engagement ring, but never had a molding to look at and approve. In late May, about 2 weeks before we were getting married, Kay called and said my wedding band was ready. Upon seeing my wedding band that we had waited 4-5 months for the first time, I burst out crying uncontrollably and couldn't even speak to the lady. They had made the band in the wrong design. I was told that I either had to use that band to be married with and then we could start the process all over again after our honeymoon or that I wouldn't have anything to be married with. After several discussions with corporate, we were able to get our money back in full for my wedding band. I felt so defeated... I only had my engagement ring about 2 months out of our 9 month engagement period and I had no wedding band to be married with. Luckily, we found a local, family owned store that was able to make my wedding band in 2 weeks. Lou's in fact overdid themselves and made my wedding band OVERNIGHT! I saw the molding one day and was able to pick up my wedding set the next day! They saved us. But back to my aquamarine wedding ring. On the 5th day of our cruise I lost my stone. As you can see in the pictures below, the prong completely broke off and the stone fell out. I searched the ship for 4 hours, sobbing the entire time and finally a little girl found the stone at the bottom of the pool! We took the ring back to Zales as soon as we got back to port and they soldered a new prong on in about 2 weeks or so. Not even a month later when we were in Savannah for my birthday, I was taking my wedding set off to clean it and the band completely snapped in half (picture bellow). I took my ring to a local Zales a few days later, but not until another area on the band broke, leaving my ring in 2 pieces. Since we had the complete warranty on the ring and stone and this was the second time the ring had broken I told Zales that I wanted my aquamarine stone put into a new setting. Well now I have my ring back. No new setting, just soldered in 3 separate places. Now I'm scared just to put the ring on my finger. Why are we treated like this when we've paid so much money?

name: Nemindra Mahathalagalage
text: I went to the Zales store in Mobile AL to buy piece of jewelry and I was there for 5 minutes nobody came to greet me.  One lady was having a personal discussion with another person and laughing.  She saw me but didn't even want to say hi.  Just want to let you know went the Kay jewelers and spent 3K.  Service is horrible!  Not recommending your store to anyone.

name: Tyler Etheridge
text: I would give zero if I could. I made a purchase through Zales which was shipped by UPS. The order was lost by UPS and Zales refuses to refund my money or resend the order until UPS investigates which takes 30 days. This was a Christmas gift that won't make it before the holiday!

name: E Bee
text: great people  working who love there job

name: GeKayla Williams
text: My boyfriend and I will NEVER purchase anything else from Zales. Their team is horrible and I mean horrible when it comes to communicating with each other. A necklace that was purchased for me for Christmas was brought back to the store to get repaired in April they gave us a promise date of the next week. Since then we’ve called them four different time and has received four different dates and everyone I talk to seems to have no knowledge of what’s going on and when my necklace will be repaired and sent back to the store.

name: Jamie O'Bryant
text: Paid for a nice wedding band there. The display one was broken,  so they had to order another one.  They told us to take the broken display ring,  and "exchange" it when the new one came in.  I was not willing to be responsible for a ring that was already broken that I was not planning to keep. They finally agreed that we could pay and then pick up the ring when it came in 5 days.   Over a month later,  and several calls,  they couldn't figure out where the ring was, maybe they never ordered it.   They told us on Thursday that they'd order it and they'd call us Monday.  By Wednesday we called several times,  no answer EVER at the store during business hours.  Finally got an answer,  and they hung up on me.  We drove to the store,  waited in a huge crowd while only 3 employees tried to handle at least 20 customers (days before Christmas).  The only good thing about the experience was the person we purchased from was nice and spent time with us, and the person we requested our refund from was very understanding.  When we got there,  they did have the ring,  but we just got a refund because we don't want to deal with this location ever again.  There's plenty of other jewelers in Mobile,  even if we end up spending more money. We don't want to deal with a lifetime of repairs,  cleanings, resizings, etc through this location.  They have a nice selection and good deals,  but I'd only buy for something that is a one time thing,  like a necklace,  not something that you'll need to deal with them regularly.

name: mario vantez
text: Not a single pharmacist or employee wearing a mask. Please respect the safety of your customers in the future.

resp.text: While I do respect your ability to have an opinion on the wearing of masks, context certainly does get lost when our intent is to lecture someone instead of attempting to solve a problem no matter if it is real or perceived.  We strive to make ALL patients and employees comfortable but we also respect their personal decisions.  I do not feel as though immediately taking comments to the internet instead of addressing your concerns in a personal manner is necessary nor is this the appropriate forum for the airing of grievances.  You, Sir, have a wonderful day!  John N. Holley

text: Claire's overall has some cute things but it's the ear piercing that worries me. Claire's uses a piercing gun which is not recommended and can damage your cartilage in your ear or on your body. They also say they clean the piercing guns but you can't really sterilize a piercing gun. Be careful and safe, some are lucky, some aren't. P.S. Find a piercing place that uses needles and has professionals. It will be more expensive but I promise you it'll be worth it. Sometimes you have to get surgery depending on how bad the piercing went and that can be over $1000.

name: Emily Wilson
text:
01/16/2021

Claire’s
Shoppes at Bel Air
3464 Joe Treadwell Dr
Mobile, AL 36606

My daughter and I had been looking forward to our ‘Mommy-Daughter’ date for weeks.  Though I think that having your ears pierced is something of a right of passage that should happen in the pre-teen years, a step closer to becoming a young woman, and she is about half that age, I'm a sucker for my little girl and we decided this would be our event for the day.  I researched online and found a few places that were still offering this service despite this pandemic.  We finally landed on Claire's as it appeals to children in her age group.

As an added bonus to the day, my niece, who is just a few years older than my daughter, and my teenage nephew got to come with us.  Big Girl's Day and extra help to keep them wrangled.  We entered the store and asked a young woman sweeping the floor near a large unmarked puddle of water how to get started.  Without lifting her head she replied quickly, “you get in line," and stepped past us to keep sweeping.

Still unsure of what to do, my nephew saw the sign situated nearly above the entrance, something that wouldn't have been seen without guidance or turning around to leave.  After waiting in line for about 30 minutes for the 4 customers ahead of us to be seen, another employee asked for my driver's license.  I explained that I only have the temporary PDF version because I recently renewed it, but it is perfectly legal per Alabama Code.

"We have to have the paper copy," she said.

I argued, "But this is valid."

"I signed a contract for the company that says I have to have a paper copy of your license."

I stared, in awe, that she could say that to two excited young girls without even so much as a fake frown, but kept her face as blank and emotionless as Ben Stein's is when he verbally buries an opponent in a trivia competition.  My daughter's eyes welled with tears.  I quickly assured her that this is not a failed evening because I could call someone to bring their license from home and we could still get it done tonight.

We browsed the thousand's of items for sale while we waited for our help who was only 20 minutes away at most.  The glue-on nails and clearance jewelry was sure to extend the evening's fun.  It was hard to stay focused on the good time, however, when the first woman we spoke with that was sweeping the floors nearly ran into my daughter as she barreled past with a mop, then a few minutes later made a point to put a returned item back on the shelf directly behind my daughters feet, throwing it instead of placing it, and hitting my daughter's ankle.  A simple "sorry" may have helped my growing annoyance, but she said absolutely nothing at all.  Nothing.

Once our help arrived, we cheered together and made our way back to the now empty ear piercing line.  We waited for several minutes, but no one came to help us.  After trying to wave someone down, our hero with the license left us in line to find help.  He was told that they were closing in 10 minutes and needed to mop so they could go home, so they weren't going to do the piercing.

The look of defeat on my daughter broke my heart and while her cousins comforted her, I placed the souvenir's we intended to buy in addition to the starter earrings on the shelf closest to us and wasn't shy about letting my baby girl know that it's ok, and that because of the uncalled for, horrid way they treated us, we will never shop at a Claire's again, and will make the date a weekend long event by going elsewhere to get it done tomorrow.

I wanted to scream.  What purpose did the nasty attitude and horrendous customer service serve for Clarie's or their employees?  But instead of making my darling feel even worse by causing a scene and publicly scolding those wicked-acting women  like I wanted to, I decided to go the route of public shaming and posting our way-less-than-pleasant experience online for others to take into consideration when choosing the best place to share that memory with their babies.

Don't go to Claire's.  They suck.

name: Amy Hibbs
text:
Josh has created 2 custom rings for me. The first was my wedding band and I love it. The second was a huge undertaking. I lost my 3 year old son in a drowning accident, 12 years ago. I had a diamond given to me at his birth and wanted a ring made with it. He would have turned 16 this year and I wanted to remember him with a Sweet 16 Ring as his mama. We worked together to create a one of a kind antique style ring with several of my diamonds and sapphires i purchased from Josh for my son’s birthstone.
He showed me computer generated pictures of what it would look like, but it did not even compare to the final product. This ring is an artist’s masterpiece!! Josh is such a talented artist and he truly exceeded my greatest expectations for this ring! It means the world to me!
If you need a custom made ring or any jewelry whatsoever, do not look anywhere else. Josh is extremely knowledgeable and easy to work with. He will meet every single dream you have for the jewelry you want! I’ll never go anywhere else!

resp.text: We are so very honored to have played a part in your story,  and am grateful that you enjoy the ring so much.  Thank you!

name: Kit Jones
text:
First,  this is a Christian-based fine jewelry establishment! For those of you who are serious about an engagement and marriage ...this is definitely the place to serve you and your family! First my fiancé (now my husband) and I were living in Washington, DC when we saw a piece that Mr. Davis created! I loved the lady's ring some much that I had to know where she purchased the ring. She referred us to Mr. Davis at Davis Fine Jewelry. We flew down to visit with him about 6 months before the wedding. He was very direct and straight forward about cost, delivery time and steps that would be included in fruition to the finished product. He was true to his word. From the moment he finished casting the mold for my unique one-of-a kind ring, he called to allow me to see the size, demensions and make sure I was comfortable and satisfied with the direction the project was going. Even in the middle of the business's move from the location near Eastdale to the new location now closer to the Montgomery Mall area, he kept me abreast of each step. By the time I saw my ring, even without the stones set, I was estatic! Mr. Davis IS a "Master Jeweler"! He will even pray over your ring and marriage! I was equally excited to have Mr. Davis create my ring; since my grandparents met at Maxwell Airforce Base in Montgomery, Alabama.

I feel blessed to have such a unique, gifted and spiritual man create my exquisite and beautiful wedding ring ..... that has more substantive meaning for me. I pray it will be passed down from generation to generation!

Feeling Blessed,
Kit
