name: Eric Jones
text: Beautiful jewelry

name: Erica Campbell
text: The owner was very rude and very DISRESPECTFUL..JEWLREY WAS NOT THE WAY IT WAS ASKED TO BE FIXED..OVER CHARGED AND WORK WAS NOT DONE AS DISCUSSED AND I WAS FORCED TO PAY FOR IT.....POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE...AND THIS HAPPENED DEC.23,2017very unprofessional

name: Melissa Strickland
text: 💯 recommend these jewelers! I was greeted with the warmest welcome and friendliest sales people. After 26 years of marriage I was ready for an upgrade. Phil introduced me to Abdo who was extremely patient and guided me into choosing this gorgeous 2.04 carat Brilliant Cushion cut stone flanked by 2 trapezoid diamonds that he had flown in for me to select. Within a week my ring was ready-customized to my taste. It turned out a million times better than I ever dreamed! Their prices cannot be beat-hands down the best in our area. You will not be disappointed!

name: Brooke Goodell
text: These guys are absolutely amazing! Everyone worked so well together to create my dream ring. Alexis is the best! She answered every question I had and was able to help make my vision a reality. The jeweler helped custom set my diamond so that it would fit exactly the way I wanted. You'll never need another jeweler!

name: Michele Marsh
text: I brought in a gold bracelet to be repaired, when I went to pick it up it actually looked better than when I originally purchased it. Great customer service!!!!!

name: Tina Steib
text: I was here months ago and was offered 800.00 for a diamond 💎 ring. I did not take it because it was my mom's who passed away. I went back 9/24 yesterday to see if I could get the same offer. The owner said he never made me an offer and I told him he did or I would have not come back. He said well he is not making an offer now. Basically called me a lier and was very rude. I will never step foot in that place again. Went somewhere else and that owner said he has heard bad customer service from others. Beware not a honest company ☹️ For all you folk's that gave this company 5 stars need to get there heads examined. This is NOT a honest company, the owner is very dishonest and very rude. They were nice to the folks who were spending money, but not to the sellers. Good luck old man 😂

name: brett garrick
text: Amazing local jeweler! A beautiful shop with top notch selection pricing and customer service. I've been purchasing from them for almost 8 years now and I've never had anything but an amazing experience.

name: Kole Wilson
text: Great service! They helped me find my wife's engagement ring and wedding ring.

name: Nate B
text: This Jeweler is very helpful. They worked with me on picking out an engagement ring and the staff is very friendly and helpful. They go out of their way to help you pick out a stone. Thanks!

name: Clyde Moore
text: This is an old post but I was in there Valentine’s Day 2020 I saw a item on line earrings for my wife about it friendly staff in and out quickly love these guys they are my future go to

name: Joey Fontenot III
text: The Karat Patch is an exquisite jewelry store with high quality products. Cameron is the one of the most knowledgeable jewelers on the gulf coast. Highly recommend you visit the Karat Patch for all your jewelry needs.

name: Joshua Pritchard
text: Me and my family have been doing business with The Karat Patch for over 20 years. Wonderful people with fair pricing for the high quality products you get. I'd highly recommend them to anyone.

name: carol parks
text: Great service from this business I have known for years!!! And I make glass jewelry, so I know a bit about it!!!

name: tammy martin
text: I will never go to any other jewlery store!!  The customer service here is amazing.  I seldom post reviews but felt like I had to because the kindness and consideration I was shown was far above my expectations!!

name: Carrie Stensland
text: Showed up just to glance quickly, to see if they would even have what I was looking for and  they were closed up before closing time. Oh well. Guess they won't get my money.  Guess I'll have to go to a larger chain.

name: Jay Friday
text: Thank you Karat Patch! They were very helpful and patient in showing me several options until I found the perfect piece of jewelry.

name: Barney Monteleone
text: Super service and everything priced right...

name: Haley Sutton
text: These people went above and beyond to help me resolve an issue i had with another jewelry, they owed me nothing but still chose to help me out of the goodness of their hearts. They have excellent customer service and truly care about their customers. Thank you so much for all your help!

name: Austin Marcus
text: The only jewelry store I’ll buy from! They are always easy to work with and will find anything that you are looking for.

name: Andrew Boyington
text: These people are the best and super friendly. I’ve been there as a customer 3 times and was treated like family and I was a complete stranger. They have my business. Great prices too.

name: Shi Fu
text: I'm giving this place 5 stars, but please keep in mind that a place like this is only as good as those which it employs.  I had the good fortune of meeting with two separate specialists; and I was extremely surprised at their honesty and straight-forward nature.  I feel this trait to be uncommon in their trade.  The only downside is the shopping center in which they are located. It was a terrible center before, now doubly so due to the whole foods.  I guess that actually makes this place a diamond in the rough!

name: Austin Marcus
text: The only jewelry store I’ll buy from! They are always easy to work with and will find anything that you are looking for.

name: Caleb Lundy
text: Karat Patch was awesome--great prices, great service (went above and beyond to help us) and great atmosphere.

name: Taylor Barton
text: I seldom write reviews but figured I should given the wonderful service I received, especially considering how they handled my relatively minor problem. I walked in and dropped my watch off to have it looked at as it had stopped ticking, I assumed the battery had just run it’s course. They said give them 20-30 mins and it’d be ready to pick up. I ran an errand or two and came back to pick up my watch. The man at the counter walked to greet me with my watch in hand and said, “here you go.” I was obviously expecting to pay some type of repair or replacement fee for their services but he just told me, “don’t worry about it.” Somewhat taken aback by the wonderful service I thanked him and walked out to realize not only did they replace my battery but set the correct time as well. Now this may not seem like a lot to most people but in today’s society it’s the small and sincere gestures that make a huge difference. Thank you Karat Patch Jewelers!

name: Hunter Winstanley
text: This is easily the best jewelry store in town.

name: Jonathan Watson
text: I purchased an engagement and wedding ring from the Karat Patch, and I was amazed by the service Abdul gave me. Abdul not only saved me a lot of money on the set and did it in a way that made me feel like my benefit was the only thing that mattered. I strongly suggest the Karat Patch to anyone looking to buy jewelry, and I specifically suggest that you ask for Abdul!

name: Daniel Souers
text:
A friend I trust first recommended Karat Patch to me.  After meeting Phil, the owner, I completely understand why my friend thought so highly of the place.

Most jewelers I have ever dealt with are out to make as much money as possible, even at the expense of his clients.  Karat Patch is a rare exception!  Phil is honest and will do what is right, even when your not looking or don't know everything about jewlery.

My wife and I bought our wedding rings from Karat Patch, and we will continue to do business with them.  Great people who fear God. (That's rare now days!)  I highly recommend that you try Karat Patch.

name: Laketa Andry
text:
Two years ago, I took my diamond tennis bracelet in here to get some links out and also to see how much was the value of the bracelet.
Horrible experience. Terrible customer service.
It was this older old white woman with glasses , (her face snd neck was very wrinkle)anyhow she just was not willing to assist with my bracelet. She said oh it's  about $200 to $300 dollars.
Without evening touching it.
I wouldn't recommend this place to any one.
Horrible customer service.

Stay away from this place.

name: Anita Gibson
text: Very helpful and friendly.  This is the best place to buy.

name: Mae Naylor
text: Best customer service at a jeweler, ever. Goldsteins is great, too, but I got an education & treated like family

name: Stephen Weiss
text: I was disappointed they don't offer a full refund within 14 days, only a store credit. Bummer!

name: Ronnie Tanner
text: Best Jewelery store in Mobile, Alabama... Customer service is great...

name: James Huffman
text: They're not very good with watches. I would not trust them with a luxury watch. They were unable to remove a watch band I'd hate to see what they'd do if you asked them to service a mechanical watch.

name: Kristina Knowles
text: Local Jeweler in Mobile.

name: Jeff Lee
text: A great jeweler. Great prices and a very nice lady that owns the place. I've had work done and bought jewelry there. Aces all the way

name: Hotboywes
text: I loved working with the ladies (owners), they were extremely patient with me and helpful with me choosing a gift. Though some of the pieces seemed well over priced (they offered discounts on the sticker prices), don't be so discouraged, ask to see the price and NEGOTIATE.

name: Porsha Miller
text: I brought in 3 Invicta watches today and 1 was fixed less than 10 minutes. The others could have been fixed but I decided to come back. All in all great customer service 10 stars

name: Malcolm Lehr
text: Love this amazing business! Honesty, integrity, and kindness all rolled into one hometown business! Everyone should stop by and meet Ann!

name: Carolyn Davis
text: Friendly. Very helpful

name: Eddie Martin
text: I stopped in to get my watches sized and new batteries installed . Ann is such a nice person to do business with and talk to, i sat and talked in no time she was finished with all 3 watches the price was great also. Thank u so much.

name: Sherri Easdon
text: Local jeweler, trusted, great work. I will continue to bring jewelry for inspection and repair here.

name: lj pratt
text: GREAT PEOPLE. BEAUTIFUL WORK. ❤ ❤ ❤

name: Lisa Thompson
text: I wouldn’t use anyone else to make my custom pieces! Wonderful people! I’ve shopped here for years!

name: Daryl Isbell
text: Great store.

name: Jim Bruno
text: Great place to do business

name: Alexia Rose Niles
text:
The first woman that spoke to me was extremely rude. First asking me, “Did he say you could come look at rings?” What?! I told her I wanted to look myself and figure out what style I liked in person... She then proceeds to walk away and I received no assistance. A second lady comes by and was shocked I wasn’t getting assistance. The first woman piping in with, “Oh she’s just looking. She doesn’t need in anything.” Didn’t know I wasn’t allowed to look at the rings just like any other customer? I look very young, but I should not be treated like I am less than any other person coming in.

The second woman assisting me actually set up an account and allowed me to try on and see the rings. Though I found a pretty, dainty ring I liked and she says, “You don’t want that! Those are technically promise rings.” Which I responded that I liked how dainty it was and that’s more of the style I liked. I was not a fan of being told what I should and should not like. I will be finding another jeweler that has my best interest and desires in mind.

Overall not a good experience. There are many other friendly, reputable, and professional jewelers in Huntsville that I would recommend over Jared’s at Bridge Street ANY DAY. Please take your business elsewhere this holiday season and after.

name: Christy Vaughn
text:
Tasha is AMAZING!!! She is our go to girl at Jared's EVERY TIME since our first purchase in may of 2018!
Update*** picked up my custom design ring today with my rare black pearl I got in Hawaii... Absolutely amazing job

Next visit, since I can't do another review Tasha again helped me purchase MANY items, unfortunately I picked the same watch out for my husband he bought a couple years ago so the next day I went to return it, bought thru progressive leasing, and geta different one same price, Rachel the GM is also AMAZING! She spent 3 hours dealing with Progressive Leasing to get this all handled! Thank you all who work there, you all have the best Customer service I have ever seen and delt with!

Repairs and custom designs here are ABSOLUTELY beautiful and ALWAYS on time!!!!

name: Trenton McCall
text: So I knew exactly what I was looking for as I walked in and was kindly greeted by Rachel. She told me she would be with me in a moment and in a moments time she was there to assist me. I showed her the pictures of the two bracelets I was needing to purchase for Valentine’s Day. She disappointedly told me they do not have those in store I would have to order them on-line. I told her I’ve NEVER ordered anything on-line before. Rachel told me to come have a seat she would order them with me and I could just come back and pick them up when they arrive. She was kind and helpful. Doesn’t sound like much maybe to some, but I think she went out of her way to make sure I was happy. I’ll definitely be back

name: Addy Schmuck
text: Great customer service. Vickie was very helpful with us. Would highly recommend!

name: Treasure Williams
text: Excellent products, awesome staff. You can also sell them your (real) jewerly. Look online from pre-owned watches-great for if you are looking for a nice pre-owned watch

name: Bridget Williams
text: Best Jared's that I have visited.  They went above and beyond to fix my ring. Plus the employees are very nice.

name: Heather Welch
text: The Huntsville store was an amazing experience! We used Tasha and she was so knowledgeable and professional. She got us exactly what we wanted.

name: Angela King
text: Tasha helped us upgrade my engagement ring. She is very knowledgeable and fun to work with! Highly recommend!

name: Katreena Mullican
text: Had a great experience at Jared's of Bridge Street, Huntsville.  Mechelle was wonderful!  She helped us pick out a beautiful setting and stone from their impressive collection for our anniversary.  She took time to explain and present various options.  My ring was assembled, sized, and ready for pickup same-day.  Highly recommend stopping by!

name: Tina Wells
text: I was extremely disappointed and appalled at the treatment I received at this location. The lady met us at the door which was locked due to Covid, which is fine, I understand but when she opened the door, she basically asked what we wanted like we couldn’t enter the store without some kind of pass. That already made me uncomfortable. After telling her we were shopping for an engagement ring she led us to the counter to have a look. She then proceeded to ask us how long we have been together as if we needed to meet her approval. Next she asked where we met. I did not appreciate her being so nosey. After looking a a few rings, I didn’t see anything that had a large enough diamond for me. She sighed at me when I told her the one she showed me was not large enough. Overall made my experience not fun at all. I would not recommend shopping this location!!

name: Gary Watkins
text: Really nice jewelry at great prices

name: Royce Estes
text: Friendly people and beautiful merchandise!

name: Tonya Staggs
text: They dont sale pandora  any more😪. Very nice place.

name: Larry Burger
text: Great inventory and the best sales staff. They even cleaned each piece of jewelry before packaging it for me.

name: David Hambey
text: Extremely rude employees, they treated us like we were not welcome from the moment we walked into the store.

name: Sheryl Payne
text: So glad I stopped in on the day that i did.  I got to work with Ms. Tasha and she made my first whole (by myself) jewelry buying experience a success.  Will definitely be stopping through again!

name: Christina Mascarinas
text: Each employee I encountered was incredibly snooty and rude to the point it was almost comical because they have nothing to be snooty about. The jewelry was nothing to write home about, even if I would have found something I don’t want a piece from a store with such bad energy.

name: Joseph Cuzzort
text:
Typically, great customer service. Not today, no one said hello as I entered and I walked around the showcases multiple times and not one employee asked if they could assist me or say though would be with me in a moment.

Not a good experience today.

Joseph

name: Robin Warren
text: I was greeted as soon as I stepped in the door.  I  was treated  very professionally. My  rings were checked and cleaned.  Thank goodness I asked her to clean my other rings.  She saw some diamonds missing.   It is being fixed now.

name: J HONEZ
text: Terrible place to buy from.  Constant lies.  They never have your information in the system even though you spent thousands of dollars with them and show up for warranty work to maintain it.  They never seem to have you in the system so keep your paperwork.  They also like to chip your diamonds on purpose it seems so that they can force you into getting lesser diamonds or non certified diamonds to maintain your warranty.  Will not issue a refund for the lesser value diamonds they put into your rings either.  Maybe other Jared's are different but don't buy from this location.  Great scam they have going on

name: Charlotte Smartt
text: Everyone at the store was such a pleasure to work with. They take the time to explain everything you try out many options and they make you feel very comfortable shopping there. I highly recommend this store. They are  absolutely the best people to work with .

name: Jason Watson
text:
Very courteous, professional and prompt. Have been to this store twice,  and couldn't have asked for a better experience.  Lexi and Riley are awesome, and I can't thank them enough.  Knowledgeable,  friendly, and patient with my many questions.
Highly recommend Jared and this location! Will be back again and again.

name: Cherish Charles
text: The staff at this location are simply unparalleled in their friendliness, product knowledge and willingness to assist me every time I come in. I truly feel appreciated as a customer and would recommend without hesitation. Shout out to Brian, in particular for going above and beyond with my late night repair. I truly appreciate your help. Thank you!

name: Branden Schlesinger
text: Really amazing customer service!  They really went above and beyond to make everything perfect!

name: Marty Howard
text:
Great experience throughout engagement shopping experience. Went to several different Jewelry store and was treated like family at Jared's. Cameron was our salesperson and did a terrific job of listening and guiding us thru the process to find the perfect engagement ring as well as wedding rings. BTW She said YES and we were married yesterday. Thank you Cameron and support staff at Jared's.
Highly recommend!!!!

name: Kenneth Hughes
text: Awesome staff, service, and customer service! Patricia was an amazing sales associate!

name: Robert Makowski
text: They have a great store, and wonderful, knowledgeable people! They will make you feel comfortable, and treat you fairly. Me and my family loved the items we purchased. Thanks y'all I'll be back soon!

name: Jack Brown
text: This was my first purchase from Jared's. The entire transaction was very pleasant. They have a customer for life.

name: Dale Barksdale
text:
My husband and I wanted to buy new wedding bands for our 10th anniversary.  Cameron, our salesman, could not have made our experience any better. He was very knowledgeable and easy to work with. We could not be happier with our jewelry or the customer service.
We were so pleased with our experience we also bought a Citizen watch for my husbands birthday (his birthday is just a few days after our anniversary). We had to take the watch back the day after we purchased it because it did not work :(. Cameron also helped us with that. He swapped it out and was very  apologetic. We understand things happen (even with expensive pieces of jewelry), but the excellent customer service will keep us coming back.

name: Emily Gangl
text: The sales associates were extremely helpful and patient with me as I looked through many options for my wedding ring!

name: Don Ebert
text: Long story short without the details, Charles Brown AKA "Charlie Brown" as general manager at the Huntsville location went above and beyond to satisfy a customer...me.  Over what I believe to be a legitimate issue, I had begun to put Jared -Galleria behind me, both figuratively and literally!  Fortunately, Mr Brown caught me in the parking lot and asked to be given a chance to fix the issue.  I did.  He did and I suggest you try Jared's for your jewelry needs.

name: Aisha Buycks Realtor (Huntsville Madison AL)
text: I love Jared at Bridgestreet they take great care of your pieces. I have taken them my wedding set to tighten and clean. I always get them back perfect and blinging. Patricia Mitchell is awesome and gives great customer service. She listens and gets you exactly what you are looking. Their repair service are responsible and give a very reasonable turn around. They will also clean and redip your rings to bring them back up. They will continue to be my go to jeweler. They are friendly and very informative about their pieces.

name: Rae M
text: I have talked to them 3 times in store about getting a quote for a ring to be made. It was a wedding band we got from them 6 years ago. They don’t make it anymore so we have asked them 3 different times leading up to our 5th wedding anniversary how much it would cost to have a duplicate made. The second and third time they apologized that they hadn’t followed through. This last time 2 girls wrote down information and promised to get in contact with us soon after our last visit. Well our 5th anniversary has come and gone and we still don’t have a quote. Guess that’s not happening. Really frustrated.

name: Chelsea Marbut
text:
Insufferable customer service.
The gentleman I spoke with told me that although he could pull up my information and see my extended care plan, the previous store did not correctly handle my paper work so there was nothing he could do for me, as far as repairing my ring... remember he's telling me this as he's viewing my extended care plan.

His parting words for me were, "I'm sorry, I'm trying to teach people how to correctly use our system, and the other store didn't do it correctly."

Since this is the 4th time in two years that my ring has needed repairing, this was a terrible experience to accompany that.

Update:
The GM of the Hoover Location has helped resolve this problem via a phone call... through difficulty from the Huntsville Location.
We do not plan to use the Huntsville Store going forward.

name: T Mac
text: A very good place to shop

name: Kyle Jett
text: Excellent customer service. Staff was very helpful and informative.

name: Angie Clemore
text: This place is extremely discriminatory. My friends and I are all black youths with very well paying jobs and were intrested in their rings. When we got there we were instantly stared at and treated like we didn't belong. There was a tall white man who seemed very rude eyeing us the whole time and even made a sure to mention the quality of the security cameras without our asking anything. Half of us left to sit in the car (because of the cold treatment) and HE FOLLOWED US OUTSIDE!! Soon after security was called and we decided to spend our money somewhere less racist. My family, friends and I are never shopping here again. It's just disgusting.

name: Vinie Carter
text: Very good customer service

name: Sven Holiday
text: I've come by here looking for music equipment a couple times since they have "guitars" right there in the name of the place. The prices are ok, the guitars aren't maintained well, and the employees ignore me and chat with their friends. I thought about buying a couple times but I'd rather go to a different store and pay a few bucks more for the same thing to support a better business.

name: Chris Knight
text: I was greeted by a terrific gentleman named Chris that was able to go above and beyond. He displayed quite a selection of firearms, as well as provided helpful insight. Found myself browsing longer than I expected.  Prices on most items seem reasonable, and with some deals! Clean shop, warm atmosphere. I will definitely be back and doing some future business.

name: Jerad Honea
text: Only reason they got one star is because you have to leave something to put a review. Probably the unfriendliest place I've ever been in my life. There were two workers in there. An old man and an old lady. Neither of them spoke to me the whole time I was there. I asked to see a gun and the man didn't even speak when he gave it to me. I won't be back just for this reason.

name: Sara Williams
text: You guys might consider specifying on your website that your Madison location does not, in fact, buy diamonds. I looked up your website specifically for this reason, as I didn’t want to waste my time if you did not purchase diamonds because the item I brought in was... you guessed it.. diamonds. When I got there I was made aware that only your Florence store purchases them, even though there is no mention of this on your website. It’s just misleading and also annoying to have wasted the last hour driving to and from for absolutely no reason at all.

name: Joseph Willard
text: I only goto this place bc of packman and there great selection of weapons I've spent nearly 13k at gun gold and guitar  and I will always stay a customer I didn't realize ppl would put mad veiws but ik this place is great in my book.

name: D D
text: Bad customer service. They have no clue what on their own shells and they have no clue where nothing is that. And they are very racist

name: Chris Browning
text: I brought in a $500 guitar amp, they wouldn't let me borrow even as little as $50 because one button, the reverb, didn't work. That's pretty sorry, especially for a pawn shop (pawn shops are known for used gear, obviously). I'm not saying take everything that comes in, but you have to be slightly lenient on your policy to make money.

name: Johnathon Wilson
text: Good people.  Fair pricing on most of the products.

name: Billy Schofield
text: Good Selection, have some rare guns that other shops dont carry and you never know what trade ins will be on the used shelf from week to week, I’ve scored several Mil Surps here for great deals, prices are the best around on new guns and ammo. If they don’t have it in stock they will order it for you. Also have the cheapest FFL transfer fee around and don’t mind you transferring in guns. They get all of my business these days and Ethan is an absolute pleasure to deal with!

name: Steve Kaikkonen
text: Great people that have been helpful every time I have been there. I have purchased guns, magazines for guns, parts to build guns and had them receive parts for me with their FFL. I have brought other people in to purchase guns, recommended them for ceracoating.

name: Martha Tate
text: Love Working with the Best Crew Ever. Great Environment, always Smiling Faces.

name: Caleb Hollingsworth
text: Great staff, and has services such as cerakote and gunsmithing, unlike other gun shops!

name: RippedAndRich
text: Good prices, good service, and a great selection

name: Kim Smith
text: This is a family business. When you’re there, you are part of that family. If they don’t have what you’re looking for they will work with you to get it.  Danielle and Rebecca’s attention to details from diamonds to the color of gold make your buying for the first time or for that special occasions so easy. There are so many other qualities that set them apart from other jewelers. So, go ahead and make someone feel all that special care today at Wilson’s Jewelers. In beautiful Dothan , Alabama.

name: Dothan Girl
text: The staff is very helpful and are always able to get items done in a timely manner. They have a licensed gemologist in store, with 20+ years experience! Need batteries replaced no problem always in and out with a friendly sales associates to show beautiful pieces of jewelry while you wait! Quaint jewelry store with a hometown feel and prices that can’t be beat.

name: Jerome Hightower
text: Pricing the gold market.

name: Daniel Camacho
text: I'm new to the market and was trying to learn. They sold me a white gold plated ring as true white gold,  one of the stones is loose and they were over a week behind in the repair I needed done. Also, the customer service was cordial, but returning calls and giving accurate information is apparently not their specialty. I do not recommend.

name: Celeste Byrd
text: I've had many pieces of jewelry from Wilson's. Necklaces, rings, bracelets, earrings & watches. I get so many wonderful comments on my engagement ring and wedding band! Customer service is always great. We were very undecisive when it came to my rings but they helped us find something that was original yet classic and we couldn't be happier. I have several friends and family members that use them as well and have never had a bad experience. Highly recommend them.

name: Danielle Hogan
text: My husband bought my engagement ring (and all my other jewelry) from Wilson's and we have always had a positive experience with them. I always get compliments on the jewelry we bought from here. Wonderful staff and owners!

name: Linda Mcknight
text: WILSON'S  HAS THE FRIENDLIEST AND MOST HELPFUL  STAFF EVER!! I LOVE  TO SHOP AT THIS STORE  IN DOTHAN, ALL! LINDA  MCKNIGHT FROM MIDLAND CITY

name: Richard Kinard
text: The staff is friendly and very helpful. just tell them what your looking for and they will go out of their to make sure your satisfied

name: Joe M
text: I bought my wife's engagement ring from Wilson Jewelers about 7 years ago and at that time I recieved excellent service.  Just recently one of the diamonds in the ring fell out and I told her to use Wilson's to get it fixed because of my previous experience with them. What a mistake... She has been trying to get a simple estimate to submit to the insurance company for two weeks. Each time we call to inquire about it we recieve the same old story... They will leave a message for Rebbeca (who they tell me is the owner) and have her call me back. We have left "three" messages and no one has ever returned our call to update us on the situation. This morning I called again to check on the status and asked to talk to the owner or manager. The lady I was talking with immediately got defensive and rude, and asked me where I was calling from... I asked her for her name and she tired to avoid it by asking me my name, even though I had already given it to her.  I'm in the military and have been to a lot of different jewelers, and this is by far the worst service that I have recieved. I was going out of my way to give my business to them, what a mistake. I will never attempt to use this jeweler again and hopefully you don't make the same mistake. Thanks for reading.

name: 1968kenpoman
text: Drop off pendent to be repaired it's been two weeks still not repaired and it's not in store for me to get it back, last time I had this same pendant repaired it took 1 hour and cost 22 dollars, Wilson's wants 40 dollars and I still have no fixed pendent in hand ,this is unacceptable business practice.

name: May Greiss
text:
This business tried to offer me $100.00 for two rings an emgagement ring and a weddin
g band...total rip off business

name: Jessica McClellan
text: I was so impressed by the attentiveness and customer service! They had my ring sized in less than an hour. I will definitely be using them again for my future jewelry needs!

resp.text: Thank you Jessica , we would be more than happy to help you out anytime. Our customers are our backbone.

name: Cathy Baker
text: Wanted to go with a local business to have my rings put together and this place came up on my search. Best choice I made. The Owner and his (Great Great Great Great grandson-J/k) were a pleasure to do business with and the work on my rings was fantastic. Definitely use them for all your jewelry needs (The work was done under Lider)

name: K
text: First of all, we have used this place for years. I went in for a new battery for my husband's Movado watch. I inquired about a piece being welded back on a gold hoop earring that I had brought in on a Saturday back before the pandemic. The owner was not there but a young man was with an unkempt appearance. He quoted me $45. I told him that was more than I paid for them so I guess I would just sell them for scrap. So currently while in the jewelry shop, I inquired with the owner who informed me they have a $30/minimum. I was not told of that the 1st time I inquired. The owner began chatting saying, "You know, I went to the dealership the other day, they told me my tire was going to be $150, I told them, no, it should be $10." Then he said, "I went to the grocery store, they said my groceries were $100, I told them, no, it should be $10." While putting the battery in the watch, he stated, "You know this watch has the wrong size battery?" "The battery is too big." I informed him it was purchased at a pawn shop so I have no clue who put the battery in but it worked for a long time. He said, "Well, that's what you get buying from a pawn shop," in a condescending tone. I never requested a lower price on the earring repair. I will not pay for something only to be spoken to in this manner. His level of sarcasm was ridiculous. I will not be a patron of his business any longer nor will I ever refer anyone to him again.

resp.text:
Hello, glad you have been using us for many years. Sorry you had a bad experience this time around. Hope the battery that we put into your watch stays working longer than the one you got from the pawn shop. As for your earring. You came in the store without it and you did want a price on how much it would cost to fix it. But we can not give a price on any item unless we actually see it. You said you talked with me before the pandemic and I told you it would cost 45 dollars apparently. And like you said in your comment "that was more than I paid for them".
We don't do any repairs on earrings for free and we do have a minimum price we charge on basic repairs like those. I know you wanted a cheaper price because you complained to the owner about it. That is why he gave you examples of other scenarios like the ones you posted in your comment. Hes by no means trying to upset you or offend you in anyway. He just wanted you to understand that we don't barter with prices and we can't just give you a price without seeing the item. The owner also is very honest and upfront with any problems with repairs. That is also why he was concerned and wanted to let you know your watch already had the wrong battery put in it. As for me, I am the young man replying to your review and I do reply to all reviews that concern me. I do believe calling me unkempt was rude and uncalled for especially since I never said anything bad at all to you and barely talked with you in our store. Sorry my appearance is not up to your standards. As always have a nice day and I hope you have a wonderful Easter.

name: Emily Hanson
text: I love them. They are quick and great prices. Best place to have stuff done. They listen and achieve what you want. Always impressed with their work. I wont use no one else. Very friendly people too.

name: Fran Banks
text: I just want to say, I googled jewelry repairs and this store came up as one of the ten best jewelry stores in Mobile. I must say that this store did live up to the google search statement. The owner and his grandson were very nice, courteous, friendly and professional. The ring repair was amazing, fast  and the price was very reasonable. I would recommend this store if you have any repairs. I definitely will be going back for any of my jewelry needs and repairs. Please do not hesitate to take your business to this store because they truly are one of the best jewelry store in Mobile Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We really appreciate it and your business. Come back anytime Fran. It's also nice to know you think I'm so young by calling me the owners grandson. But I'm actually his son and I'm 30 years old. Again thank you Fran and see you next time.

name: Lovie Williams
text: Great experience each and every time I come in. Friendly staff and very professional. I recommend this shop any day. Best in town hands down

I have been using them for about seven or eight years and have never been dissatisfied. They did a custom build for my fiancé‘s engagement ring that is absolutely beautiful! She gets compliments on it all the time. Best jewelers I have ever dealt with. I would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you Ms Allyn, it was nice seeing you again and we hope your having a great New Year.

name: Ericka Goodwin
text:
Custom Fast-Fix Jewelry Repair did a great job sizing my ring.  The guys are very helpful and take their time to ensure you get the right fit to accommodate your finger.  I was very pleased with the outcome of the ring being sized.  They sized the ring down. The guys were finished with the ring and it was ready for me to pick it up in less than two hours. It cost me $55.00. Considering this was same day service,  taking less than two hours and AMAZING costumer service,  I consider the charge to be very reasonable. I can't stress how helpful these guys are when helping you.
I will definitely return and as of my first experience today, I  have become a costumer for life.
Please don't let the other negative reviews prevent you from giving this business a chance. I read the reviews from others before going to this business. I went ahead and gave them a chance despite the negative reviews from others. The good reviews out weighed the bad reviews. I understand that each individual may have varying experiences when dealing with your jewelry. With that being said,  I quickly determined today that this business is costumer oriented and cares for their costumers satisfaction. I can't imagine if someone does have a problem with their work,  these guys would be more than willing to make it right. That's the impression I got today from them. They have very strong work ethic,  take pride in their work,  and are very knowledgeable.
Oh,  one more thing.... today when we were trying to determine the right size for my ring because this ring was a gift from my husband and is an addition to my wedding set, the guys examined the size of my wedding ring which is now the middle ring in my set. He discovered that my band was a little bent. He asked if I would like him to straighten it. He straightened it,  no charge! That's a real,  professional,  costumer oriented jeweler!

name: Tsuki Dusk
text: I've gotten a little work done here. It's a family owned store and the staff has always been very courteous to me and given great advice. The older man is very blunt/honest about things so I can see how people would take offense but he's only ever been helpful to me. They replaced my watch battery which wasn't a normal sized battery, sized and polished my ring, and welded my broken necklace. They suggested I buy a new chain since it was just a simple Walmart one and more likely to break again. They also advised me not to wear it to sleep or in the shower like I have been. I've never had a decent chain for my necklace and the pendant was a gift from my significant other so I broke down and bought a box chain. I don't regret it at all. This new chain has lasted me over 6 months. As far as the work I've had done, it was all done within a few minutes (battery) to hours (ring size). The prices are reasonable for the work you get done. I'll add pictures later if I get the chance

name: Tyra Martin
text: Went into store several months ago, as referred by one of the jewelry stores in the mall.  First encounter, nice and seemed genuine.  He looked at my ring and advised the prongs on each side needed to be replaced and it would be $75/side, totaling $150!  He "placed" my diamond in but said, it was just sitting in there and if I was to wear it, it would come out.  I FINALLY get my $150 together and go in last week, only to be told, the prongs around my center diamond needed to be replaced and that was $300 off the top....I was BLOWN away, to say the least.  He goes on to say, each side had to be completely re-done and THAT would be $150/side, totaling $300!!  I advised him he NEVER said that and he responded, with a smile, "Well, you can look at it and tell it needs new prongs on the top".  I said, well, I can't, I'm not a jeweler, with a smile!  I advised him I wasn't prepared to pay $600 for a job that was quoted $150. He just responded, well, that's what it gonna take to have it right...oh, the diamond is loose, I can't tell"!  He gave me a card(which I tore up and trashed) with his "new" quote!  Can you say SCAM ARTIST!!  I'm making sure I tell EVERYONE, not to patron him.  I REALLY felt like he "uped" the price thinking I received a BIG tax refund. He'll be out of business soon!!!! :(

resp.text: Were sorry you misunderstood the qoute and the price it was to replace or repair your ring. We have set prices. We do not alter or change them just because a customer wants it changed. It is pretty pointless to post a review when you never got any work done. And just want to complain about a price. If you had actually got work done Id love to see a receipt because we would want to fix the issue at no cost.

name: Robert Garner
text: I had two watches to repair and they fixed both in a timely manner. Polite and courteous. Thanks for the great help! You are now my one stop shop for watch and jewelry repair

resp.text: Thank you Robert for doing business with us, we really appreciate it. We would be more than happy to help you out with future repairs anytime. We hope you have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

resp.text: Thank you Noah, we really appreciate you and your wifes business. If you guys ever need anything done in the future come on back anytime. Hope you and your wife have a wonderful New Years.

If you haven't patroned this business yet you really should very reasonable priced work and fast great quality of work. Thanks again and continue the great work.

name: Patrick Bosarge
text: My wife went in the store on 12/16/17 to get a ring sized. She said he was nice. BUT when she went back to get the ring the accents (rose gold coloring)was gone from one side of ring guy told her to take it back where she bought it and if she got a new one he would size it for free so I went to take the other ring back to have it sized today 12/19/17 and the guy was rude. His attitude was towards me  was not good. He made me fill as if he was surprised we came back with another ring. It made me feel as if he did not want to do what he told my wife he would. We dropped the ring off to him about 10 o'clock in the morning. We called him after 2 o'clock to see if it was ready. He said he would call when it was done. We never got a call so we went up to his store around 4:30 and he was just as rude when we picked up the ring like he did not even won't us in his store. Would not recommend this place to anyone.

resp.text: This is the co owner and I was actually the one who took in your wifes ring. I did mention to her sizing / cleaning the ring would be at her risk since it did have rose gold plated on each side. The ring was almost as if someone took a paint brush and painted it barely with rose gold on the sides. However a little bit of the rose gold plating did come off while cleaning it. We were sorry about that and we did tell her if she did get another ring we would size it for free. And she did come back into the store today with you and I actually handled the conversation, and I by no means was rude so I'm sorry if you felt that I or the owner was rude in anyway. And I'm not shocked at all that you came back because we wanted to make things right. As far as getting your ring done and calling you. Christmas is a very busy time and we can't promise to get your repair done right away. And can't promise to call you when it is done. Thats why we tell customers it may take just an hour or two or longer and to just check back in with us. But we did want to ensure we got your repair done and you and your wife were happy with it before the day ended. And thats all that matters in the end. Sorry you felt like we did nothing to fix the problem and that you felt that we were rude and you recommend no one to visit our store. Hope you have wonderful Christmas and a Happy New Year with many many years to come!

Joe

name: Tony Harrison
text: I've used their service many years ago to replace a battery and resize the band in my $10,000 watch and they banged on it with a rubber hammer because they don't have the correct tools to push the pins out. I will never let them touch my watch again. My step dad took his watch that he got in Switzerland and he had them to replace the battery and now water moist gets into the watch has they broke the seals and did not replace them nor did they tell my step dad that until he took it back to them. But they did an excellent job fixing my wedding ring. They sized it down and polished it to look like new for $55.00 in a few hours.

resp.text: I'm sorry that happened to you. But we don't put a $10.20 battery in any $10,000 watch.  Also we don't recall doing any $10,000 dollar watch in the past few years. We normally tell customers to send it back to the company they got the watch from. Because we won't be responsible for a $10.20 battery in a $10,000 watch. Same goes for replacing the band on any $10,000. And when replacing battery's in watches we also check the gaskets or "seals" as you call them, If they are damaged. However if moisture happens in the watch. Your step dad must be going swimming with it  or taking showers with his water resistant watch. The only watch that can get wet is a waterproof watch. Waterproof means that your watch can be submerged completely underwater for long periods of time, and there won’t be one single drop of water that enters the interior.

I was so blessed to find Diamond Depot. I originally went in with some family members looking at engagement rings and Amanda stated that they could do sizing for the engagement ring they liked if it didn't fit. I had a ring I got for our 2nd Anniversary that had gotten to small.
Several other Jewelers told me it could not be sized. So it sat in a special case hoping one day it would fit. When I spoke to Amanda she said she thought they would be able to size it. Just bring it in and they would see. I found out that the reason my ring didn't fit was because I was sold the wrong size. Amanda sized the ring, sized my finger and checked to make sure none of the stones were missing. She was so polite and professional. I felt so comfortable with them I even gave them my engagement and wedding ring to be cleaned. Amanda did the same thing checked to make sure I wasn't missing stones or had loose stones. I got my rings back today and I am so happy with them. Diamond Depot is definitely where's all my jewelry will go in the future. And I already have my eyes on my next Anniversary present. Thank you  Diamond Depot for doing such a spectacular job on my rings!! Thank you Amanda for making my experience easy and fun.

name: Joseph Mogill
text: I brought my watch in to get a new battery. The customer service was friendly, but they were unable to complete the service due to “not having a piece to close the back.” Since it was a “high end” watch, they needed to send it to a company for 2 weeks + $20. Didn’t seem right so I decline and they didn’t charge me for the new battery they gave me. I left with a bag full of watch parts. Later, I realized the gasket was damaged, I was missing parts, and with a battery that doesn’t work. This watch is a standard Tissot, and doesn’t need “special” parts to change out batteries. I will send my business elsewhere.

resp.text:
Hi Joseph.  In the 1000+ Watches we work on yearly, we do occasionally have a watch repair that requires a higher level of service than our on site Watch Repair shop feels comfortable offering. In those instances, we send the watch to our repairman in Texas, whom we have worked with for years, and they will repair and send back to us. The service is excellent and the pricing is very affordable for our customers.

Out of all the watches we have replaced a battery on this year, yours was the only one that we needed to send off for further inspection. The reason was because of a damaged gasket (so it appeared) - but certainly it was beyond our comfort level of repair locally. Rather than continue to work with it locally, we felt the need to move it to a higher tier repairman so that we could offer the best service on your watch. Your response was that you had someone in Georgia who has worked on it before and could put the back on with the gasket, no problem. You seemed as if it was no problem and we assumed that was the case.

It appears that there your repairman in Georgia saw a similar issue that we did - that there was still a problem.   Our repairmen would have had no issue providing the service that was needed to complete the task but I understand that you didn’t feel comfortable with us taking care of the problem for you further. I’m sorry you felt that way.  We certainly do everything we can to provide a level of service that makes people feel comfortable with allowing us to take care of them from start to finish. I believe, as you can see by the reviews, that we have always done our part to make things right and offer a service that ends with satisfaction.  While you may have felt uneasy about letting us finish the repair for you, I do not believe we have any type of reviews or history that would warrant that feeling from you. Instead, I believe it’s just the opposite - that we have a proven record (shown on reviews) of making sure all of our customers are fully satisfied and we work hard to maintain this level of service.

Either way, we are sorry you were unable to do business with us and see our service through to the end. But we wish you all the best.

text: The Diamond Depot is hands down the best jewelry store I have dealt with!! It’s a no pressure atmosphere that I absolutely love! name: Michelle Whitelaw
text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about Diamond Depot. I had a loose diamond that I wanted to incorporate into a unique engagement ring. I work in Atlanta, so I decided to visit a well known jewelry designer in Buckhead. She was very knowledgeable, but had her own idea for the ring, and didn’t seem to listen to what I wanted.  Frustrated and disappointed after our third meeting, I decided to scrap the whole project.

When explaining the bad experience to a friend, she mentioned that Terry had recently designed an engagement ring for a relative which turned out beautifully. Since I live in Oxford, I figured I didn’t have anything to lose so I dropped in one day to check it out. During our first meeting, Terry really took the time to listen to me, made notes and offered suggestions when I asked for them.

Over the course of the design process, I completely changed what I wanted, but Terry and Amanda were very patient and encouraging. When I decided that I wanted side stones, they arranged to bring in three sets for me to view with my diamond to find the perfect match.  After I received the original CAD rendering, I realized that there were a few things that I wanted to change. Each suggestion was promptly incorporated into the design and a new CAD rendering sent.

I was able to pick up my finished ring on Christmas Eve, and it was more stunning than I had ever imagined. Even though this was a custom design that involved a lot of personal service, the price for the setting was very reasonable.  I have worked with various jewelers on other projects and I can say without a doubt that Terry and Amanda’s design capabilities and professionalism are the best I’ve experienced. Thank you guys for a beautiful, one-of-a-kind ring!!!

resp.text: Michelle thank you!  I hope you're enjoying that beautiful ring!  If we can help you with anything at all, please let us know!

name: Melissa Allen
text: I will be leaving this review in part for my husband, who never takes the time to do it himself. With that being said, his not leaving a review in no way should be taken as a bad experience. In fact, he was so impressed with his experience, that he struggled with not sharing it too soon. When he gave me the ring he purchased, (which BTW is beautiful) it was as though he was almost as thrilled with being able to share with me how pleased he had been with his experience, as he was with giving me the ring. The knowledge that Amanda used in order to help him to make the right choices, was very helpful. I smile even now, thinking about how impressed he was with the way Diamon Depot operates. I will refrain from going into all the details he shared with me in reference to their Knowledge, professionalism, price, etc. Other than to say, I'm convinced he will never go anywhere else. I can assure you, based on my own experience which consisted of having the ring sized, and having my older band recoated, at Diamond Depot,  if you've never done business here, you are missing out. Again, Thank you Amanda, for all of your help, from beginning to end. You will definitely be seeing us in the future.

text:
On the approach of our 5 year anniversary we decided to upgrade my wedding ring.   I am a flight attendant and have honestly looked everywhere.   Funny Diamond Depot was right in my backyard.    We live about 40 minutes away in Ashville, AL and well worth the drive.  Much closer than Atlanta or Birmingham.  Amanda our diamond consultant was INCREDIBLE!!!   She has an awesome personality and was so patient with listening to our needs and wants.   Amanda’s knowledge was also helpful.  We ended up special ordering my ring and could not be happier. Just WOW! LOVE IT!  The Oweners were there as well and adds the nice family atmosphere.   I think it is important to support small local businesses, but We got to do this and get the best service and quality we were looking for.  Their prices and customer service are not beatable.  We have found a local jeweler that we will recommend to anyone! Near or far.
THANK YOU Diamond Depot!
Thank you Amanda, & Terry for all your service!
Don and Marci

text: This Used to be one of the best pawn shops around. Since they have changed locations though, they have become rather difficult. resp.text: Hello Tonya, I am very sorry to hear about your experience at our store.  We pride ourselves on customer service, We have always greeted everyone that comes in with courtesy and respect. name: Wargasm644
text: Went in to look for a guitar. Found a really nice one hanging on the wall. I know what they sell for at music stores and eBay. An employee named Alex asked me if I’d like to plug it in and check it out? A sure sign that the employees are confident in what they sell. After checking it out for fret wear and any obvious flaws, I wanted it. It was very nice and played fantastic! The price was reasonable too. Considering they have overhead and payroll to contend with the likes of eBay and Amazon. They landed me a VERY competitive price and I walked out with a super nice guitar! Alex and the entire staff were class acts and treated me like they really wanted my business. Something you don’t see much of anymore in this day and age. I know where I’m going when I need another guitar!  I would recommend anyone shopping pawn businesses and such to  check these guys out first! A++

name: matthew meskill
text:
Do not go to that huge pistol & pawn shop before going to Family! Wow! The staff is amazing, friendly and knowledgeable. The selection is fantastic, anything you could want! The prices are super competitive if not the lowest around. I put a lot of time and research in before I made my purchase and Family Jewelry  & Loan is the real deal!

PART 2

Wouldn't let me do another review so here's part 2. Another visit another fantastic experience! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly! David & family have so many choices and options I feel like a kid in a candy store! I feel guilty taking up so much of their time, but not once have I felt rushed or heard that dreaded deep breath of hurry up and get out like you get other places. In you are looking for jewelry,  computers, tools, games, movies, guns shop here first!

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Ralph Cantrell
text:
This might be the best pawn shop in town. The atmosphere was several degrees better than your average pawn shop - very clean and well lit, customer friendly, and the folks running the place were very conscientious and genuinely nice. We actually felt welcomed and appreciated for just stopping by to browse. Even my wife and teenager really liked the place and they are both easily "sketched-out" by any kind of second hand store.

I was really impressed with all the good stuff for sale. All of it was very nicely displayed too. There were guns of all kinds and other hunting equipment, tools, musical instruments, high-end sunglasses, games, sports equipment, rods and reels, portable air conditioners, TVs and other electronics - you name it - and LOTS of top quality jewelry. (I'm pretty sure wifey plans to sneak back over there without me :-0 )

The prices seem fair and are clearly marked, but don't be afraid to ask for an even better deal. I was able to negotiate a great price on a particular item I had been needing for a long time but could never bring myself to purchase. Now I am glad I waited.

This place is a 5-star business for sure.

Thanks, Family Jewelry and Loan!!

resp.text: Ralph Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We work really hard on keeping a clean, organized store.  We understand that a comfortable environment is really important now a days to make everyone feel welcome, and we strive to do this on a daily basis.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Todd Zelenka (zeltod)
text:
I stopped in the store at a recommendation from a friend at church.  I was looking for a ring for my wife to celebrate our 10 years together.  I have to say that the ring I found was an EXCELLENT deal - I am not a jewelry expert and was a little uneasy about buying jewelry from a pawn shop.  I was told that the shop would stand behind the ring and wrote the details about the ring on my receipt that they would guarantee.

The next day I went to a local jewelry store to see what kind of deal I got.  Man was I surprised - I not only got a confirmation of the details of the ring were 100% correct - I was told that the ring was worth 5 times what I paid for it......I couldn't have been happier.

To know that I got a great deal on a great piece of jewelry alone would bring me back to this store.  Then add the friendly, customer centered, genuine service I received from the staff and  I will be a customer for a long time.  In fact, I came back a couple weeks later and bought a cool watch.

Make this your first or last stop and you will be glad you did.

resp.text: Thank you Todd we appreciate your business and are glad your happy with your purchase.  We pride ourselves on having the BEST jewelry prices in town.

text: Very disappointed in the customer service. Prices were good but the sales clerks never spoke to us. I watched while my wife was looking at clothing.  She was wearing shorts and a tee-shirt because it's easier to try on clothes. She was completely ignored. The salespeople greeted and engaged in conversation every lady who was dressed up or seemed to be known to them to help them find things. My wife was looking for a particular item and they were no help. Even after my wife approached one of the sales clerks she didn't offer to help. They even ignored an elderly lady in a wheelchair. As an old retail manager, I found that level of elitism appalling. So the moral of the story is, if you don't care if salespeople are rude, this is the place for you. But if you need help finding something or you want to be treated courteously, then stay away from this place.

name: Taylor Mallicoat
text: I took multiple large bag of clothes in there for her to look at, and as soon as she saw a Fringe Consignment Shop receipt that was left in a bag she stopped looking completely and said she couldn't take any of it. She didn't even look through 95% of my items. If she can't be bothered to look through the stuff I brought there, I can't be bothered to shop there anymore.

resp.text:
As a former employee of Fringe, I have experience with their policies and hold the same standards for items that I accept.  Basically, I accept current styles, in good condition, that I have an immediate need for in my inventory.  I do not accept casual items (sweatshirts and t-shirts) or items that show excessive wear. When my quality standards are met, any rejection is based on the needs of our store and should not be taken personally.

Taylor, I remember this specific visit and urge you to try again, possibly before taking your items elsewhere.
