text: Best jewelers I have ever worked with! As soon as I walked through the doors the customer service was outstanding! I worked with Janet a couple times but the whole staff is amazing. They were so helpful and patient and willing to help make our engagement dreams come true. I got a gorgeous stunning ring set that I get tons of compliments on. I HIGHLY reccomend hobbs to anyone and everyone!!

name: Tyler Simmons
text: Me and my fiancé walked into Hobbs Co. with a short time frame until our wedding and a budget in mind, and they worked with us and helped me find the perfect wedding band for my fiancé for the big day!! I will forever be thankful for their amazing customer service and kindness that they showed us as soon as we stepped in the door!! I highly recommend Hobbs Co to everybody!!!

name: Roger Goodmon
text: Thank you to Hobbs Co for a great experience in purchasing a ring for our granddaughter’s 16th birthday! This was a minor purchase on the grand scale of things, but my wife and I were treated as if we were selecting the biggest, shiniest diamond ring in the store. Stratton and the entire staff were polite, professional, and knowledgeable, and we never felt like we were talking to a salesperson — we felt like they were our advisors. They outlined all of our options and carefully explained everything were were paying for, and provided all the gift wrapping accessories required. This is the store to handle all your jewelry wants and needs. And yes, our granddaughter’s face lit up when she saw the ring!

name: Allison Hodges
text: Hobbs co is always my go to store for my jewelry needs. They have a wide selection of estate, custom and trendy jewelry. The staff is very personable and will go above and beyond to make sure your needs are met while staying around your budget! If you are ever in the need for good quality jewelry give Hobbs co a try, you won’t be disappointed.

name: Valerie Putman
text: I was greeted as soon as I walked in the door with a friendly, smiling, and knowledgeable face. After my divorce I finally made the decision to get rid of my wedding set, and Stratton and Rodney were so nice and caring while I made my choice of what to do with the set. Whether you’re happy about a separation or not, it can still be an emotional time and they really paid attention to my wants and feelings with this process! I am so extremely happy with my trade in and will definitely be back and continue to do business with Hobbs Co again! I can’t rave about their attention to detail and customer service enough. I highly recommend going to see the Hobbs Co. Staff for your jewelry needs!

name: Jason Doggett
text: Stratton went above and beyond to make sure our anniversary gift was delivered on the exact day.  Thanks so much for your help!   Hobbs Co. should be your go to Jeweler in North Alabama!

name: Aspen Phillips
text: Hobbs & Co is the best place to shop! They have a wonderful selection! I bought two ear cuffs from them and absolutely love it!! Highly recommend going to Hobbs & Co for all your gold and sparkle wants and needs 🤩

name: Lauren Lumpkin
text: Stratton and her team went above and beyond to help create the most beautiful dream ring I could have ever imagined. I wanted something unique but simple at the same time. I had been looking for almost two years and finally found it at Hobbs Co. They were so helpful, never made me feel pressured, nor did they push for anything outside of my budget. They will forever be my go to place for any jewelry needs.

name: Melissa Kirkland
text: Hobbs jewelry was very friendly and helpful. They answered all the questions that I had in a unhurried patient manner. I wholeheartedly recommend them and they will be the first jeweler that I visit when looking for jewelry.

name: The Miller’s
text: This company makes shopping easy! This is our forever jewelry store!

name: Madison Morrow
text: I love shopping at HOBBS Co! Every staff member is welcoming and helpful. They have a great selection of beautiful jewelry! Stratton and her father Rodney have always treated us so well. From my engagement ring to picking out family Christmas presents, HOBBS Co has always had me covered.

name: Jeffery Barnett
text: I have used Hobbs Jewelers in the past and my experiences have always been more than satisfactory. This visit was true to form and very pleasant. The staff are knowledgeable, polite and very willing to help you receive the service you need. I highly recommend them for any of your jewelry related needs. Great folks with a personal touch.

name: Miranda Goodman
text: Had a wonderful experience at Hobbs Co. Everyone was very welcoming and greeted me as I walked in. I never know exactly what I want or could potentially be interested in. Stratton took her time showing me new trends and classic pieces. I couldn’t say enough great things about the staff and business. Will forever purchase my jewelry from here.

name: Donna Hicks
text: The people working at Hobbs are exceptionally nice and helpful. I had a request that they really did not have to honor, taking links out of a very inexpensive watch for my 96 year old dad, but they were willing to do it. Stratton was so kind and treated me as family. I highly recommend this business if you wish to have a hometown experience!!

name: Madison Lynn
text: My fiancé and I both had an awesome experience buying here! Excellent service!!

name: andrya hood
text: The customer service at Hobbs Co is unmatched. Meagan and Stratton go out of their way to make sure each customer is taken care of. Don’t bother going anywhere else.

name: Cora Carruth
text: I highly recommend this company! There not your typical jewelry store!! They don’t try to sell you just whatever to make a dime. They want you to find what you envision for yourself and actually take the time to get to know you.  Stratton Hobbs helped my husband and I find our wedding bands! They are the most beautiful pieces! She used her amazing talent and took all my ideas and made it happen!!! If you are indecisive or have a hard time putting jewelry pieces together go to them!! They have such a wide variety of the best of the best! If you’re looking for something particular they have it or they will find it for you!

name: Emily Smith
text:
Stratton was great! She was so kind, helpful, and most importantly (to me) patient! I will for sure be recommending Hobbs Co. in the future to those I know.
You guys can count me as a forever customer!

name: Kendall Leanne Gray
text: So great !! The workers are so amazing and sweet and helped my fiancé get the most beautiful ring !!

name: Andrea Sunday
text: I came into Hobbs Co. asking for a third band for my 10 yr old wedding set from Natalie K.  Stratton not only contacted the designer and ordered 6 rings for me to pick from - she also kept us updated every step of the way! I was pleasantly surprised when I was able to pick up my set a week early and it looked exactly how I remembered it - 10 years ago!  She suggested having the white gold rhodium plated & I could not be happier! Thank you Hobbs Co. I will never go anywhere else! 💕🤩💎 Highly recommend!

name: Joel
text: Love my Seiko watch! Nice selections and excellent service! Thanks!!!

name: Brandon Elder
text: The experience was awesome! The absolute best customer service I have ever experienced in a store like this! The product is great and the are willing to make you a deal! So I won’t be shopping anywhere else other than there!

name: Carter 5.56
text: Stratton Hobbs is a long time friend and will treat you right! You won’t be disappointed if you use Hobbs Co. Great company

name: Josh Wales
text: Hobbs Co. is the ONLY place I’ll be shopping for jewelry for the foreseeable future! I wasn’t quite sure what I wanted when I walked into their Huntsville location but their staff quickly provided a number of beautiful options as well as very professional and patient customer service! I ended up leaving Hobbs Co. with an absolutely gorgeous necklace that was very reasonably priced and the smile on my girlfriend’s face (along with some joyful tears) let me know that I had did a great job, with the help of the ladies at Hobbs Co. of course. I highly recommend checking them out as I will certainly be returning in the future!

name: Cody Bigoney
text: I bought jewelry for a family member last Christmas, and she loved it. The quality of the jewelry was great, and the staff was extremely knowledgeable and helped me out a lot. Thank you so much!

name: David Petty
text: I had an amazing experience with Hobbs Co. when I was looking for an engagement ring a while back. The staff just presents themselves with the upmost professionalism and integrity. They understand the concept of customer service, and you feel that when you walk in the door. The selection and prices are the best around and I would highly recommend anyone looking to treat that special someone, to go to Hobbs Co. 10/10 would approve.

name: Delaney Anderson
text: I have been going into Hobbs Co. for years and years just to stare and try on the beautiful pieces without even having an occasion or reason to purchase in there store. Each time they have offered the BEST costumer support and been so happy and helpful to assist me even when just browsing. As I got older I have started to collect many pieces from the store and still get the same exciting attention and support  whether it’s just fixing a tangled necklace or picking out a birthday present for myself. Safe to say Hobbs Co. is hands down my favorite jewelers and can’t wait to use them for many future events years down the road!

name: JaCara Bates
text: Walked in & was greeted by Stratton, she was great! I came in & purchased exactly what I was looking for. I will definitely be back!

name: taylor brand
text: Very helpful and kind. Have purchased multiple times even went twice in one week because I was so pleased with the price, quality, and customer service!

name: C Long
text: My fiancé and I bought our wedding bands from here, we love them!! Stratton went above and beyond helping us find ones that were perfect for us! 10/10 would recommend coming here for your jewelry needs.

name: Leah V
text: Hobbs is the best place in town to purchase jewelry!! They have always made sure our experiences were nothing short of amazing.

name: Tina Davis
text: Excellent service and we were able to find the perfect pieces. Highly recommend

name: Ivan Rodriguez
text: I don't even know where to begin but all I can say is THANKS to Stratton Hobbs and her staff for helping me find the perfect necklace!! I purchased a 14k gold necklace and absolutely love it and the compliments I receive. Have had it for almost 2 years now and recently purchased a 2nd gold necklace!! Stratton rushed to get my order in and made me one happy customer. Will most definitely be returning for a 3rd necklace in the near future! I can not say thank you enough to the Hobbs Co family!!

name: Steven Douglas
text: Fantastic customer service. Very friendly and not “stuffy” feeling, immediately felt at home.

name: Dalton Steadman
text: Can't say enough GREAT things about this jewelry store and the people who work there. They have excellent product and are always more than willing to help their customers find the exact thing they're looking for! EASY 5 stars!

name: Samuel B
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. Amazing selection to chose from. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase or the experience I had!!

name: Cody Mcgraw
text:
The employees are very helpful and the selection is gorgeous! They are willing to help you in any way they can and do it with a smile.
10/10 would recommend!

name: Josh Adsit
text: I was in the mall picking something up and passed by Hobbs Co. I happened to need a battery for my car key fob. It had been dead for over a week and hadn't had any luck finding a replacement. I figured since they sell watches they probably also replace batteries and keep them in stock. Sure enough they had several and the lady behind the counter even replaced it for me. Very personable and knowledgeable staff and highly recommend them.

name: Alexis Bradford
text: Hobbs Co. Jewelers is the best place to go when looking for an engagement ring or any piece of jewelry! The people there are just best, super friendly and super helpful!

name: E.L. Tibbs
text: This was an amazing experience! Janet and the Hobbs Co. staff did an exceptional job of working with me to customize the exact ring I needed!

name: Robyn Griffin
text: My favorite jewelry store! I really like that it’s family owned - everyone is always so helpful and nice... even if it just for a ring cleaning. 🙂

name: Butler Miller
text: Stratton was so kind and did a perfect job on the custom necklace. She went above and beyond to explain and show me everything even after hours. Stratton and Hobbs Co. Has great quality and great service.

name: David Jordan
text: This was my first time shopping at Hobbs. They treated me as like a valued customer service. They were also very helpful and went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied with their service. I will most definitely continue shopping at Hobbs in the future.

name: Adam Taliaferro
text: Mr. Hobbs did a great job finding me the perfect chain. The service was Amazing!

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Couldn’t recommend this store enough! They have such a wide selection on all jewelry, great friendly customer service. Will definitely go here for all my jewelry needs!

name: Caitlin Clardy
text: The best jewelers around! Told them what i wanted and got exactly that! Great experience! Great customer service! Great selection!!

name: Travis Hargis
text: Best customer service and well priced! Will be my jewelry store from now on.

name: Melanie Bassett
text: Best customer service ever!!!! This was the most pleasant buying experience!

name: Meagan Tonge
text: Hobbs Co. has the best customer service hands down! Stratton helped me find the perfect necklace! Highly recommend them for all your jewelry needs- you won’t be disappointed!!

name: Thomas Coiner
text: I can't say enough about how Hobbs Co. went the extra mile for me. Their selection was tremendous and the person helping me was so nice and helpful.

name: Gina Sharp
text: I have used Hobbs for over 20 years! They have always been amazing!

name: Kenzie letson
text: The best customer service and very nice people!! Will be going here for all my jewelry needs!

name: Whitney King
text: My ring is breathtaking and everything I’ve ever wanted. Thank you Hobbs Co. for helping my vision come to life!

name: Baxley Roberts
text: in love with all of my jewelry pieces from Hobbs Co! Definitely my go-to jewelry store.

name: Elizabeth Wise
text: Wonderful customer service & such a great variety in the store! Always pleased with my purchases.

name: Leigh Ann Holaway
text: I took my watch to Hobbs, in Parkway Place Mall, to have the battery replaced because I have always received excellent service from them until my last visit.  I was told that the stem broke off my watch while someone was setting it but I would not be charged for the battery and it was 10 days before I heard back from them.  I didn't expect to be compensated for my watch but I did expect them to do the next right thing.  I am extremely disappointed and will not shop there again, although from the looks of the store, they seem to be going out of business.

name: Mitch Byrd
text: Extremely knowledgeable and personable! Friendly staff that goes out of their way to help!

name: Mackenzie Breeding
text: Amazing customer service! Stratton will go above and beyond for you, hands down best jewelry store!

name: Sarah Hyche
text: the absolute BEST customer service with the prettiest jewelry!

name: Pamela Bateman
text: I love shopping at Hobbs Co. Everyone is so nice and they always are willing to help.

name: Stephanie Burgess
text: Very pleased with the customer service. Thanks Janet

name: Belinda Hopkins
text: Fantastic sale going on right now!

name: Kennedy Sloan
text: There was amazing customer service, I highly recommend this jeweler.

name: Savannah Gorgus
text: This is the best of the best jewelry store in the world.  The women working there are so sweet and very helpful. Wouldn't shop anywhere else!

name: Cassidy
text:
The people working in the Huntsville location are either incompetent or unethical, and either way I will not ever attempt to use them again.

Yesterday I brought in a handmade ring to be sized. I used Hobbs at the suggestion of the man who created and sold me the ring.

I was very quickly and condescendingly told that was my ring was not sterling silver. She tried to upsale me into having the stone set into another band instead of sized. I said I'd rather look elsewhere and try and find someone willing to attempt to resize it and she seemed offended and her tone hardened. That attitude left me feeling weird and with very little effort I was walking out of another store thirty minutes later with a receipt for the sizing of my STERLING SILVER ring.

Either this woman didn't know what she was doing, or she did and she was lying to try and sell me on a nicer band.

I won't use Hobbs. I won't recommend them and you can bet I'll be telling the man making this jewelry not to refer his customers there. Not just because they were rude and unhelpful but because they don't seem to respect his work.

name: Fred Hoffman
text: Great place and ppl!

name: Tony Guthrie
text: Great customer service

name: Ismael Roldan III
text: Very helpful staff. Good attention-to-detail.

name: Mike Cummings
text: Beautiful jewelry and great customer service

name: Alexis Latham
text: Tried to sale fake diamond after we asked several times if it was fake they wouldnt answer right away, not friendly.
